GE09ram_07_u:1: 7.001.001a prāptarājyasya rāmasya rākṣasānāṃ vadhe kṛte 7.001.001c ājagmur ṛṣayaḥ sarve rāghavaṃ pratinanditum 7.001.002a kauśiko 'tha yavakrīto raibhyaś cyavana eva ca 7.001.002c kaṇvo medhātitheḥ putraḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ye śritāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2: 7.001.003a svastyātreyaś ca bhagavān namuciḥ pramucus tathā
GE09ram_07_u:3: 7.001.003c ājagmus te sahāgastyā ye śritā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_07_u:4: 7.001.004a pṛṣadguḥ kavaṣo dhaumyo raudreyaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:5: 7.001.004c te 'py ājagmuḥ saśiṣyā vai ye śritāḥ paścimāṃ diśam
GE09ram_07_u:10: 7.001.007a pratihāras tatas tūrṇam agastyavacanād atha 7.001.007c samīpaṃ rāghavasyāśu praviveśa mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:11: 7.001.008a sa rāmaṃ dṛśya sahasā pūrṇacandrasamadyutim 7.001.008c agastyaṃ kathayām āsa saṃprātam ṛṣibhiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:12: 7.001.009a śrutvā prāptān munīṃs tāṃs tu bālasūryasamaprabhān
GE09ram_07_u:13: 7.001.009c tadovāca nṛpo dvāḥsthaṃ praveśaya yathāsukham 7.001.010a dṛṣṭvā prāptān munīṃs tāṃs tu pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:15: 7.001.011a teṣu kāñcanacitreṣu svāstīrṇeṣu sukheṣu ca 7.001.011c yathārham upaviṣṭās te āsaneṣv ṛṣipuṃgavāḥ 7.001.012a rāmeṇa kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭāḥ saśiṣyāḥ sapurogamāḥ 7.001.012c maharṣayo vedavido rāmaṃ vacanam abruvan 7.001.013a kuśalaṃ no mahābāho sarvatra raghunandana 7.001.013c tvāṃ tu diṣṭyā kuśalinaṃ paśyāmo hataśātravam
GE09ram_07_u:16: 7.001.014a na hi bhāraḥ sa te rāma rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ 7.001.014c sadhanus tvaṃ hi lokāṃs trīn vijayethā na saṃśayaḥ 7.001.015a diṣṭyā tvayā hato rāma rāvaṇaḥ putrapautravān
GE09ram_07_u:17: 7.001.015c diṣṭyā vijayinaṃ tvādya paśyāmaḥ saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_07_u:18: 7.001.016a diṣṭyā prahasto vikaṭo virūpākṣo mahodaraḥ 7.001.016c akampanaś ca durdharṣo nihatās te niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:19: 7.001.017a yasya pramāṇād vipulaṃ pramāṇaṃ neha vidyate
GE09ram_07_u:20: 7.001.017c diṣṭyā te samare rāma kumbhakarṇo nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:21: 7.001.018a diṣṭyā tvaṃ rākṣasendreṇa dvandvayuddham upāgataḥ 7.001.018c devatānām avadhyena vijayaṃ prāptavān asi 7.001.019a saṃkhye tasya na kiṃ cit tu rāvaṇasya parābhavaḥ 7.001.019c dvandvayuddham anuprāpto diṣṭyā te rāvaṇir hataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:23: 7.001.020c muktaḥ suraripor vīra prāptaś ca vijayas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:24: 7.001.021a vismayas tv eṣa naḥ saumya saṃśrutyendrajitaṃ hatam
GE09ram_07_u:26: 7.001.022a dattvā puṇyām imāṃ vīra saumyām abhayadakṣiṇām
GE09ram_07_u:28: 7.001.023a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:29: 7.001.023c vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā rāmaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:30: 7.001.024a bhavantaḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ ca niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:31: 7.001.024c atikramya mahāvīryau kiṃ praśaṃsatha rāvaṇim 7.001.025a mahodaraṃ prahastaṃ ca virūpākṣaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:32: 7.001.025c atikramya mahāvīryān kiṃ praśaṃsatha rāvaṇim 7.001.026a kīdṛśo vai prabhāvo 'sya kiṃ balaṃ kaḥ parākramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:33: 7.001.026c kena vā kāraṇenaiṣa rāvaṇād atiricyate 7.001.027a śakyaṃ yadi mayā śrotuṃ na khalv ājñāpayāmi vaḥ 7.001.027c yadi guhyaṃ na ced vaktuṃ śrotum icchāmi kathyatām 7.001.027e kathaṃ śakro jitas tena kathaṃ labdhavaraś ca saḥ 7.002.001a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ 7.002.001c kumbhayonir mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:34: 7.002.002a śṛṇu rājan yathāvṛttaṃ yasya tejobalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_07_u:35: 7.002.002c jaghāna ca ripūn yuddhe yathāvadhyaś ca śatrubhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:36: 7.002.003a ahaṃ te rāvaṇasyedaṃ kulaṃ janma ca rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:37: 7.002.003c varapradānaṃ ca tathā tasmai dattaṃ bravīmi te
GE09ram_07_u:38: 7.002.004a purā kṛtayuge rāma prajāpatisutaḥ prabhuḥ 7.002.004c pulastyo nāma brahmarṣiḥ sākṣād iva pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:39: 7.002.005a nānukīrtyā guṇās tasya dharmataḥ śīlatas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:40: 7.002.005c prajāpateḥ putra iti vaktuṃ śakyaṃ hi nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:41: 7.002.006a sa tu dharmaprasaṅgena meroḥ pārśve mahāgireḥ
GE09ram_07_u:43: 7.002.007a tapas tepe sa dharmātmā svādhyāyaniyatendriyaḥ 7.002.007c gatvāśramapadaṃ tasya vighnaṃ kurvanti kanyakāḥ 7.002.008a devapannagakanyāś ca rājarṣitanayāś ca yāḥ 7.002.008c krīḍantyo 'psarasaś caiva taṃ deśam upapedire
GE09ram_07_u:45: 7.002.009c nityaśas tās tu taṃ deśaṃ gatvā krīḍanti kanyakāḥ 7.002.010a atha ruṣṭo mahātejā vyājahāra mahāmuniḥ 7.002.010c yā me darśanam āgacchet sā garbhaṃ dhārayiṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:46: 7.002.011a tās tu sarvāḥ pratigatāḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:47: 7.002.011c brahmaśāpabhayād bhītās taṃ deśaṃ nopacakramuḥ 7.002.012a tṛṇabindos tu rājarṣes tanayā na śṛṇoti tat
GE09ram_07_u:49: 7.002.013a tasminn eva tu kāle sa prājāpatyo mahān ṛṣiḥ 7.002.013c svādhyāyam akarot tatra tapasā dyotitaprabhaḥ 7.002.014a sā tu vedadhvaniṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā caiva tapodhanam
GE09ram_07_u:51: 7.002.015a dṛṣṭvā paramasaṃvignā sā tu tadrūpam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:52: 7.002.015c idaṃ me kiṃ nv iti jñātvā pitur gatvāgrataḥ sthitā
GE09ram_07_u:53: 7.002.016a tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathā bhūtāṃ tṛṇabindur athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:54: 7.002.016c kiṃ tvam etat tv asadṛśaṃ dhārayasy ātmano vapuḥ 7.002.017a sā tu kṛtvāñjaliṃ dīnā kanyovāca tapodhanam
GE09ram_07_u:55: 7.002.017c na jāne kāraṇaṃ tāta yena me rūpam īdṛśam 7.002.018a kiṃ tu pūrvaṃ gatāsmy ekā maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:57: 7.002.019a na ca paśyāmy ahaṃ tatra kāṃ cid apy āgatāṃ sakhīm
GE09ram_07_u:58: 7.002.019c rūpasya tu viparyāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāham ihāgatā
GE09ram_07_u:59: 7.002.020a tṛṇabindus tu rājarṣis tapasā dyotitaprabhaḥ 7.002.020c dhyānaṃ viveśa tac cāpi apaśyad ṛṣikarmajam
GE09ram_07_u:60: 7.002.021a sa tu vijñāya taṃ śāpaṃ maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:61: 7.002.021c gṛhītvā tanayāṃ gatvā pulastyam idam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:62: 7.002.022a bhagavaṃs tanayāṃ me tvaṃ guṇaiḥ svair eva bhūṣitām 7.002.022c bhikṣāṃ pratigṛhāṇemāṃ maharṣe svayam udyatām 7.002.023a tapaścaraṇayuktasya śrāmyamāṇendriyasya te
GE09ram_07_u:63: 7.002.023c śuśrūṣātatparā nityaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ 7.002.024a taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājarṣiṃ dhārmikaṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:64: 7.002.024c jighṛkṣur abravīt kanyāṃ bāḍham ity eva sa dvijaḥ 7.002.025a dattvā tu sa gato rājā svam āśramapadaṃ tadā 7.002.025c sāpi tatrāvasat kanyā toṣayantī patiṃ guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:65: 7.002.025e prītaḥ sa tu mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha 7.002.026a parituṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te guṇānāṃ saṃpadā bhṛśam 7.002.026c tasmāt te viramāmy adya putram ātmasamaṃ guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:66: 7.002.026e ubhayor vaṃśakartāraṃ paulastya iti viśrutam 7.002.027a yasmāt tu viśruto vedas tvayehābhyasyato mama
GE09ram_07_u:67: 7.002.027c tasmāt sa viśravā nāma bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:68: 7.002.028a evam uktā tu sā kanyā prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:69: 7.002.028c acireṇaiva kālena sūtā viśravasaṃ sutam 7.002.029a sa tu lokatraye khyātaḥ śaucadharmasamanvitaḥ 7.002.029c piteva tapasā yukto viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ 7.003.001a atha putraḥ pulastyasya viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ 7.003.001c acireṇaiva kālena piteva tapasi sthitaḥ 7.003.002a satyavāñ śīlavān dakṣaḥ svādhyāyanirataḥ śuciḥ 7.003.002c sarvabhogeṣv asaṃsakto nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:70: 7.003.003a jñātvā tasya tu tadvṛttaṃ bharadvājo mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:71: 7.003.003c dadau viśravase bhāryāṃ svāṃ sutāṃ devavarṇinīm
GE09ram_07_u:72: 7.003.004a pratigṛhya tu dharmeṇa bharadvājasutāṃ tadā 7.003.004c mudā paramayā yukto viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ 7.003.005a sa tasyāṃ vīryasaṃpannam apatyaṃ paramādbhutam 7.003.005c janayām āsa dharmātmā sarvair brahmaguṇair yutam
GE09ram_07_u:73: 7.003.006a tasmiñ jāte tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa babhūva pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:74: 7.003.006c nāma cāsyākarot prītaḥ sārdhaṃ devarṣibhis tadā
GE09ram_07_u:76: 7.003.007c tasmād vaiśravaṇo nāma bhaviṣyaty eṣa viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:77: 7.003.008a sa tu vaiśravaṇas tatra tapovanagatas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:80: 7.003.009c cariṣye niyato dharmaṃ dharmo hi paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:81: 7.003.010a sa tu varṣasahasrāṇi tapas taptvā mahāvane
GE09ram_07_u:82: 7.003.010c pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu taṃ taṃ vidhim avartata
GE09ram_07_u:83: 7.003.011a jalāśī mārutāhāro nirāhāras tathaiva ca 7.003.011c evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi jagmus tāny eva varṣavat
GE09ram_07_u:84: 7.003.012a atha prīto mahātejāḥ sendraiḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:85: 7.003.012c gatvā tasyāśramapadaṃ brahmedaṃ vākyam abravīt 7.003.013a parituṣṭo 'smi te vatsa karmaṇānena suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:86: 7.003.013c varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te varārhas tvaṃ hi me mataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:90: 7.003.015c brahmā suragaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ bāḍham ity eva hṛṣṭavat
GE09ram_07_u:91: 7.003.016a ahaṃ hi lokapālānāṃ caturthaṃ sraṣṭum udyataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:92: 7.003.016c yamendravaruṇānāṃ hi padaṃ yat tava cepsitam
GE09ram_07_u:93: 7.003.017a tatkṛtaṃ gaccha dharmajña dhaneśatvam avāpnuhi 7.003.017c yamendravaruṇānāṃ hi caturtho 'dya bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:94: 7.003.018a etac ca puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ sūryasaṃnibham
GE09ram_07_u:95: 7.003.018c pratigṛhṇīṣva yānārthaṃ tridaśaiḥ samatāṃ vraja 7.003.019a svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmaḥ sarva eva yathāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:96: 7.003.019c kṛtakṛtyā vayaṃ tāta dattvā tava mahāvaram
GE09ram_07_u:97: 7.003.020a gateṣu brahmapūrveṣu deveṣv atha nabhastalam 7.003.020c dhaneśaḥ pitaraṃ prāha vinayāt praṇato vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:98: 7.003.021a bhagavaṃl labdhavān asmi varaṃ kamalayonitaḥ 7.003.021c nivāsaṃ na tu me devo vidadhe sa prajāpatiḥ 7.003.022a tat paśya bhagavan kaṃ cid deśaṃ vāsāya naḥ prabho
GE09ram_07_u:99: 7.003.022c na ca pīḍā bhaved yatra prāṇino yasya kasya cit
GE09ram_07_u:100: 7.003.023a evam uktas tu putreṇa viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:101: 7.003.023c vacanaṃ prāha dharmajña śrūyatām iti dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:102: 7.003.024a laṅkā nāma purī ramyā nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā
GE09ram_07_u:104: 7.003.025a ramaṇīyā purī sā hi rukmavaidūryatoraṇā 7.003.025c rākṣasaiḥ sā parityaktā purā viṣṇubhayārditaiḥ 7.003.025e śūnyā rakṣogaṇaiḥ sarvai rasātalatalaṃ gataiḥ 7.003.026a sa tvaṃ tatra nivāsāya rocayasva matiṃ svakām
GE09ram_07_u:105: 7.003.026c nirdoṣas tatra te vāso na ca bādhāsti kasya cit
GE09ram_07_u:106: 7.003.027a etac chrutvā tu dharmātmā dharmiṣṭhaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_07_u:107: 7.003.027c niveśayām āsa tadā laṅkāṃ parvatamūrdhani 7.003.028a nairṛtānāṃ sahasrais tu hṛṣṭaiḥ pramuditaiḥ sadā
GE09ram_07_u:109: 7.003.029a atha tatrāvasat prīto dharmātmā nairṛtādhipaḥ 7.003.029c samudraparidhānāyāṃ laṅkāyāṃ viśravātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:110: 7.003.030a kāle kāle vinītātmā puṣpakeṇa dhaneśvaraḥ 7.003.030c abhyagacchat susaṃhṛṣṭaḥ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:111: 7.003.031a sa devagandharvagaṇair abhiṣṭutas; tathaiva siddhaiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:112: cāraṇair api 7.003.031c gabhastibhiḥ sūrya ivaujasā vṛtaḥ; pituḥ samīpaṃ prayayau śriyā vṛtaḥ 7.004.001a śrutvāgastyeritaṃ vākyaṃ rāmo vismayam āgataḥ 7.004.001c pūrvam āsīt tu laṅkāyāṃ rakṣasām iti saṃbhavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:115: 7.004.003a bhagavan pūrvam apy eṣā laṅkāsīt piśitāśinām
GE09ram_07_u:116: 7.004.003c itīdaṃ bhavataḥ śrutvā vismayo janito mama
GE09ram_07_u:117: 7.004.004a pulastyavaṃśād udbhūtā rākṣasā iti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_07_u:118: 7.004.004c idānīm anyataś cāpi saṃbhavaḥ kīrtitas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:119: 7.004.005a rāvaṇāt kumbhakarṇāc ca prahastād vikaṭād api
GE09ram_07_u:120: 7.004.005c rāvaṇasya ca putrebhyaḥ kiṃ nu te balavattarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:121: 7.004.006a ka eṣāṃ pūrvako brahman kiṃnāmā kiṃtapobalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:122: 7.004.006c aparādhaṃ ca kaṃ prāpya viṣṇunā drāvitāḥ purā
GE09ram_07_u:123: 7.004.007a etad vistarataḥ sarvaṃ kathayasva mamānagha 7.004.007c kautūhalaṃ kṛtaṃ mahyaṃ nuda bhānur yathā tamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:124: 7.004.008a rāghavasya tu tac chrutvā saṃskārālaṃkṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:125: 7.004.008c īṣadvismayamānas tam agastyaḥ prāha rāghavam 7.004.009a prajāpatiḥ purā sṛṣṭvā apaḥ salilasaṃbhavaḥ 7.004.009c tāsāṃ gopāyane sattvān asṛjat padmasaṃbhavaḥ 7.004.010a te sattvāḥ sattvakartāraṃ vinītavad upasthitāḥ 7.004.010c kiṃ kurma iti bhāṣantaḥ kṣutpipāsābhayārditāḥ 7.004.011a prajāpatis tu tāny āha sattvāni prahasann iva
GE09ram_07_u:126: 7.004.011c ābhāṣya vācā yatnena rakṣadhvam iti mānadaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:127: 7.004.012a rakṣāma iti tatrānyair yakṣāmeti tathāparaiḥ 7.004.012c bhuṅkṣitābhuṅkṣitair uktas tatas tān āha bhūtakṛt
GE09ram_07_u:128: 7.004.013a rakṣāma iti yair uktaṃ rākṣasās te bhavantu vaḥ 7.004.013c yakṣāma iti yair uktaṃ te vai yakṣā bhavantu vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:129: 7.004.014a tatra hetiḥ prahetiś ca bhrātarau rākṣasarṣabhau
GE09ram_07_u:131: 7.004.015a prahetir dhārmikas tatra na dārān so 'bhikāṅkṣati
GE09ram_07_u:132: 7.004.015c hetir dārakriyārthaṃ tu yatnaṃ param athākarot
GE09ram_07_u:133: 7.004.016a sa kālabhaginīṃ kanyāṃ bhayāṃ nāma bhayāvahām
GE09ram_07_u:134: 7.004.016c udāvahad ameyātmā svayam eva mahāmatiḥ 7.004.017a sa tasyāṃ janayām āasa hetī
GE09ram_07_u:135: 7.004.017c putraṃ putravatāṃ śreṣṭho vidyutkeśa iti śrutam
GE09ram_07_u:138: 7.004.019a sa yadā yauvanaṃ bhadram anuprāpto niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:139: 7.004.019c tato dārakriyāṃ tasya kartuṃ vyavasitaḥ pitā
GE09ram_07_u:140: 7.004.020a saṃdhyāduhitaraṃ so 'tha saṃdhyātulyāṃ prabhāvataḥ 7.004.020c varayām āsa putrārthaṃ hetī rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ 7.004.021a avaśyam eva dātavyā parasmai seti saṃdhyayā
GE09ram_07_u:141: 7.004.021c cintayitvā sutā dattā vidyutkeśāya rāghava 7.004.022a saṃdhyāyās tanayāṃ labdhvā vidyutkeśo niśācaraḥ 7.004.022c ramate sa tayā sārdhaṃ paulomyā maghavān iva
GE09ram_07_u:142: 7.004.023a kena cit tv atha kālena rāma sālakaṭaṃkaṭā
GE09ram_07_u:143: 7.004.023c vidyutkeśād garbham āpa ghanarājir ivārṇavāt 7.004.024a tataḥ sā rākṣasī garbhaṃ ghanagarbhasamaprabham 7.004.024c prasūtā mandaraṃ gatvā gaṅgā garbham ivāgnijam
GE09ram_07_u:144: 7.004.025a tam utsṛjya tu sā garbhaṃ vidyutkeśād ratārthinī
GE09ram_07_u:145: 7.004.025c reme sā patinā sārdhaṃ vismṛtya sutam ātmajam
GE09ram_07_u:146: 7.004.026a tayotsṛṣṭaḥ sa tu śiśuḥ śaradarkasamadyutiḥ 7.004.026c pāṇim āsye samādhāya ruroda ghanarāḍ iva
GE09ram_07_u:147: 7.004.027a athopariṣṭād gacchan vai vṛṣabhastho haraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:148: 7.004.027c apaśyad umayā sārdhaṃ rudantaṃ rākṣasātmajam 7.004.028a kāruṇyabhāvāt pārvatyā bhavas tripurahā tataḥ 7.004.028c taṃ rākṣasātmajaṃ cakre mātur eva vayaḥ samam
GE09ram_07_u:150: 7.004.029c puram ākāśagaṃ prādāt pārvatyāḥ priyakāmyayā 7.004.030a umayāpi varo datto rākṣasīnāṃ nṛpātmaja 7.004.030c sadyopalabdhir garbhasya prasūtiḥ sadya eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:151: 7.004.030e sadya eva vayaḥprāptir mātur eva vayaḥ samam
GE09ram_07_u:152: 7.004.031a tataḥ sukeśo varadānagarvitaḥ; śriyaṃ prabhoḥ prāpya harasya pārśvataḥ 7.004.031c cacāra sarvatra mahāmatiḥ khagaḥ; khagaṃ puraṃ prāpya puraṃdaro yathā 7.005.001a sukeśaṃ dhārmikaṃ dṛṣṭvā varalabdhaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:154: 7.005.002a tasya devavatī nāma dvitīyā śrīr ivātmajā
GE09ram_07_u:155: 7.005.002c tāṃ sukeśāya dharmeṇa dadau dakṣaḥ śriyaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:156: 7.005.003a varadānakṛtaiśvaryaṃ sā taṃ prāpya patiṃ priyam
GE09ram_07_u:157: 7.005.003c āsīd devavatī tuṣṭā dhanaṃ prāpyeva nirdhanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:158: 7.005.004a sa tayā saha saṃyukto rarāja rajanīcaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:160: 7.005.005a devavatyāṃ sukeśas tu janayām āsa rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:161: 7.005.005c trīṃs trinetrasamān putrān rākṣasān rākṣasādhipaḥ 7.005.005e mālyavantaṃ sumāliṃ ca māliṃ ca balināṃ varam
GE09ram_07_u:162: 7.005.006a trayo lokā ivāvyagrāḥ sthitās traya ivāgnayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:163: 7.005.006c trayo mantrā ivātyugrās trayo ghorā ivāmayāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:165: 7.005.007c vivṛddhim agamaṃs tatra vyādhayopekṣitā iva 7.005.008a varaprāptiṃ pitus te tu jñātvaiśvaryaṃ tato mahat
GE09ram_07_u:166: 7.005.008c tapas taptuṃ gatā meruṃ bhrātaraḥ kṛtaniścayāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:167: 7.005.009a pragṛhya niyamān ghorān rākṣasā nṛpasattama 7.005.009c vicerus te tapo ghoraṃ sarvabhūtabhayāvaham 7.005.010a satyārjavadamopetais tapobhir bhuvi duṣkaraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:169: 7.005.011a tato vibhuś caturvaktro vimānavaram āsthitaḥ 7.005.011c sukeśaputrān āmantrya varado 'smīty abhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:170: 7.005.012a brahmāṇaṃ varadaṃ jñātvā sendrair devagaṇair vṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:171: 7.005.012c ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve vepamānā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:172: 7.005.013a tapasārādhito deva yadi no diśase varam
GE09ram_07_u:175: 7.005.014a evaṃ bhaviṣyatīty uktvā sukeśatanayān prabhuḥ 7.005.014c prayayau brahmalokāya brahmā brāhmaṇavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:176: 7.005.015a varaṃ labdhvā tataḥ sarve rāma rātriṃcarās tadā
GE09ram_07_u:178: 7.005.016a tair vadhyamānās tridaśāḥ sarṣisaṃghāḥ sacāraṇāḥ 7.005.016c trātāraṃ nādhigacchanti nirayasthā yathā narāḥ 7.005.017a atha te viśvakarmāṇaṃ śilpināṃ varam avyayam
GE09ram_07_u:179: 7.005.017c ūcuḥ sametya saṃhṛṣṭā rākṣasā raghusattama 7.005.018a gṛhakartā bhavān eva devānāṃ hṛdayepsitam 7.005.018c asmākam api tāvat tvaṃ gṛhaṃ kuru mahāmate
GE09ram_07_u:180: 7.005.019a himavantaṃ samāśritya meruṃ mandaram eva vā
GE09ram_07_u:181: 7.005.019c maheśvaragṛhaprakhyaṃ gṛhaṃ naḥ kriyatāṃ mahat 7.005.020a viśvakarmā tatas teṣāṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahābhujaḥ 7.005.020c nivāsaṃ kathayām āsa śakrasyevāmarāvatīm
GE09ram_07_u:182: 7.005.021a dakṣiṇasyodadhes tīre trikūṭo nāma parvataḥ 7.005.021c śikhare tasya śailasya madhyame 'mbudasaṃnibhe
GE09ram_07_u:184: 7.005.022a triṃśadyojanavistīrṇā svarṇaprākāratoraṇā 7.005.022c mayā laṅketi nagarī śakrājñaptena nirmitā 7.005.023a tasyāṃ vasata durdharṣāḥ puryāṃ rākṣasasattamāḥ 7.005.023c amarāvatīṃ samāsādya sendrā iva divaukasaḥ 7.005.024a laṅkādurgaṃ samāsādya rākṣasair bahubhir vṛtāḥ 7.005.024c bhaviṣyatha durādharṣāḥ śatrūṇāṃ śatrusūdanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:185: 7.005.025a viśvakarmavacaḥ śrutvā tatas te rāma rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:186: 7.005.025c sahasrānucarā gatvā laṅkāṃ tām avasan purīm
GE09ram_07_u:188: 7.005.026c laṅkām avāpya te hṛṣṭā viharanti niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:190: 7.005.027c tasyāḥ kanyātrayaṃ hy āsīd dhīśrīkīrtisamadyuti 7.005.028a jyeṣṭhakrameṇa sā teṣāṃ rākṣasānām arākṣasī 7.005.028c kanyās tāḥ pradadau hṛṣṭā pūrṇacandranibhānanāḥ 7.005.029a trayāṇāṃ rākṣasendrāṇāṃ tisro gandharvakanyakāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:191: 7.005.029c mātrā dattā mahābhāgā nakṣatre bhagadaivate 7.005.030a kṛtadārās tu te rāma sukeśatanayāḥ prabho
GE09ram_07_u:192: 7.005.030c bhāryābhiḥ saha cikrīḍur apsarobhir ivāmarāḥ 7.005.031a tatra mālyavato bhāryā sundarī nāma sundarī
GE09ram_07_u:193: 7.005.031c sa tasyāṃ janayām āsa yad apatyaṃ nibodha tat 7.005.032a vajramuṣṭir virūpākṣo durmukhaś caiva rākṣasaḥ 7.005.032c suptaghno yajñakopaś ca mattonmattau tathaiva ca
GE09ram_07_u:194: 7.005.032e analā cābhavat kanyā sundaryāṃ rāma sundarī
GE09ram_07_u:195: 7.005.033a sumālino 'pi bhāryāsīt pūrṇacandranibhānanā 7.005.033c nāmnā ketumatī nāma prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī
GE09ram_07_u:196: 7.005.034a sumālī janayām āsa yad apatyaṃ niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:199: 7.005.035c dhūmrākśaś cātha daṇḍaś ca supārśvaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:200: 7.005.036a saṃhrādiḥ praghasaś caiva bhāsakarṇaś ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:201: 7.005.036c rākā puṣpotkaṭā caiva kaikasī ca śucismitā
GE09ram_07_u:202: 7.005.036e kumbhīnasī ca ity ete sumāleḥ prasavāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:203: 7.005.037a māles tu vasudā nāma gandharvī rūpaśālinī
GE09ram_07_u:205: 7.005.038a sumāler anujas tasyāṃ janayām āsa yat prabho
GE09ram_07_u:206: 7.005.038c apatyaṃ kathyamānaṃ tan mayā tvaṃ śṛṇu rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:207: 7.005.039a analaś cānilaś caiva haraḥ saṃpātir eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:208: 7.005.039c ete vibhīṣaṇāmātyā māleyās te niśācarāḥ 7.005.040a tatas tu te rākṣasapuṃgavās trayo; niśācaraiḥ putraśataiś ca
GE09ram_07_u:210: 7.005.040c surān sahendrān ṛṣināgadānavān; babādhire te balavīryadarpitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:211: 7.005.041a jagad bhramanto 'nilavad durāsadā; raṇe ca mṛtyupratimāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:213: 7.005.041c varapradānād abhigarvitā bhṛśaṃ; kratukriyāṇāṃ praśamaṃkarāḥ sadā
GE09ram_07_u:214: 7.006.001a tair vadhyamānā devāś ca ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:215: 7.006.001c bhayārtāḥ śaraṇaṃ jagmur devadevaṃ maheśvaram 7.006.002a te sametya tu kāmāriṃ tripurāriṃ trilocanam
GE09ram_07_u:218: 7.006.003c prajādhyakṣa prajāḥ sarvā bādhyante ripubādhana 7.006.004a śaraṇyāny aśaraṇyāni āśramāṇi kṛtāni naḥ 7.006.004c svargāc ca cyāvitaḥ śakraḥ svarge krīḍanti śakravat
GE09ram_07_u:219: 7.006.005a ahaṃ viṣṇur ahaṃ rudro brahmāhaṃ devarāḍ aham
GE09ram_07_u:220: 7.006.005c ahaṃ yamo 'haṃ varuṇaś candro 'haṃ ravir apy aham
GE09ram_07_u:221: 7.006.006a iti te rākṣasā deva varadānena darpitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:222: 7.006.006c bādhante samaroddharṣā ye ca teṣāṃ puraḥsarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:223: 7.006.007a tan no devabhayārtānām abhayaṃ dātum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:224: 7.006.007c aśivaṃ vapur āsthāya jahi daivatakaṇṭakān 7.006.008a ity uktas tu suraiḥ sarvaiḥ kapardī nīlalohitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:225: 7.006.008c sukeśaṃ prati sāpekṣa āha devagaṇān prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:226: 7.006.009a nāhaṃ tān nihaniṣyāmi avadhyā mama te 'surāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:227: 7.006.009c kiṃ tu mantraṃ pradāsyāmi yo vai tān nihaniṣyati 7.006.010a evam eva samudyogaṃ puraskṛtya surarṣabhāḥ 7.006.010c gacchantu śaraṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ haniṣyati sa tān prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:228: 7.006.011a tatas te jayaśabdena pratinandya maheśvaram 7.006.011c viṣṇoḥ samīpam ājagmur
GE09ram_07_u:229: 7.006.012a śaṅkhacakradharaṃ devaṃ praṇamya bahumānya ca 7.006.012c ūcuḥ saṃbhrāntavad vākyaṃ sukeśatanayārditāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:231: 7.006.013c ākramya varadānena sthānāny apahṛtāni naḥ 7.006.014a laṅkā nāma purī durgā trikūṭaśikhare
GE09ram_07_u:232: 7.006.014c tatra sthitāḥ prabādhante sarvān naḥ kṣaṇadācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:233: 7.006.015a sa tvam asmatpriyārthaṃ tu jahi tān madhusūdana
GE09ram_07_u:235: 7.006.016a bhayeṣv abhayado 'smākaṃ nānyo 'sti bhavatā samaḥ 7.006.016c nuda tvaṃ no bhayaṃ deva nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ 7.006.017a ity evaṃ daivatair ukto devadevo janārdanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:236: 7.006.017c abhayaṃ bhayado 'rīṇāṃ dattvā devān uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:237: 7.006.018a sukeśaṃ rākṣasaṃ jāne īśāna varadarpitam 7.006.018c tāṃś cāsya tanayāñ jāne yeṣāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ sa mālyavān 7.006.019a tān ahaṃ samatikrāntamaryādān rākṣasādhamān
GE09ram_07_u:238: 7.006.019c sūdayiṣyāmi saṃgrāme surā bhavata vijvarāḥ 7.006.020a ity uktās te surāḥ sarve viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
GE09ram_07_u:239: 7.006.020c yathā vāsaṃ yayur hṛṣṭāḥ praśamanto janārdanam
GE09ram_07_u:240: 7.006.021a vibudhānāṃ samudyogaṃ mālyavān sa niśācaraḥ 7.006.021c śrutvā tau bhrātarau vīrāv idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:241: 7.006.022a amarā ṛṣayaś caiva saṃhatya kila śaṃkaram
GE09ram_07_u:242: 7.006.022c asmadvadhaṃ parīpsanta idam ūcus trilocanam 7.006.023a sukeśatanayā deva varadānabaloddhatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:244: 7.006.024a rākṣasair abhibhūtāḥ sma na śaktāḥ sma umāpate
GE09ram_07_u:245: 7.006.024c sveṣu veśmasu saṃsthātuṃ bhayāt teṣāṃ durātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:246: 7.006.025a tad asmākaṃ hitārthe tvaṃ jahi tāṃs tāṃs trilocana 7.006.025c rākṣasān huṃkṛtenaiva daha pradahatāṃ vara 7.006.026a ity evaṃ tridaśair ukto niśamyāndhakasūdanaḥ 7.006.026c śiraḥ karaṃ ca dhunvāna idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:247: 7.006.027a avadhyā mama te devāḥ sukeśatanayā raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:248: 7.006.027c mantraṃ tu vaḥ pradāsyāmi yo vai tān nihaniṣyati 7.006.028a yaḥ sa cakragadāpāṇiḥ pītavāsā janārdanaḥ 7.006.028c haniṣyati sa tān yuddhe śaraṇaṃ taṃ prapadyatha
GE09ram_07_u:249: 7.006.029a harān nāvāpya te kāmaṃ kāmārim abhivādya ca
GE09ram_07_u:250: 7.006.029c nārāyaṇālayaṃ prāptās tasmai sarvaṃ nyavedayan 7.006.030a tato nārāyaṇenoktā devā indrapurogamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:251: 7.006.030c surārīn sūdayiṣyāmi surā bhavata vijvarāḥ 7.006.031a devānāṃ bhayabhītānāṃ hariṇā
GE09ram_07_u:252: 7.006.031c pratijñāto vadho 'smākaṃ tac cintayatha yat kṣamam
GE09ram_07_u:253: 7.006.032a hiraṇyakaśipor mṛtyur anyeṣāṃ ca suradviṣām 7.006.032c duḥkhaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ jetuṃ yo no hantum abhīpsati
GE09ram_07_u:254: 7.006.033a tataḥ sumālī mālī ca śrutvā mālyavato vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:255: 7.006.033c ūcatur bhrātaraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhagāṃśāv iva vāsavam
GE09ram_07_u:256: 7.006.034a svadhītaṃ dattam iṣṭaṃ ca aiśvaryaṃ paripālitam
GE09ram_07_u:257: 7.006.034c āyur nirāmayaṃ prāptaṃ svadharmaḥ sthāpitaś ca naḥ
GE09ram_07_u:258: 7.006.035a devasāgaram akṣobhyaṃ śastraughaiḥ pravigāhya ca 7.006.035c jitā devā raṇe nityaṃ na no mṛtyukṛtaṃ bhayam 7.006.036a nārāyaṇaś ca rudraś ca śakraś cāpi yamas tathā 7.006.036c asmākaṃ pramukhe sthātuṃ sarva eva hi bibhyati
GE09ram_07_u:259: 7.006.037a viṣṇor doṣaś ca nāsty atra kāraṇaṃ rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_07_u:260: 7.006.037c devānām eva doṣeṇa viṣṇoḥ pracalitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:262: 7.006.038c devān eva jighāṃsāmo yebhyo doṣaḥ samutthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:263: 7.006.039a iti mālī sumālī ca mālyavān agrajaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:264: 7.006.039c udyogaṃ ghoṣayitvātha rākṣasāḥ sarva eva te
GE09ram_07_u:265: 7.006.039e yuddhāya niryayuḥ kruddhā jambhavṛtrabalā iva 7.006.040a syandanair vāraṇendraiś ca hayaiś ca girisaṃnibhaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:266: 7.006.040c kharair gobhir athoṣṭraiś ca śiṃśumārair bhujaṃ gamaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:267: 7.006.041a makaraiḥ kacchapair mīnair vihaṃgair garuḍopamaiḥ 7.006.041c siṃhair vyāghrair varāhaiś ca sṛmaraiś camarair api
GE09ram_07_u:268: 7.006.042a tyaktvā laṅkāṃ tataḥ sarve rākṣasā balagarvitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:270: 7.006.043a laṅkāviparyayaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāni laṅkālayāny atha 7.006.043c bhūtāni bhayadarśīni vimanaskāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:271: 7.006.044a bhaumās tathāntarikṣāś ca kālājñaptā bhayāvahāḥ 7.006.044c utpātā rākṣasendrāṇām abhāvāyotthitā drutam
GE09ram_07_u:272: 7.006.045a asthīni meghā varṣanti uṣṇaṃ śoṇitam eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:275: 7.006.046c bhūtāḥ paripatanti sma nṛtyamānāḥ sahasraśaḥ 7.006.047a gṛdhracakraṃ mahac cāpi jvalanodgāribhir mukhaiḥ 7.006.047c rākṣasānām upari vai bhramate kālacakravat 7.006.048a tān acintyamahotpātān rākṣasā balagarvitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:276: 7.006.048c yanty eva na nivartante mṛtyupāśāvapāśitāḥ 7.006.049a mālyavāṃś ca sumālī ca mālī ca rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:277: 7.006.049c āsan puraḥsarās teṣāṃ kratūnām iva pāvakāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:278: 7.006.050a mālyavantaṃ tu te sarve mālyavantam ivācalam
GE09ram_07_u:279: 7.006.050c niśācarā āśrayante dhātāram iva dehinaḥ 7.006.051a tad balaṃ rākṣasendrāṇāṃ
GE09ram_07_u:280: 7.006.051c jayepsayā devalokaṃ yayau mālī vaśe sthitam
GE09ram_07_u:281: 7.006.052a rākṣasānāṃ samudyogaṃ taṃ tu nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:282: 7.006.052c devadūtād upaśrutya dadhre yuddhe tato manaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:285: 7.006.054a suparṇapakṣānilanunnapakṣaṃ; bhramatpatākaṃ pravikīrṇaśastram 7.006.054c cacāla tad rākṣasarājasainyaṃ; calopalo nīla ivācalendraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:288: 7.006.055c niśācarāḥ saṃparivārya mādhavaṃ; varāyudhair nirbibhiduḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:289: 7.007.001a nārāyaṇagiriṃ te tu garjanto rākṣasāmbudāḥ 7.007.001c avarṣann iṣuvarṣeṇa varṣeṇādrim
GE09ram_07_u:290: 7.007.002a śyāmāvadātas tair viṣṇur nīlair naktaṃcarottamaiḥ 7.007.002c vṛto 'ñjanagirīvāsīd varṣamāṇaiḥ payodharaiḥ 7.007.003a śalabhā iva kedāraṃ maśakā iva parvatam
GE09ram_07_u:291: 7.007.003c yathāmṛtaghaṭaṃ jīvā makarā iva cārṇavam 7.007.004a tathā rakṣodhanur muktā
GE09ram_07_u:292: 7.007.004c hariṃ viśanti sma śarā lokāstam iva paryaye
GE09ram_07_u:293: 7.007.005a syandanaiḥ syandanagatā gajaiś ca gajadhūr gatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:294: 7.007.005c aśvārohāḥ sadaśvaiś ca pādātāś cāmbare carāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:296: 7.007.006c nirucchvāsaṃ hariṃ cakruḥ prāṇāyāma iva dvijam
GE09ram_07_u:297: 7.007.007a niśācarais tudyamāno mīnair iva mahātimiḥ 7.007.007c śārṅgam āyamya gātrāṇi rākṣasānāṃ mahāhave 7.007.008a śaraiḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭair vajravaktrair manojavaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:299: 7.007.009a vidrāvya śaravarṣaṃ taṃ varṣaṃ vāyur ivotthitam
GE09ram_07_u:302: 7.007.010c rarāsa bhīmanihrādo yugānte jalado yathā 7.007.011a śaṅkharājaravaḥ so 'tha trāsayām āsa rākṣasān
GE09ram_07_u:303: 7.007.011c mṛgarāja ivāraṇye samadān iva kuñjarān 7.007.012a na śekur aśvāḥ saṃsthātuṃ vimadāḥ kuñjarābhavan
GE09ram_07_u:306: 7.007.013c vidārya tāni rakṣāṃsi supuṅkhā viviśuḥ kṣitim
GE09ram_07_u:308: 7.007.014c nipetū rākṣasā bhīmāḥ śailā vajrahatā iva
GE09ram_07_u:310: 7.007.015c asṛk kṣaranti dhārābhiḥ svarṇadhārām ivācalāḥ 7.007.016a śaṅkharājaravaś cāpi śārṅgacāparavas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:311: 7.007.016c rākṣasānāṃ ravāṃś cāpi grasate vaiṣṇavo ravaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:312: 7.007.017a sūryād iva karā ghorā ūrmayaḥ sāgarād iva
GE09ram_07_u:313: 7.007.017c parvatād iva nāgendrā vāryoghā iva cāmbudāt
GE09ram_07_u:314: 7.007.018a tathā bāṇā vinirmuktāḥ śārṅgān narāyaṇeritāḥ 7.007.018c nirdhāvantīṣavas tūrṇaṃ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:315: 7.007.019a śarabheṇa yathā siṃhāḥ siṃhena dviradā yathā
GE09ram_07_u:316: 7.007.019c dviradena yathā vyāghrā vyāghreṇa dvīpino yathā
GE09ram_07_u:317: 7.007.020a dvīpinā ca yathā śvānaḥ śunā mārjārakā yathā
GE09ram_07_u:318: 7.007.020c mārjāreṇa yathā sarpāḥ sarpeṇa ca yathākhavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:319: 7.007.021a tathā te rākṣasā yuddhe viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
GE09ram_07_u:320: 7.007.021c dravanti drāvitāś caiva śāyitāś ca mahītale
GE09ram_07_u:322: 7.007.022c vārijaṃ nādayām āsa toyadaṃ surarāḍ iva
GE09ram_07_u:323: 7.007.023a nārāyaṇaśaragrastaṃ śaṅkhanādasuvihvalam 7.007.023c yayau laṅkām abhimukhaṃ prabhagnaṃ rākṣasaṃ balam
GE09ram_07_u:325: 7.007.024c sumālī śaravarṣeṇa āvavāra raṇe harim 7.007.025a utkṣipya hemābharaṇaṃ karaṃ karam iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:326: 7.007.025c rarāsa rākṣaso harṣāt sataḍit toyado yathā
GE09ram_07_u:327: 7.007.026a sumāler nardatas tasya śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam 7.007.026c ciccheda yantur aśvāś ca bhrāntās tasya tu rakṣasaḥ 7.007.027a tair aśvair bhrāmyate bhrāntaiḥ sumālī rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:328: 7.007.027c indriyāśvair yathā bhrāntair dhṛtihīno yathā naraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:329: 7.007.028a mālī cābhyadravad yuddhe pragṛhya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:331: 7.007.028e viviśur harim āsādya krauñcaṃ patrarathā iva
GE09ram_07_u:332: 7.007.029a ardyamānaḥ śaraiḥ so 'tha mālimuktaiḥ sahasraśaḥ 7.007.029c cukṣubhe na raṇe viṣṇur jitendriya ivādhibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:333: 7.007.030a atha maurvī svanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:335: 7.007.031a te mālideham āsādya vajravidyutprabhāḥ śarāḥ 7.007.031c pibanti rudhiraṃ tasya nāgā iva purāmṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:336: 7.007.032a mālinaṃ vimukhaṃ kṛtvā mālimauliṃ harir balāt
GE09ram_07_u:337: 7.007.032c rathaṃ ca sadhvajaṃ cāpaṃ vājinaś ca nyapātayat
GE09ram_07_u:338: 7.007.033a virathas tu gadāṃ gṛhya mālī naktaṃcarottamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:339: 7.007.033c āpupluve gadāpāṇir giryagrād iva keṣarī 7.007.034a sa tayā garuḍaṃ saṃkhye īśānam iva cāntakaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:340: 7.007.034c lalāṭadeśe 'bhyahanad vajreṇendro yathācalam 7.007.035a gadayābhihatas tena mālinā garuḍo bhṛśam 7.007.035c raṇāt parāṅmukhaṃ devaṃ kṛtavān vedanāturaḥ 7.007.036a parāṅmukhe kṛte deve mālinā garuḍena vai
GE09ram_07_u:342: 7.007.037a rakṣasāṃ nadatāṃ nādaṃ śrutvā harihayānujaḥ 7.007.037c parāṅmukho 'py utsasarja cakraṃ mālijighāṃsayā
GE09ram_07_u:343: 7.007.038a tat sūryamaṇḍalābhāsaṃ svabhāsā bhāsayan nabhaḥ 7.007.038c kālacakranibhaṃ cakraṃ māleḥ śīrṣam apātayat 7.007.039a tacchiro rākṣasendrasya cakrotkṛttaṃ vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:344: 7.007.039c papāta rudhirodgāri purā rāhuśiro yathā 7.007.040a tataḥ suraiḥ susaṃhṛṣṭaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:345: 7.007.040c siṃhanādaravo muktaḥ sādhu deveti vādibhiḥ 7.007.041a mālinaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā sumālī malyavān api
GE09ram_07_u:346: 7.007.041c sabalau śokasaṃtaptau laṅkāaṃ prati vidhāvitau 7.007.042a garuḍas tu samāśvastaḥ saṃnivṛtya mahāmanāḥ 7.007.042c rākṣasān drāvayām āsa pakṣavātena kopitaḥ 7.007.043a nārāyaṇo 'pīṣuvarāśanībhir; vidārayām āsa dhanuḥpramuktaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:347: 7.007.043c naktaṃcarān muktavidhūtakeśān; yathāśanībhiḥ sataḍinmahendraḥ 7.007.044a bhinnātapatraṃ patamānaśastraṃ; śarair apadhvastaviśīrṇadeham 7.007.044c viniḥsṛtāntraṃ bhayalolanetraṃ; balaṃ tad unmattanibhaṃ babhūva
GE09ram_07_u:348: 7.007.045a siṃhārditānām iva kuñjarāṇāṃ; niśācarāṇāṃ saha kuñjarāṇām
GE09ram_07_u:349: 7.007.045c ravāś ca vegāś ca samaṃ babhūvuḥ; purāṇasiṃhena vimarditānām 7.007.046a saṃchādyamānā haribāṇajālaiḥ; svabāṇajāalāni samutsṛjantaḥ 7.007.046c dhāvanti naktaṃcarakālameghā; vāyupraṇunnā iva kālameghāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:351: 7.007.047c asiprahārair bahudhā vibhaktāḥ; patanti śailā iva rākṣasendrāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:353: 7.007.049a ke cic caivāsinā chinnās tathānye śaratāḍitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:354: 7.007.049c nipetur ambarāt tūrṇaṃ rākṣasāḥ sāgarāmbhasi 7.007.050a tadāmbaraṃ vigalitahārakuṇḍalair; niśācarair nīlabalāhakopamaiḥ 7.007.050c nipātyamānair dadṛśe nirantaraṃ; nipātyamānair iva nīlaparvataiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:355: 7.008.001a hanyamāne bale tasmin padmanābhena pṛṣṭhataḥ 7.008.001c mālyavān saṃnivṛtto 'tha velātiga ivārṇavaḥ 7.008.002a saṃraktanayanaḥ kopāc calan maulir niśācaraḥ 7.008.002c padmanābham idaṃ prāha vacanaṃ paruṣaṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:356: 7.008.003a nārāyaṇa na jānīṣe kṣatradharmaṃ sanātanam 7.008.003c ayuddhamanaso bhagnān yo 'smān haṃsi yathetaraḥ 7.008.004a parāṅmukhavadhaṃ pāpaṃ yaḥ karoti sureśvara 7.008.004c sa hantā na gataḥ svargaṃ labhate puṇyakarmaṇām
GE09ram_07_u:358: 7.008.005c ahaṃ sthito 'smi paśyāmi balaṃ darśaya yat tava 7.008.006a uvāca rākṣasendraṃ taṃ devarājānujo balī 7.008.006c yuṣmatto bhayabhītānāṃ devānāṃ vai mayābhayam 7.008.006e rākṣasotsādanaṃ dattaṃ tad etad anupālyate 7.008.007a prāṇair api priyaṃ kāryaṃ devānāṃ hi sadā mayā 7.008.007c so 'haṃ vo nihaniṣyāmi rasātalagatān api
GE09ram_07_u:359: 7.008.008a devam evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu raktāmburuhalocanam 7.008.008c śaktyā bibheda saṃkruddho rākṣasendro rarāsa ca
GE09ram_07_u:361: 7.008.009c harer urasi babhrāja meghastheva śatahradā 7.008.010a tatas tām eva cotkṛṣya śaktiṃ śaktidharapriyaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:367: 7.008.013a tayā bhinnatanutrāṇāḥ prāviśad vipulaṃ tamaḥ 7.008.013c mālyavān punar āśvastas tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:368: 7.008.014a tataḥ kārṣṇāyasaṃ śūlaṃ kaṇṭakair bahubhiś citam
GE09ram_07_u:369: 7.008.014c pragṛhyābhyahanad devaṃ stanayor antare dṛḍham 7.008.015a tathaiva raṇaraktas tu muṣṭinā vāsavānujam 7.008.015c tāḍayitvā dhanurmātram apakrānto niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:370: 7.008.016a tato 'mbare mahāñ śabdaḥ sādhu sādhv iti cotthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:371: 7.008.016c āhatya rākṣaso viṣṇuṃ garuḍaṃ cāpy atāḍayat
GE09ram_07_u:372: 7.008.017a vainateyas tataḥ kruddhaḥ pakṣavātena rākṣasaṃ 7.008.017c vyapohad balavān vāyuḥ śuṣkaparṇacayaṃ yathā 7.008.018a dvijendrapakṣavātena drāvitaṃ dṛśya pūrvajam
GE09ram_07_u:373: 7.008.018c sumālī svabalaiḥ sārdhaṃ laṅkām abhimukho yayau
GE09ram_07_u:375: 7.008.019c svabalena samāgamya yayau laṅkāṃ hriyā vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:376: 7.008.020a evaṃ te rākṣasā rāma hariṇā kamalekṣaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:378: 7.008.021a aśaknuvantas te viṣṇuṃ pratiyoddhuṃ bhayārditāḥ 7.008.021c tyaktvā laṅkāṃ gatā vastuṃ pātālaṃ sahapatnayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:380: 7.008.022c sthitāḥ prakhyātavīryās te vaṃśe sālakaṭaṅkaṭe 7.008.023a ye tvayā nihatās te vai paulastyā nāma rākṣasāḥ 7.008.023c sumālī mālyavān mālī ye ca teṣāṃ puraḥsarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:381: 7.008.023e sarva ete mahābhāga rāvaṇād balavattarāḥ 7.008.024a na cānyo rakṣasāṃ hantā sureṣv api puraṃjaya
GE09ram_07_u:383: 7.008.025a bhavān nārāyaṇo devaś caturbāhuḥ sanātanaḥ 7.008.025c rākṣasān hantum utpanno ajeyaḥ prabhur avyayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:384: 7.009.001a kasya cit tv atha kālasya sumālī nāma rākṣasaḥ 7.009.001c rasātalān martyalokaṃ sarvaṃ vai vicacāara ha
GE09ram_07_u:385: 7.009.002a nīlajīmūtasaṃkāśas taptakāñcanakuṇḍalaḥ 7.009.002c kanyāṃ duhitaraṃ gṛhya vinā padmam iva śriyam
GE09ram_07_u:386: 7.009.002e athāpaśyat sa gacchantaṃ puṣpakeṇa dhaneśvaram 7.009.003a taṃ dṛṣṭvāmarasaṃkāśaṃ gacchantaṃ pāvakopamam
GE09ram_07_u:387: 7.009.003c athābbravīt sutāṃ rakṣaḥ kaikasīṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:389: 7.009.004c tvatkṛte ca vayaṃ sarve yantritā dharmabuddhayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:390: 7.009.005a tvaṃ hi sarvaguṇopetā śrīḥ sapadmeva putrike
GE09ram_07_u:391: 7.009.005c pratyākhyānāc ca bhītais tvaṃ na varaiḥ pratigṛhyase
GE09ram_07_u:392: 7.009.006a kanyāpitṛtvaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ mānakāṅkṣiṇām 7.009.006c na jñāyate ca kaḥ kanyāṃ varayed iti putrike 7.009.007a mātuḥ kulaṃ pitṛkulaṃ yatra caiva pradīyate
GE09ram_07_u:393: 7.009.007c kulatrayaṃ sadā kanyā saṃśaye sthāpya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_07_u:395: 7.009.008c gaccha viśravasaṃ putri paulastyaṃ varaya svayam
GE09ram_07_u:396: 7.009.009a īdṛśās te bhaviṣyanti putrāḥ putri na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:398: 7.009.010a etasminn antare rāma pulastyatanayo dvijaḥ 7.009.010c agnihotram upātiṣṭhac caturtha iva pāvakaḥ 7.009.011a sā tu tāṃ dāruṇāṃ velām acintya pitṛgauravāt
GE09ram_07_u:400: 7.009.012a sa tu tāṃ vīkṣya suśroṇīṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām
GE09ram_07_u:402: 7.009.013a bhadre kasyāsi duhitā kuto vā tvam ihāgatā
GE09ram_07_u:403: 7.009.013c kiṃ kāryaṃ kasya vā hetos tattvato brūhi śobhane 7.009.014a evam uktā tu sā kanyā kṛtāñjalir athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:404: 7.009.014c ātmaprabhāvena mune jñātum arhasi me matam
GE09ram_07_u:405: 7.009.015a kiṃ tu viddhi hi māṃ brahmañ śāsanāt pitur āgatām
GE09ram_07_u:406: 7.009.015c kaikasī nāma nāmnāhaṃ śeṣaṃ tvaṃ jñātum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:407: 7.009.016a sa tu gatvā munir dhyānaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:408: 7.009.016c vijñātaṃ te mayā bhadre kāraṇaṃ yan manogatam
GE09ram_07_u:409: 7.009.017a dāruṇāyāṃ tu velāyāṃ yasmāt tvaṃ mām upasthitā
GE09ram_07_u:410: 7.009.017c śṛṇu tasmāt sutān bhadre yādṛśāñ janayiṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:413: 7.009.019a sā tu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā praṇipatyābravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:415: 7.009.020a athābravīn munis tatra paścimo yas tavātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:416: 7.009.020c mama vaṃśānurūpaś ca dharmātmā ca bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:417: 7.009.021a evam uktā tu sā kanyā rāma kālena kena cit
GE09ram_07_u:418: 7.009.021c janayām āsa bībhatsaṃ rakṣorūpaṃ sudāruṇam 7.009.022a daśaśīrṣaṃ mahādaṃṣṭraṃ
GE09ram_07_u:420: 7.009.023a jātamātre tatas tasmin sajvālakavalāḥ śivāḥ 7.009.023c kravyādāś cāpasavyāni maṇḍalāni pracakrire
GE09ram_07_u:421: 7.009.024a vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devo meghāś ca kharanisvanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:422: 7.009.024c prababhau na ca khe sūryo maholkāś cāpatan bhuvi 7.009.025a atha nāmākarot tasya pitāmahasamaḥ pitā 7.009.025c daśaśīrṣaḥ prasūto 'yaṃ daśagrīvo bhaviṣyati 7.009.026a tasya tv anantaraṃ jātaḥ kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:423: 7.009.026c pramāṇād yasya vipulaṃ pramāṇaṃ neha vidyate
GE09ram_07_u:424: 7.009.027a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā nāma saṃjajñe vikṛtānanā 7.009.027c vibhīṣaṇaś ca dharmātmā kaikasyāḥ paścimaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:425: 7.009.028a te tu tatra mahāraṇye vavṛdhuḥ sumahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:427: 7.009.029a kumbhakarṇaḥ pramattas tu maharṣīn dharmasaṃśritān 7.009.029c trailokyaṃ trāsayan duṣṭo bhakṣayan vicacāra ha
GE09ram_07_u:428: 7.009.030a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā nityaṃ dharmapathe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:430: 7.009.031a atha vitteśvaro devas tatra kālena kena cit
GE09ram_07_u:431: 7.009.031c āgacchat pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ puṣpakeṇa mahaujasaṃ 7.009.032a taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikasī tatra jvalantam iva tejasā
GE09ram_07_u:432: 7.009.032c āsthāya rākṣasīṃ buddhiṃ daśagrīvam uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:433: 7.009.033a putravaiśravaṇaṃ paśya bhrātaraṃ tejasā vṛtam 7.009.033c bhrātṛbhāve same cāpi paśyātmānaṃ tvam īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:435: 7.009.034c yathā bhavasi me putra śīghraṃ vaiśvaraṇopamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:436: 7.009.035a mātus tad vacanaṃ śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_07_u:437: 7.009.035c amarṣam atulaṃ lebhe pratijñāṃ cākarot tadā
GE09ram_07_u:438: 7.009.036a satyaṃ te pratijānāmi tulyo bhrātrādhiko 'pi vā
GE09ram_07_u:439: 7.009.036c bhaviṣyāmy acirān mātaḥ saṃtāpaṃ tyaja hṛdgatam
GE09ram_07_u:440: 7.009.037a tataḥ krodhena tenaiva daśagrīvaḥ sahānujaḥ 7.009.037c prāpsyāmi tapasā kāmam iti kṛtvādhyavasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:442: 7.010.001a athābravīd dvijaṃ rāmaḥ kathaṃ te bhrātaro vane
GE09ram_07_u:443: 7.010.001c kīdṛśaṃ tu tadā brahmaṃs tapaś cerur mahāvratāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:444: 7.010.002a agastyas tv abravīt tatra rāmaṃ prayata mānasaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:445: 7.010.002c tāṃs tān dharmavidhīṃs tatra bhrātaras te samāviśan
GE09ram_07_u:446: 7.010.003a kumbhakarṇas tadā yatto nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇaḥ 7.010.003c tatāpa graiṣmike kāle pañcasv agniṣv avasthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:448: 7.010.004c nityaṃ ca śaiśire kāle jalamadhyapratiśrayaḥ 7.010.005a evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi daśa tasyāticakramuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:449: 7.010.005c dharme prayatamānasya satpathe niṣṭhitasya ca 7.010.006a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā nityaṃ dharmaparaḥ śuciḥ
GE09ram_07_u:451: 7.010.007a samāpte niyame tasya nanṛtuś cāpsarogaṇāḥ 7.010.007c papāta puṣpavarṣaṃ ca kṣubhitāś cāpi devatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:457: 7.010.010c pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu śiraś cāgnau juhāva saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:459: 7.010.011c śirāṃsi nava cāpy asya praviṣṭāni hutāśanam
GE09ram_07_u:460: 7.010.012a atha varṣasahasre tu daśame daśamaṃ śiraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:461: 7.010.012c chettukāmaḥ sa dharmātmā prāptaś cātra pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:462: 7.010.013a pitāmahas tu suprītaḥ sārdhaṃ devair upasthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:464: 7.010.014a śīghraṃ varaya dharmajña varo yas te 'bhikāṅkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:465: 7.010.014c kiṃ te kāmaṃ karomy adya na vṛthā te pariśramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:466: 7.010.015a tato 'bravīd daśagrīvaḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā 7.010.015c praṇamya śirasā devaṃ harṣagadgadayā girā 7.010.016a bhagavan prāṇināṃ nityaṃ nānyatra maraṇād bhayam
GE09ram_07_u:467: 7.010.016c nāsti mṛtyusamaḥ śatrur amaratvam ato vṛṇe
GE09ram_07_u:468: 7.010.017a suparṇanāgayakṣāṇāṃ daityadānavarakṣasām 7.010.017c avadhyaḥ syāṃ prajādhyakṣa devatānāṃ ca śāśvatam
GE09ram_07_u:469: 7.010.018a na hi cintā mamānyeṣu prāṇiṣv amarapūjita
GE09ram_07_u:470: 7.010.018c tṛṇabhūtā hi me sarve prāṇino mānuṣādayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:471: 7.010.019a evam uktas tu dharmātmā daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā
GE09ram_07_u:472: 7.010.019c uvāca vacanaṃ rāma saha devaiḥ pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:473: 7.010.020a bhaviṣyaty evam evaitat tava rākṣasapuṃgava 7.010.020c śṛṇu cāpi vaco bhūyaḥ prītasyeha śubhaṃ mama
GE09ram_07_u:474: 7.010.021a hutāni yāni śīrṣāṇi pūrvam agnau tvayānagha
GE09ram_07_u:475: 7.010.021c punas tāni bhaviṣyanti tathaiva tava rākṣasa
GE09ram_07_u:477: 7.010.022c agnau hutāni śīrṣāṇi yāni tāny utthitāni vai
GE09ram_07_u:478: 7.010.023a evam uktvvā tu taṃ rāma daśagrīvaṃ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:482: 7.010.025a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā vacanaṃ prāha sāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:483: 7.010.025c vṛtaḥ sarvaguṇair nityaṃ candramā iva raśmibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:484: 7.010.026a bhagavan kṛtakṛtyo 'haṃ yan me lokaguruḥ svayam
GE09ram_07_u:485: 7.010.026c prīto yadi tvaṃ dātavyaṃ varaṃ me śṛṇu suvrata 7.010.027a yā yā me jāyate buddhir yeṣu yeṣv āśrameṣv iha
GE09ram_07_u:486: 7.010.027c sā sā bhavatu dharmiṣṭhā taṃ taṃ dharmaṃ ca pālaye
GE09ram_07_u:487: 7.010.028a eṣa me paramodāra varaḥ paramako mataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:488: 7.010.028c na hi dharmābhiraktānāṃ loke kiṃ cana durlabham
GE09ram_07_u:489: 7.010.029a atha prajāpatiḥ prīto vibhīṣaṇam uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:490: 7.010.029c dharmiṣṭhas tvaṃ yathā vatsa tathā caitad bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:492: 7.010.030c nādharme jāyate buddhir amaratvaṃ dadāmi te
GE09ram_07_u:493: 7.010.031a kumbhakarṇāya tu varaṃ prayacchantam ariṃdama 7.010.031c prajāpatiṃ surāḥ sarve vākyaṃ prāñjalayo 'bruvan
GE09ram_07_u:494: 7.010.032a na tāvat kumbhakarṇāya pradātavyo varas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:495: 7.010.032c jānīṣe hi yathā lokāṃs trāsayaty eṣa durmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:497: 7.010.033c anena bhakṣitā brahman ṛṣayo mānuṣās tathā
GE09ram_07_u:498: 7.010.034a varavyājena moho 'smai dīyatām amitaprabha 7.010.034c lokānāṃ svasti caiva syād bhaved asya ca saṃnatiḥ 7.010.035a evam uktaḥ surair brahmācintayat padmasaṃbhavaḥ 7.010.035c cintitā copatasthe 'sya pārśvaṃ devī sarasvatī
GE09ram_07_u:499: 7.010.036a prāñjaliḥ sā tu parśvasthā prāha vākyaṃ sarasvatī
GE09ram_07_u:500: 7.010.036c iyam asmy āgatā devakiṃ kāryaṃ karavāṇy aham
GE09ram_07_u:501: 7.010.037a prajāpatis tu tāṃ prāptāṃ prāha vākyaṃ sarasvatīm
GE09ram_07_u:502: 7.010.037c vāṇi tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhava yā devatepsitā
GE09ram_07_u:503: 7.010.038a tathety uktvā praviṣṭā sā prajāpatir athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:504: 7.010.038c kumbhakarṇa mahābāho varaṃ varaya yo mataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:505: 7.010.039a kumbhakarṇas tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:506: 7.010.039c svaptuṃ varṣāṇy anekāni devadeva mamepsitam 7.010.040a evam astv iti taṃ coktvā saha devaiḥ pitāmahaḥ 7.010.040c devī sarasvatī caiva muktvā taṃ prayayau divam
GE09ram_07_u:507: 7.010.041a kumbhakarṇas tu duṣṭātmā cintayām āsa duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:508: 7.010.041c kīrdṛśaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ vākyaṃ mamādya vadanāc cyutam 7.010.042a evaṃ labdhavarāḥ sarve bhrātaro dīptatejasaḥ 7.010.042c śleṣmātakavanaṃ gatvā tatra te nyavasan sukham
GE09ram_07_u:509: 7.011.001a sumālī varalabdhāṃs tu jñātvā tān vai niśācarān
GE09ram_07_u:510: 7.011.001c udatiṣṭhad bhayaṃ tyaktvā sānugaḥ sa rasātalāt
GE09ram_07_u:511: 7.011.002a mārīcaś ca prahastaś ca virūpākṣo mahodaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:512: 7.011.002c udatiṣṭhan susaṃrabdhāḥ sacivās tasya rakṣasaḥ 7.011.003a sumālī caiva taiḥ sarvair vṛto rākṣasapuṃgavaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:515: 7.011.004c yas tvaṃ tribhuvaṇaśreṣṭhāl labdhavān varam īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:516: 7.011.005a yatkṛte ca vayaṃ laṅkāṃ tyaktvā yātā rasātalam
GE09ram_07_u:517: 7.011.005c tad gataṃ no mahābāho mahad viṣṇukṛtaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_07_u:518: 7.011.006a asakṛt tena bhagnā hi parityajya svam ālayam
GE09ram_07_u:519: 7.011.006c vidrutāḥ sahitāḥ sarve praviṣṭāḥ sma rasātalam
GE09ram_07_u:520: 7.011.007a asmadīyā ca laṅkeyaṃ nagarī rākṣasoṣitā 7.011.007c niveśitā tava bhrātrā dhanādhyakṣeṇa dhīmatā 7.011.008a yadi nāmātra śakyaṃ syāt sāmnā dānena vānagha
GE09ram_07_u:521: 7.011.008c tarasā vā mahābāho pratyānetuṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:522: 7.011.009a tvaṃ ca laṅkeśvaras tāta bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:523: 7.011.009c sarveṣāṃ naḥ prabhuś caiva bhaviṣyasi mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:525: 7.011.010c vitteśo gurur asmākaṃ nārhasy evaṃ prabhāṣitum
GE09ram_07_u:526: 7.011.011a uktavantaṃ tathā vākyaṃ daśagrīvaṃ niśācaraḥ 7.011.011c prahastaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam idam āha sakāraṇam
GE09ram_07_u:527: 7.011.012a daśagrīva mahābāho nārhas tvaṃ vaktum īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:528: 7.011.012c saubhrātraṃ nāsti śūrāṇāṃ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE09ram_07_u:529: 7.011.013a aditiś ca ditiś caiva bhaginyau sahite kila
GE09ram_07_u:531: 7.011.014a aditir janayām āsa devāṃs tribhuvaṇeśvarān 7.011.014c ditis tv ajanayad daityān kaśyapasyātmasaṃbhavān 7.011.015a daityānāṃ kila dharmajña pureyaṃ savanārṇavā 7.011.015c saparvatā mahī vīra te 'bhavan prabhaviṣṇavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:532: 7.011.016a nihatya tāṃs tu samare viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
GE09ram_07_u:533: 7.011.016c devānāṃ vaśam ānītaṃ trailokyam idam avyayam
GE09ram_07_u:534: 7.011.017a naitad eko bhavān eva kariṣyati viparyayam
GE09ram_07_u:535: 7.011.017c surair ācaritaṃ pūrvaṃ kuruṣvaitad vaco mama
GE09ram_07_u:536: 7.011.018a evam ukto daśagrīvaḥ prahastena durātmanā 7.011.018c cintayitvā muhūrtaṃ vai bāḍham ity eva so 'bravīt
GE09ram_07_u:537: 7.011.019a sa tu tenaiva harṣeṇa tasminn ahani vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:538: 7.011.019c vanaṃ gato daśagrīvaḥ saha taiḥ kṣaṇadācaraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:539: 7.011.020a trikūṭasthaḥ sa tu tadā daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:540: 7.011.020c preṣayām āsa dautyena prahastaṃ vākyakovidam 7.011.021a prahasta śīghraṃ gatvā tvaṃ brūhi nairṛtapuṃgavam
GE09ram_07_u:541: 7.011.021c vacanān mama vitteśaṃ sāmapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:542: 7.011.022a iyaṃ laṅkā purī rājan rākṣasānāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:543: 7.011.022c tvayā niveśitā saumya naitad yuktaṃ tavānagha
GE09ram_07_u:544: 7.011.023a tad bhavān yadi sāmnaitāṃ dadyād atulavikrama
GE09ram_07_u:545: 7.011.023c kṛtā bhaven mama prītir dharmaś caivānupālitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:546: 7.011.024a ity uktaḥ sa tadā gatvā prahasto vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:548: 7.011.025a prahastād api saṃśrutya devo vaiśravaṇo vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:549: 7.011.025c pratyuvāca prahastaṃ taṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 7.011.026a brūhi gaccha daśagrīvaṃ purī rājyaṃ ca yan mama 7.011.026c tavāpy etan mahābāho bhuṅkṣvaitad dhatakaṇṭakam 7.011.027a sarvaṃ kartāsmi bhadraṃ te rākṣaseśa vaco 'cirāt
GE09ram_07_u:550: 7.011.027c kiṃ tu tāvat pratīkṣasva pitur yāvan nivedaye
GE09ram_07_u:551: 7.011.028a evam uktvā dhanādhyakṣo jagāma pitur antikam
GE09ram_07_u:552: 7.011.028c abhivādya guruṃ prāha rāvaṇasya yadīpsitam 7.011.029a eṣa tāta daśagrīvo dūtaṃ preṣitavān mama
GE09ram_07_u:553: 7.011.029c dīyatāṃ nagarī laṅkā pūrvaṃ rakṣogaṇoṣitā 7.011.029e mayātra yad anuṣṭheyaṃ tan mamācakṣva suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:554: 7.011.030a brahmarṣis tv evam ukto 'sau viśravā munipuṃgavaḥ 7.011.030c uvāca dhanadaṃ vākyaṃ śṛṇu putra vaco mama
GE09ram_07_u:555: 7.011.031a daśagrīvo mahābāhur uktavān mama saṃnidhau 7.011.031c mayā nirbhartsitaś cāsīd bahudhoktaḥ sudurmatiḥ 7.011.032a sa krodhena mayā cokto dhvaṃsasveti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:556: 7.011.032c śreyo'bhiyuktaṃ dharmyaṃ ca śṛṇu putra vaco mama
GE09ram_07_u:558: 7.011.033c na vetti mama śāpāc ca prakṛtiṃ dāruṇāṃ gataḥ 7.011.034a tasmād gaccha mahābāho kailāsaṃ dharaṇīdharam 7.011.034c niveśaya nivāsārthaṃ tyaja laṅkāṃ sahānugaḥ 7.011.035a tatra mandākinī ramyā nadīnāṃ pravarā nadī
GE09ram_07_u:560: 7.011.036a na hi kṣamaṃ tvayā tena vairaṃ dhanadarakṣasā
GE09ram_07_u:561: 7.011.036c jānīṣe hi yathānena labdhaḥ paramako varaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:562: 7.011.037a evam ukto gṛhītvā tu tad vacaḥ pitṛgauravāt
GE09ram_07_u:563: 7.011.037c sadāra pauraḥ sāmātyaḥ savāhanadhano gataḥ 7.011.038a prahastas tu daśagrīvaṃ gatvā sarvaṃ nyavedayat
GE09ram_07_u:564: 7.011.038c śūnyā sā nagarī laṅkā triṃśadyojanam āyatā
GE09ram_07_u:565: 7.011.038e praviśya tāṃ sahāsmābhiḥ svadharmaṃ tatra pālaya
GE09ram_07_u:566: 7.011.039a evam uktaḥ prahastena rāvaṇo rākṣasas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:567: 7.011.039c viveśa nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ sabhrātā sabalānugaḥ 7.011.040a sa cābhiṣiktaḥ kṣaṇadācarais tadā; niveśayām āsa purīṃ
GE09ram_07_u:569: 7.011.040c nikāmapūrṇā ca babhūva sā purī; niśācarair nīlabalāhakopamaiḥ 7.011.041a dhaneśvaras tv atha pitṛvākyagauravān; nyaveśayac chaśivimale girau purīm 7.011.041c svalaṃkṛtair bhavanavarair vibhūṣitāṃ; puraṃdarasyeva tadāmarāvatīm 7.012.001a rākṣasendro 'bhiṣiktas tu bhrātṛbhyāṃ sahitas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:570: 7.012.001c tataḥ pradānaṃ rākṣasyā bhaginyāḥ samacintayat 7.012.002a dadau tāṃ kālakeyāya dānavendrāya rākṣasīm 7.012.002c svasāṃ śūrpaṇakhāṃ nāma vidyujjihvāya nāmataḥ 7.012.003a atha dattvā svasāraṃ sa mṛgayāṃ paryaṭan nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:571: 7.012.003c tatrāpaśyat tato rāma mayaṃ nāma diteḥ sutam
GE09ram_07_u:572: 7.012.004a kanyāsahāyaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ 7.012.004c apṛcchat ko bhavan eko nirmanuṣya mṛge vane
GE09ram_07_u:573: 7.012.005a mayas tv athābravīd rāma pṛcchantaṃ taṃ niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:574: 7.012.005c śrūyatāṃ sarvam ākhyāsye yathāvṛttam idaṃ mama
GE09ram_07_u:575: 7.012.006a hemā nāmāpsarās tāta śrutapūrvā yadi tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:576: 7.012.006c daivatair mama sā dattā paulomīva śatakratoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:577: 7.012.007a tasyāṃ saktamanās tāta pañcavarṣaśatāny aham 7.012.007c sā ca daivata kāryeṇa gatā varṣaṃ caturdaśam
GE09ram_07_u:578: 7.012.008a tasyāḥ kṛte ca hemāyāḥ sarvaṃ hemapuraṃ mayā
GE09ram_07_u:579: 7.012.008c vajravaidūryacitraṃ ca māyayā nirmitaṃ tadā 7.012.009a tatrāham aratiṃ vindaṃs tayā hīnaḥ suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:580: 7.012.009c tasmāt purād duhitaraṃ gṛhītvā vanam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:581: 7.012.010a iyaṃ mamātmajā rājaṃs tasyāḥ kukṣau vivardhitā
GE09ram_07_u:582: 7.012.010c bhartāram anayā sārdham asyāḥ prāpto 'smi mārgitum
GE09ram_07_u:583: 7.012.011a kanyāpitṛtvaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi narāṇāṃ mānakāṅkṣiṇām 7.012.011c kanyā hi dve kule nityaṃ saṃśaye sthāpya tiṣṭhati 7.012.012a dvau sutau tu mama tv asyāṃ bhāryāyāṃ saṃbabhūvatuḥ 7.012.012c māyāvī prathamas tāta dundubhis tadanantaram 7.012.013a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:584: 7.012.013c tvām idānīṃ kathaṃ tāta jānīyāṃ ko bhavān iti 7.012.014a evam ukto rākṣasendro vinītam idam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:585: 7.012.014c ahaṃ paulastya tanayo daśagrīvaś ca nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:586: 7.012.015a brahmarṣes taṃ sutaṃ jñātvā mayo harṣam upāgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:587: 7.012.015c dātuṃ duhitaraṃ tasya rocayām āsa tatra vai
GE09ram_07_u:588: 7.012.016a prahasan prāha daityendro rākṣasendram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:589: 7.012.016c iyaṃ mamātmajā rājan hemayāpsarasā dhṛtā 7.012.016e kanyā mandodarī nāma patnyarthaṃ pratigṛhyatām 7.012.017a bāḍham ity eva taṃ rāma daśagrīvo 'bhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:590: 7.012.017c prajvālya tatra caivāgnim akarot pāṇisaṃgraham 7.012.018a na hi tasya mayo rāma śāpābhijñas tapodhanāt
GE09ram_07_u:591: 7.012.018c viditvā tena sā dattā tasya paitāmahaṃ kulam
GE09ram_07_u:592: 7.012.019a amoghāṃ tasya śaktiṃ ca pradadau paramādbhutām
GE09ram_07_u:593: 7.012.019c pareṇa tapasā labdhāṃ jaghnivāṃl lakṣmaṇaṃ yayā
GE09ram_07_u:594: 7.012.020a evaṃ sa kṛtadāro vai laṅkāyām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:595: 7.012.020c gatvā tu nagaraṃ bhārye bhrātṛbhyāṃ samudāvahat
GE09ram_07_u:597: 7.012.021c tāṃ bhāryāṃ kumbhakarṇasya rāvaṇaḥ samudāvahat 7.012.022a gandharvarājasya sutāṃ śailūṣasya mahātmana
GE09ram_07_u:598: 7.012.022c saramā nāma dharmajño lebhe bhāryāṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:599: 7.012.023a tīre tu sarasaḥ sā vai saṃjajñe mānasasya ca 7.012.023c mānasaṃ ca saras tāta vavṛdhe jaladāgame
GE09ram_07_u:600: 7.012.024a mātrā tu tasyāḥ kanyāyāḥ snehanākranditaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:601: 7.012.024c saro mā vardhatety uktaṃ tataḥ sā saramābhavat
GE09ram_07_u:602: 7.012.025a evaṃ te kṛtadārā vai remire tatra rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:603: 7.012.025c svāṃ svāṃ bhāryām upādāya gandharvā iva nandane
GE09ram_07_u:604: 7.012.026a tato mandodarī putraṃ meghanādam asūyata 7.012.026c sa eṣa indrajin nāma yuṣmābhir
GE09ram_07_u:605: 7.012.027a jātamātreṇa hi purā tena rākṣasasūnunā 7.012.027c rudatā sumahān mukto nādo jaladharopamaḥ 7.012.028a jaḍīkṛtāyāṃ laṅkāyāṃ tena nādena tasya vai
GE09ram_07_u:606: 7.012.028c pitā tasyākaron nāma meghanāda iti svayam
GE09ram_07_u:608: 7.012.029c rakṣyamāṇo varastrībhiś channaḥ kāṣṭhair ivānalaḥ 7.013.001a atha lokeśvarotsṛṣṭā tatra kālena kena cit
GE09ram_07_u:609: 7.013.001c nidrā samabhavat tīvrā kumbhakarṇasya rūpiṇī 7.013.002a tato bhrātaram āsīnaṃ kumbhakarṇo 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:610: 7.013.002c nidrā māṃ bādhate rājan kārayasva mamālayam
GE09ram_07_u:611: 7.013.003a viniyuktās tato rājñā śilpino viśvakarmavat 7.013.003c akurvan kumbhakarṇasya kailāsasamam ālayam
GE09ram_07_u:612: 7.013.004a vistīrṇaṃ yojanaṃ śubhraṃ tato dviguṇam āyatam
GE09ram_07_u:614: 7.013.005a sphāṭikaiḥ kāñcanaiś citraiḥ stambhaiḥ sarvatra śobhitam
GE09ram_07_u:616: 7.013.006a dantatoraṇavinyastaṃ vajrasphaṭikavedikam 7.013.006c sarvartusukhadaṃ nityaṃ meroḥ puṇyāṃ guhām iva
GE09ram_07_u:617: 7.013.007a tatra nidrāṃ samāviṣṭaḥ kumbhakarṇo niśācaraḥ 7.013.007c bahūny abdasahasrāṇi śayāno nāvabudhyate
GE09ram_07_u:618: 7.013.008a nidrābhibhūte tu tadā kumbhakarṇe daśānanaḥ 7.013.008c devarṣiyakṣagandharvān bādhate sma sa nityaśaḥ 7.013.009a udyānāni vicitrāṇi nandanādīni yāni ca 7.013.009c tāni gatvā susaṃkruddho bhinatti sma daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:619: 7.013.010a nadīṃ gaja iva krīḍan vṛkṣān vāyur iva kṣipan 7.013.010c nagān vajra iva sṛṣṭo vidhvaṃsayati nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:620: 7.013.011a tathā vṛttaṃ tu vijñāya daśagrīvaṃ dhaneśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:621: 7.013.011c kulānurūpaṃ dharmajña vṛttaṃ saṃsmṛtya cātmanaḥ 7.013.012a saubhrātradarśanārthaṃ tu dūtaṃ vaiśvaraṇas tadā 7.013.012c laṅkāṃ saṃpreṣayām āsa daśagrīvasya vai hitam
GE09ram_07_u:622: 7.013.013a sa gatvā nagarīṃ laṅkām āsasāda vibhīṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:623: 7.013.013c mānitas tena dharmeṇa pṛṣṭhaś cāgamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:624: 7.013.014a pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rājño jñātīn api ca bāndhavān 7.013.014c sabhāyāṃ darśayām āsa tam āsīnaṃ daśānanam
GE09ram_07_u:625: 7.013.015a sa dṛṣṭvā tatra rājānaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā
GE09ram_07_u:626: 7.013.015c jayena cābhisaṃpūjya tūṣṇīm āsīn muhūrtakam 7.013.016a tasyopanīte paryaṅke
GE09ram_07_u:627: 7.013.016c upaviśya daśagrīvaṃ dūto vākyam athābravīt 7.013.017a rājan vadāmi te sarvaṃ bhrātā tava yad abravīt 7.013.017c ubhayoḥ sadṛśaṃ saumya vṛttasya ca kulasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:628: 7.013.018a sādhu paryāptam etāvat kṛtaś cāritrasaṃgrahaḥ 7.013.018c sādhu dharme vyavasthānaṃ kriyatāṃ yadi śakyate
GE09ram_07_u:629: 7.013.019a dṛṣṭaṃ me nandanaṃ bhagnam ṛṣayo nihatāḥ śrutāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:630: 7.013.019c devānāṃ tu samudyogas tvatto rājañ śrutaś ca me 7.013.020a nirākṛtaś ca bahuśas tvayāhaṃ rākṣasādhipa 7.013.020c aparāddhā hi bālyāc ca rakṣaṇīyāḥ svabāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:631: 7.013.021a ahaṃ tu himavatpṛṣṭhaṃ gato dharmam upāsitum
GE09ram_07_u:632: 7.013.021c raudraṃ vrataṃ samāsthāya niyato niyatendriyaḥ 7.013.022a tatra devo mayā dṛṣṭaḥ saha devyomayā prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:633: 7.013.022c savyaṃ cakṣur mayā caiva tatra devyāṃ nipātitam
GE09ram_07_u:634: 7.013.023a kā nv iyaṃ syād iti śubhā na khalv anyena hetunā
GE09ram_07_u:635: 7.013.023c rūpaṃ hy anupamaṃ kṛtvā tatra krīḍati pārvatī
GE09ram_07_u:636: 7.013.024a tato devyāḥ prabhāvena dagdhaṃ savyaṃ mamekṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:637: 7.013.024c reṇudhvastam iva jyotiḥ piṅgalatvam upāgatam 7.013.025a tato 'ham anyad vistīrṇaṃ gatvā tasya gires taṭam
GE09ram_07_u:638: 7.013.025c pūrṇaṃ varṣaśatāny aṣṭau samavāpa mahāvratam 7.013.026a samāpte niyame tasmiṃs tatra devo maheśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:639: 7.013.026c prītaḥ prītena manasā prāha vākyam idaṃ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:641: 7.013.027c mayā caitad vrataṃ cīrṇaṃ tvayā caiva dhanādhipa
GE09ram_07_u:642: 7.013.028a tṛtīyaḥ puruṣo nāsti yaś cared vratam īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:643: 7.013.028c vrataṃ suduścaraṃ hy etan mayaivotpāditaṃ purā
GE09ram_07_u:644: 7.013.029a tat sakhitvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ rocayasva dhaneśvara
GE09ram_07_u:645: 7.013.029c tapasā nirjitatvād dhi sakhā bhava mamānagha
GE09ram_07_u:646: 7.013.030a devyā dagdhaṃ prabhāvena yac ca sāvyaṃ tavekṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:647: 7.013.030c ekākṣi piṅgalety eva nāma sthāsyati śāśvatam
GE09ram_07_u:648: 7.013.031a evaṃ tena sakhitvaṃ ca prāpyānujñāṃ ca śaṃkarāt
GE09ram_07_u:649: 7.013.031c āgamya ca śruto 'yaṃ me tava pāpaviniścayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:651: 7.013.032c cintyate hi vadhopāyaḥ sarṣisaṃghaiḥ surais tava
GE09ram_07_u:652: 7.013.033a evam ukto daśagrīvaḥ kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ 7.013.033c hastān dantāṃś a saṃpīḍya vākyam etad uvāca ha 7.013.034a vijñātaṃ te mayā dūta vākyaṃ yat tvaṃ prabhāṣase 7.013.034c naiva tvam asi naivāsau bhrātrā yenāsi preṣitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:653: 7.013.035a hitaṃ na sa mamaitad dhi bravīti dhanarakṣakaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:654: 7.013.035c maheśvarasakhitvaṃ tu mūḍha śrāvayase kila 7.013.036a na hantavyo gurur jyeṣṭho mamāyam iti manyate
GE09ram_07_u:655: 7.013.036c tasya tv idānīṃ śrutvā me vākyam eṣā kṛtā matiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:656: 7.013.037a trīṃl lokān api jeṣyāmi bāhuvīryam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:657: 7.013.037c etan muhūrtam eṣo 'haṃ tasyaikasya kṛte ca vai
GE09ram_07_u:658: 7.013.037e caturo lokapālāṃs tān nayiṣyāmi yamakṣayam 7.013.038a evam uktvā tu laṅkeśo dūtaṃ khaḍgena jaghnivān
GE09ram_07_u:659: 7.013.038c dadau bhakṣayituṃ hy enaṃ rākṣasānāṃ durātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:660: 7.013.039a tataḥ kṛtasvastyayano ratham āruhya rāvaṇaḥ 7.013.039c trailokyavijayākāṅkṣī yayau tatra dhaneśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:661: 7.014.001a tataḥ sa sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaḍbhir nityaṃ balotkaṭaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:662: 7.014.001c mahodaraprahastābhyāṃ mārīcaśukasāraṇaiḥ 7.014.002a dhūmrākṣeṇa ca vīreṇa nityaṃ samaragṛdhnunā 7.014.002c vṛtaḥ saṃprayayau śrīmān krodhāl lokān dahann iva
GE09ram_07_u:663: 7.014.003a purāṇi sa nadīḥ śailān vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:664: 7.014.003c atikramya muhūrtena kailāsaṃ girim āviśat 7.014.004a taṃ niviṣṭaṃ girau tasmin rākṣasendraṃ niśamya tu
GE09ram_07_u:665: 7.014.004c rājño bhrātāyam ity uktvā gatā yatra dhaneśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:666: 7.014.005a gatvā tu sarvam ācakhyur bhrātus tasya viniścayam
GE09ram_07_u:667: 7.014.005c anujñātā yayuś caiva yuddhāya dhanadena te
GE09ram_07_u:668: 7.014.006a tato balasya saṃkṣobhaḥ sāgarasyeva vardhataḥ 7.014.006c abhūn nairṛtarājasya giriṃ saṃcālayann iva 7.014.007a tato yuddhaṃ samabhavad yakṣarākṣasasaṃkulam
GE09ram_07_u:669: 7.014.007c vyathitāś cābhavaṃs tatra sacivās tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:670: 7.014.008a taṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ sainyaṃ daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:671: 7.014.008c harṣān nādaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā roṣāt samabhivartata
GE09ram_07_u:672: 7.014.009a ye tu te rākṣasendrasya sacivā ghoravikramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:673: 7.014.009c te sahasraṃ sahasrāṇām ekaikaṃ samayodhayan 7.014.010a tato gadābhiḥ parighair asibhiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ 7.014.010c vadhyamāno daśagrīvas tat sainyaṃ samagāhata 7.014.011a tair nirucchvāsavat tatra vadhyamāno daśānanaḥ 7.014.011c varṣamāṇair iva ghanair yakṣendraiḥ saṃnirudhyata 7.014.012a sa durātmā samudyamya kāladaṇḍopamāṃ gadām 7.014.012c praviveśa tataḥ sainyaṃ nayan yakṣān yamakṣayam
GE09ram_07_u:674: 7.014.013a sa kakṣam iva vistīrṇaṃ śuṣkendhanasamākulam 7.014.013c vātenāgnir ivāyatto 'dahat sainyaṃ sudāruṇam 7.014.014a tais tu tasya mṛdhe 'mātyair mahodaraśukādibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:675: 7.014.014c alpāvaśiṣṭās te yakṣāḥ kṛtā vātair ivāmbudāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:676: 7.014.015a ke cit tv āyudhabhagnāṅgāḥ patitāḥ samarakṣitau
GE09ram_07_u:677: 7.014.015c oṣṭhān svadaśanais tīkṣṇair daṃśanto bhuvi pātitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:678: 7.014.016a bhayād anyonyam āliṅgya bhraṣṭaśastrā raṇājire 7.014.016c niṣedus te tadā yakṣāḥ kūlā jalahatā iva
GE09ram_07_u:680: 7.014.017c prekṣatām ṛṣisaṃghānāṃ na babhūvāntaraṃ divi 7.014.018a etasminn antare rāma
GE09ram_07_u:681: 7.014.018c agamat sumahān yakṣo nāmnā saṃyodhakaṇṭakaḥ 7.014.019a tena yakṣeṇa mārīco viṣṇuneva samāhataḥ 7.014.019c patitaḥ pṛthivīṃ bheje kṣīṇapuṇya ivāmbarāt 7.014.020a prāptasaṃjño muhūrtena viśramya ca niśācaraḥ 7.014.020c taṃ yakṣaṃ yodhayām āsa sa ca bhagnaḥ pradudruve 7.014.021a tataḥ kāñcanacitrāṅgaṃ vaidūryarajatokṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:682: 7.014.021c maryādāṃ dvārapālānāṃ toraṇaṃ tat samāviśat 7.014.022a tato rāma daśagrīvaṃ praviśantaṃ niśācaram 7.014.022c sūryabhānur iti khyāto dvārapālo nyavārayat 7.014.023a tatas toraṇam utpāṭya tena yakṣeṇa tāḍitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:684: 7.014.023e na kṣitiṃ prayayau rāma varāt salilayoninaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:685: 7.014.024a sa tu tenaiva taṃ yakṣaṃ toraṇena samāhanat
GE09ram_07_u:686: 7.014.024c nādṛśyata tadā yakṣo bhasma tena kṛtas tu saḥ 7.014.025a tataḥ pradudruvuḥ sarve yakṣā dṛṣṭvā parākramam
GE09ram_07_u:687: 7.014.025c tato nadīr guhāś caiva viviśur bhayapīḍitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:688: 7.015.001a tatas tān vidrutān dṛṣṭvā yakṣāñ śatasahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:689: 7.015.001c svayam eva dhanādhyakṣo nirjagāma raṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:690: 7.015.002a tatra māṇicāro nāma yakṣaḥ paramadurjayaḥ 7.015.002c vṛto yakṣasahasraiḥ sa caturbhiḥ samayodhayat 7.015.003a te gadāmusalaprāsaśaktitomaramudgaraiḥ 7.015.003c abhighnanto raṇe yakṣā rākṣasān abhidudruvuḥ 7.015.004a tataḥ prahastena tadā sahasraṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:691: 7.015.004c mahodareṇa gadayā sahasram aparaṃ hatam 7.015.005a kruddhena ca tadā rāma mārīcena
GE09ram_07_u:694: 7.015.006c musalenorasi krodhāt tāḍito na ca kampitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:695: 7.015.007a tato gadāṃ samāvidhya māṇibhadreṇa rākṣasaḥ 7.015.007c dhūmrākṣas tāḍito mūrdhni vihvalo nipapāta ha
GE09ram_07_u:696: 7.015.008a dhūmrākṣaṃ tāḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ śoṇitokṣitam 7.015.008c abhyadhāvat susaṃkruddho māṇibhadraṃ daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:697: 7.015.009a taṃ kruddham abhidhāvantaṃ yugāntāgnim ivotthitam 7.015.009c śaktibhis tāḍayām āsa tisṛbhir yakṣapuṃgavaḥ 7.015.010a tato rākṣasarājena tāḍito gadayā raṇe 7.015.010c tasya tena prahāreṇa mukuṭaḥ pārśvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:698: 7.015.010e tadā prabhṛti yakṣo 'sau pārśvamaulir iti smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:699: 7.015.011a tasmiṃs tu vimukhe yakṣe māṇibhadre mahātmani
GE09ram_07_u:700: 7.015.011c saṃnādaḥ sumahān rāma tasmiñ śaile vyavardhata
GE09ram_07_u:701: 7.015.012a tato dūrāt pradadṛśe dhanādhyakṣo gadādharaḥ 7.015.012c śukraproṣṭaḥpadābhyāṃ ca śaṅkhapadmasamāvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:702: 7.015.013a sa dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ saṃkhye śāpād vibhraṣṭagauravam
GE09ram_07_u:703: 7.015.013c uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān yuktaṃ paitāmahe kule
GE09ram_07_u:704: 7.015.014a mayā tvaṃ vāryamāṇo 'pi nāvagacchasi durmate 7.015.014c paścād asya phalaṃ prāpya jñāsyase nirayaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:705: 7.015.015a yo hi mohād viṣaṃ pītvā nāvagacchati mānavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:706: 7.015.015c pariṇāme sa vi mūḍho jānīte karmaṇaḥ phalam
GE09ram_07_u:707: 7.015.016a daivatāni hi nandanti dharmayuktena kena cit
GE09ram_07_u:708: 7.015.016c yena tvam īdṛśaṃ bhāvaṃ nītas tac ca na budhyase
GE09ram_07_u:709: 7.015.017a yo hi mātṝh pitṝn bhrātṝn ācaryāṃś cāvamanyate
GE09ram_07_u:710: 7.015.017c sa paśyati phalaṃ tasya pretarājavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:711: 7.015.018a adhruve hi śarīre yo na karoti tapo 'rjanam
GE09ram_07_u:712: 7.015.018c sa paścāt tapyate mūḍho mṛto dṛṣṭvātmano gatim
GE09ram_07_u:713: 7.015.019a kasya cin na hi durbudheś chandato jāyate matiḥ 7.015.019c yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ phalam aśnute
GE09ram_07_u:714: 7.015.020a buddhiṃ rūpaṃ balaṃ vittaṃ putrān māhātmyam eva ca 7.015.020c prapnuvanti narāḥ sarvaṃ svakṛtaiḥ pūrvakarmabhiḥ 7.015.021a evaṃ nirayagāmī tvaṃ yasya te matir īdṛśī
GE09ram_07_u:715: 7.015.021c na tvāṃ samabhibhāṣiṣye durvṛttasyaiṣa nirṇayaḥ 7.015.022a evam uktvā tatas tena tasyāmātyāḥ samāhatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:717: 7.015.023a tatas tena daśagrīvo yakṣendreṇa mahātmanā 7.015.023c gadayābhihato mūrdhni na ca sthānād vyakampata
GE09ram_07_u:718: 7.015.024a tatas tau rāma nighnantāv anyonyaṃ paramāhave
GE09ram_07_u:719: 7.015.024c na vihvalau na ca śrāntau babhūvatur amarṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:720: 7.015.025a āgneyam astraṃ sa tato mumoca dhanado raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:721: 7.015.025c vāruṇena daśagrīvas tad astraṃ pratyavārayat 7.015.026a tato māyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa rākṣasīṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:722: 7.015.026c jaghāna mūrdhni dhanadaṃ vyāvidhya mahatīṃ gadām
GE09ram_07_u:723: 7.015.027a evaṃ sa tenābhihato vihvalaḥ śoṇitokṣitaḥ 7.015.027c kṛttamūla ivāśoko nipapāta
GE09ram_07_u:724: 7.015.028a tataḥ padmādibhis tatra nidhibhiḥ sa dhanādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:725: 7.015.028c nandanaṃ vanam ānīya dhanado śvāsitas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:726: 7.015.029a tato nirjitya taṃ rāma dhanadaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:727: 7.015.029c puṣpakaṃ tasya jagrāha vimānaṃ jayalakṣaṇam 7.015.030a kāñcanastambhasaṃvītaṃ vaidūryamaṇitoraṇam 7.015.030c muktājālapraticchannaṃ sarvakāmaphaladrumam 7.015.031a tat tu rājā samāruhya kāmagaṃ vīryanirjitam
GE09ram_07_u:728: 7.015.031c jitvā vaiśravaṇaṃ devaṃ kailāsād avarohata 7.016.001a sa jitvā bhrātaraṃ rāma dhanadaṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:729: 7.016.001c mahāsenaprasūtiṃ tu yayau śaravaṇaṃ tataḥ 7.016.002a athāpaśyad daśagrīvo raukmaṃ śaravaṇaṃ tadā 7.016.002c gabhastijālasaṃvītaṃ dvitīyam iva bhāskaram
GE09ram_07_u:730: 7.016.003a parvataṃ sa samāsādya kiṃ cid ramyavanāntaram
GE09ram_07_u:731: 7.016.003c apaśyat puṣpakaṃ tatra rāma viṣṭambhitaṃ divi
GE09ram_07_u:732: 7.016.004a viṣṭabdhaṃ puṣpakaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmagaṃ hy agamaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:733: 7.016.004c rākṣasaś cintayām āsa sacivais taiḥ samāvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:734: 7.016.005a kim idaṃ yannimittaṃ me na ca gacchati puṣpakam 7.016.005c parvatasyoparisthasya kasya karma tv idaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:736: 7.016.006c naitan niṣkāraṇaṃ rājan puṣpako 'yaṃ na gacchati 7.016.007a tataḥ pārśvam upāgamya bhavasyānucaro balī 7.016.007c nandīśvara uvācedaṃ rākṣasendram aśaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:737: 7.016.008a nivartasva daśagrīva śaile krīḍati śaṃkaraḥ 7.016.009a suparṇanāgayakṣāṇāṃ daityadānavarakṣasām 7.016.009c prāṇinām eva sarveṣām agamyaḥ parvataḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:738: 7.016.010a sa roṣāt tāmranayanaḥ puṣpakād avaruhya ca
GE09ram_07_u:739: 7.016.010c ko 'yaṃ śaṃkara ity uktvā śailamūlam upāgamat 7.016.011a nandīśvaram athāpaśyad avidūrasthitaṃ prabhum
GE09ram_07_u:740: 7.016.011c dīptaṃ śūlam avaṣṭabhya dvitīyam iva śaṃkaram
GE09ram_07_u:741: 7.016.012a sa vānaramukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tam avajñāya rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:742: 7.016.012c prahāsaṃ mumuce maurkhyāt satoya iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:743: 7.016.013a saṃkruddho bhagavān nandī śaṃkarasyāparā tanuḥ 7.016.013c abravīd rākṣasaṃ tatra daśagrīvam upasthitam 7.016.014a yasmād vānaramūrtiṃ māṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasadurmate 7.016.014c maurkhyāt tvam avajānīṣe parihāsaṃ ca muñcasi
GE09ram_07_u:745: 7.016.015c utpatsyante vadhārthaṃ hi kulasya tava vānarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:746: 7.016.016a kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ yat tvāṃ niśācara
GE09ram_07_u:747: 7.016.016c na hantavyo hatas tvaṃ hi pūrvam eva svakarmabhiḥ 7.016.017a acintayitvā sa tadā nandivākyaṃ niśācaraḥ 7.016.017c parvataṃ taṃ samāsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:748: 7.016.018a puṣpakasya gatiś chinnā yatkṛte mama gacchataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:749: 7.016.018c tad etac chailam unmūlaṃ karomi tava gopate
GE09ram_07_u:750: 7.016.019a kena prabhāvena bhavas tatra krīḍati rājavat
GE09ram_07_u:751: 7.016.019c vijñātavyaṃ na jānīṣe bhayasthānam upasthitam 7.016.020a evam uktvā tato rājan bhujān prakṣipya parvate
GE09ram_07_u:752: 7.016.020c tolayām āsa taṃ śailaṃ samṛgavyālapādapam 7.016.021a tato rāma mahādevaḥ prahasan vīkṣya tatkṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:753: 7.016.021c pādāṅguṣṭhena taṃ śailaṃ pīḍayām āsa līlayā
GE09ram_07_u:754: 7.016.022a tatas te pīḍitās tasya śailasyādho gatā bhujāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:755: 7.016.022c vismitāś cābhavaṃs tatra sacivās tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:756: 7.016.023a rakṣasā tena roṣāc ca bhujānāṃ pīḍanāt tathā
GE09ram_07_u:757: 7.016.023c mukto virāvaḥ sumahāṃs trailokyaṃ yena pūritam
GE09ram_07_u:759: 7.016.024c devatāś cāpi saṃkṣubdhāś calitāḥ sveṣu karmasu
GE09ram_07_u:760: 7.016.025a tataḥ prīto mahādevaḥ śailāgre viṣṭhitas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:761: 7.016.025c muktvā tasya bhujān rājan prāha vākyaṃ daśānanam
GE09ram_07_u:762: 7.016.026a prīto 'smi tava vīryāc ca śauṇḍīryāc ca niśācara
GE09ram_07_u:763: 7.016.026c ravato vedanā muktaḥ svaraḥ paramadāruṇaḥ 7.016.027a yasmāl lokatrayaṃ tv etad rāvitaṃ bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_07_u:764: 7.016.027c tasmāt tvaṃ rāvaṇo nāma nāmnā tena bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:765: 7.016.028a devatā mānuṣā yakṣā ye cānye jagatītale
GE09ram_07_u:766: 7.016.028c evaṃ tvām abhidhāsyanti rāvaṇaṃ lokarāvaṇam 7.016.029a gaccha paulastya visrabdhaḥ pathā yena tvam icchasi
GE09ram_07_u:767: 7.016.029c mayā tvam abhyanujñāto rākṣasādhipa gamyatām 7.016.030a sākṣān maheśvareṇaivaṃ kṛtanāmā sa rāvaṇaḥ 7.016.030c abhivādya mahādevaṃ vimānaṃ tat samāruhat 7.016.031a tato mahītale rāma paricakrāma rāvaṇaḥ 7.016.031c kṣatriyān sumahāvīryān bādhamānas tatas tataḥ 7.017.001a atha rājan mahābāhur vicaran sa mahītalam
GE09ram_07_u:770: 7.017.002c ārṣeṇa vidhinā yuktāṃ tapantīṃ devatām iva
GE09ram_07_u:771: 7.017.003a sa dṛṣṭvā rūpasaṃpannāṃ kanyāṃ tāṃ sumahāvratām
GE09ram_07_u:773: 7.017.004a kim idaṃ vartase bhadre viruddhaṃ yauvanasya te
GE09ram_07_u:774: 7.017.004c na hi yuktā tavaitasya rūpasyeyaṃ pratikriyā
GE09ram_07_u:775: 7.017.005a kasyāsi duhitā bhadre ko vā bhartā tavānaghe
GE09ram_07_u:776: 7.017.005c pṛcchataḥ śaṃsa me śīghraṃ ko vā hetus tapo'rjane
GE09ram_07_u:777: 7.017.006a evam uktā tu sā kanyā tenānāryeṇa rakṣasā
GE09ram_07_u:778: 7.017.006c abravīd vidhivat kṛtvā tasyātithyaṃ tapodhanā 7.017.007a kuśadhvajo nāma pitā brahmarṣir mama dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:779: 7.017.007c bṛhaspatisutaḥ śrīmān buddhyā tulyo bṛhaspateḥ 7.017.008a tasyāhaṃ kurvato nityaṃ vedābhyāsaṃ mahātmanaḥ 7.017.008c saṃbhūtā vānmayī kanyā nāmnā vedavatī smṛtā
GE09ram_07_u:781: 7.017.009c te cāpi gatvā pitaraṃ varaṇaṃ rocayanti me
GE09ram_07_u:782: 7.017.010a na ca māṃ sa pitā tebhyo dattavān rākṣaseśvara 7.017.010c kāraṇaṃ tad vadiṣyāmi niśāmaya mahābhuja 7.017.011a pitus tu mama jāmātā viṣṇuḥ kila surottamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:783: 7.017.011c abhipretas trilokeśas tasmān nānyasya me pitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:784: 7.017.012a dātum icchati dharmātmā tac chrutvā baladarpitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:785: 7.017.012c śambhur nāma tato rājā daityānāṃ kupito 'bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:786: 7.017.012e tena rātrau prasupto me pitā pāpena hiṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:787: 7.017.013a tato me jananī dīnā tac charīraṃ pitur mama 7.017.013c pariṣvajya mahābhāgā praviṣṭā dahanaṃ saha 7.017.014a tato manorathaṃ satyaṃ pitur nārāyaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:788: 7.017.014c karomīti mamecchā ca hṛdaye sādhu viṣṭhitā
GE09ram_07_u:789: 7.017.015a ahaṃ pretagatasyāpi kariṣye kāṅkṣitaṃ pituḥ 7.017.015c iti pratijñām āruhya carāmi vipulaṃ tapaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:790: 7.017.016a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ mayā rākṣasapuṃgava
GE09ram_07_u:791: 7.017.016c āśritāṃ viddhi māṃ dharmaṃ nārāyaṇapatīcchayā 7.017.017a vijñātas tvaṃ hi me rājan gaccha paulastyanandana
GE09ram_07_u:792: 7.017.017c jānāmi tapasā sarvaṃ trailokye yad dhi vartate
GE09ram_07_u:793: 7.017.018a so 'bravīd rāvaṇas tatra tāṃ kanyāṃ sumahāvratām 7.017.018c avaruhya vimānāgrāt
GE09ram_07_u:794: 7.017.019a avaliptāsi suśroṇi yasyās te matir īdṛśī
GE09ram_07_u:796: 7.017.020a tvaṃ sarvaguṇasaṃpannā nārhase kartum īdṛśam 7.017.020c trailokyasundarī bhīru yauvane vārdhakaṃ vidhim 7.017.021a kaś ca tāvad asau yaṃ tvaṃ viṣṇur ity abhibhāṣase
GE09ram_07_u:797: 7.017.021c vīryeṇa tapasā caiva bhogena ca balena ca
GE09ram_07_u:798: 7.017.021e na mayāsau samo bhadre yaṃ tvaṃ kāmayase 'ṅgane
GE09ram_07_u:799: 7.017.022a ma maivam iti sā kanyā tam uvāca niśācaram 7.017.022c mūrdhajeṣu ca tāṃ rakṣaḥ karāgreṇa parāmṛśat
GE09ram_07_u:800: 7.017.023a tato vedavatī kruddhā keśān hastena sācchinat
GE09ram_07_u:802: 7.017.024a dharṣitāyās tvayānārya nedānīṃ mama jīvitam 7.017.024c rakṣas tasmāt pravekṣyāmi paśyatas te hutāśanam
GE09ram_07_u:803: 7.017.025a yasmāt tu dharṣitā cāham apāpā cāpy anāthavat
GE09ram_07_u:804: 7.017.025c tasmāt tava vadhārthaṃ vai samutpatsyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:805: 7.017.026a na hi śakyaḥ striyā pāpa hantuṃ tvaṃ tu viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:806: 7.017.026c śāpe tvayi mayotsṛṣṭe tapasaś ca vyayo bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:807: 7.017.027a yadi tv asti mayā kiṃ cit kṛtaṃ dattaṃ hutaṃ tathā
GE09ram_07_u:808: 7.017.027c tena hy ayonijā sādhvī bhaveyaṃ dharmiṇaḥ sutā
GE09ram_07_u:809: 7.017.028a evam uktvā praviṣṭā sā jvalantaṃ vai hutāśanam
GE09ram_07_u:810: 7.017.028c papāta ca divo divyā puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:811: 7.017.029a pūrvaṃ krodhahataḥ śatrur yayāsau nihatas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:812: 7.017.029c samupāśritya śailābhaṃ tava vīryam amānuṣam 7.017.030a evam eṣā mahābhāgā martyeṣūtpadyate punaḥ 7.017.030c kṣetre halamukhagraste vedyām agniśikhopamā
GE09ram_07_u:813: 7.017.031a eṣā vedavatī nāma pūrvam āsīt kṛte yuge
GE09ram_07_u:814: 7.017.031c tretāyugam anuprāpya vadhārthaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ 7.017.031e sītotpanneti sītaiṣā mānuṣaiḥ punar ucyate 7.018.001a praviṣṭāyāaṃ hutāśaṃ tu vedavatyāṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:815: 7.018.001c puṣpakaṃ tat samāruhya paricakrāma medinīm 7.018.002a tato maruttaṃ nṛpatiṃ yajantaṃ saha daivataiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:816: 7.018.002c uśīrabījam āsādya dadarśa sa tu rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:817: 7.018.003a saṃvarto nāma brahmarṣir bhrātā sākṣād bṛhaspateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:818: 7.018.003c yājayām āsa dharmajñaḥ sarvair brahmagaṇair vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:819: 7.018.004a dṛṣṭvā devās tu tad rakṣo varadānena durjayam
GE09ram_07_u:820: 7.018.004c tāṃ tāṃ yoniṃ samāpannās tasya dharṣaṇabhīravaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:821: 7.018.005a indro mayūraḥ saṃvṛtto dharmarājas tu vāyasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:823: 7.018.006a taṃ ca rājānam āsādya rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:824: 7.018.006c prāha yuddhaṃ prayacceti nirjito 'smīti vā vada 7.018.007a tato marutto nṛpatiḥ ko bhavān ity uvāca tam 7.018.007c avahāsaṃ tato muktvā rākṣaso vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:825: 7.018.008a akutūhalabhāvena prīto 'smi tava pārthiva 7.018.008c dhanadasyānujaṃ yo māṃ nāvagacchasi rāvaṇam 7.018.009a triṣu lokeṣu kaḥ so 'sti yo na jānāti me balam 7.018.009c bhrātaraṃ yena nirjitya vimānam idam āhṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:826: 7.018.010a tato marutto nṛpatis taṃ rākṣasam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:827: 7.018.010c dhanyaḥ khalu bhavān yena jyeṣṭho bhrātā raṇe jitaḥ 7.018.011a nādharmasahitaṃ ślāghyaṃ na lokapratisaṃhitam
GE09ram_07_u:828: 7.018.011c karma daurātmyakaṃ kṛtvā ślāghase bhrātṛnirjayāt 7.018.012a kiṃ tvaṃ prāk kevalaṃ dharmaṃ caritvā labdhavān varam 7.018.012c śrutapūrvaṃ hi na mayā yādṛśaṃ bhāṣase svayam
GE09ram_07_u:829: 7.018.013a tataḥ śarāsanaṃ gṛhya sāyakāṃś ca sa pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:830: 7.018.013c raṇāya niryayau kruddhaḥ saṃvarto mārgam āvṛṇot
GE09ram_07_u:831: 7.018.014a so 'bravīt snehasaṃyuktaṃ maruttaṃ taṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ 7.018.014c śrotavyaṃ yadi madvākyaṃ saṃprahāro na te kṣamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:832: 7.018.015a māheśvaram idaṃ satram asamāptaṃ kulaṃ dahet
GE09ram_07_u:833: 7.018.015c dīkṣitasya kuto yuddhaṃ krūratvaṃ dīkṣite kutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:834: 7.018.016a saṃśayaś ca raṇe nityaṃ rākṣasaś caiṣa durjayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:835: 7.018.016c sa nivṛtto guror vākyān maruttaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:837: 7.018.017a tatas taṃ nirjitaṃ matvā ghoṣayām āsa vai śukaḥ 7.018.017c rāvaṇo jitavāṃś ceti harṣān nādaṃ ca muktavān
GE09ram_07_u:838: 7.018.018a tān bhakṣayitvā tatrasthān maharṣīn yajñam āgatān
GE09ram_07_u:839: 7.018.018c vitṛpto rudhirais teṣāṃ punaḥ saṃprayayau mahīm
GE09ram_07_u:840: 7.018.019a rāvaṇe tu gate devāḥ sendrāś caiva divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:841: 7.018.019c tataḥ svāṃ yonim āsādya tāni sattvāny athābruvan
GE09ram_07_u:842: 7.018.020a harṣāt tadābravīd indro mayūraṃ nīlabarhiṇam 7.018.020c prīto 'smi tava dharmajña upakārād vihaṃgama
GE09ram_07_u:843: 7.018.021a mama netrasahasraṃ yat tat te barhe bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:844: 7.018.021c varṣamāṇe mayi mudaṃ prāpsyase prītilakṣaṇam 7.018.022a nīlāḥ kila purā barhā mayūrāṇāṃ narādhipa
GE09ram_07_u:845: 7.018.022c surādhipād varaṃ prāpya gatāḥ sarve vicitratām
GE09ram_07_u:847: 7.018.023c pakṣiṃs tavāsmi suprītaḥ prītasya ca vacaḥ śṛṇu
GE09ram_07_u:848: 7.018.024a yathānye vividhai rogaiḥ pīḍyante prāṇino mayā
GE09ram_07_u:849: 7.018.024c te na te prabhaviṣyanti mayi prīte na saṃśayaḥ 7.018.025a mṛtyutas te bhayaṃ nāsti varān mama vihaṃgama
GE09ram_07_u:850: 7.018.025c yāvat tvāṃ na vadhiṣyanti narās tāvad bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:851: 7.018.026a ye ca madviṣayasthās tu mānavāḥ kṣudhayārditāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:852: 7.018.026c tvayi bhukte tu tṛptās te bhaviṣyanti sabāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:853: 7.018.027a varuṇas tv abravīd dhaṃsaṃ gaṅgātoyavicāriṇam 7.018.027c śrūyatāṃ prītisaṃyuktaṃ vacaḥ patraratheśvara
GE09ram_07_u:856: 7.018.029a maccharīraṃ samāsādya kānto nityaṃ bhaviṣyasi 7.018.029c prāpsyase cātulāṃ prītim etan me prītilakṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:857: 7.018.030a haṃsānāṃ hi purā rāma na varṇaḥ sarvapāṇḍuraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:859: 7.018.031a athābravīd vaiśravaṇaḥ kṛkalāsaṃ girau sthitam 7.018.031c hairaṇyaṃ saṃprayacchāmi varṇaṃ prītis tavāpy aham
GE09ram_07_u:860: 7.018.032a sadravyaṃ ca śiro nityaṃ bhaviṣyati tavākṣayam
GE09ram_07_u:861: 7.018.032c eṣa kāñcanako varṇo matprītyā te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:862: 7.018.033a evaṃ dattvā varāṃs tebhyas tasmin yajñotsave surāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:863: 7.018.033c nivṛtte saha rājñā vai punaḥ svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:864: 7.019.001a atha jitvā maruttaṃ sa prayayau rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:867: 7.019.002c abravīd rākṣasendras tu yuddhaṃ me dīyatām iti
GE09ram_07_u:868: 7.019.003a nirjitāḥ smeti vā brūta eṣo hi mama niścayaḥ 7.019.003c anyathā kurvatām evaṃ mokṣo vo nopapadyate
GE09ram_07_u:869: 7.019.004a tatas tu bahavaḥ prājñāḥ pārthivā dharmaṇiścayāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:870: 7.019.004c nirjitāḥ smety abhāṣanta jñātvā varabalaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:871: 7.019.005a duṣyantaḥ suratho gādhir gayo rājā purūravāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:872: 7.019.005c ete sarve 'bruvaṃs tāta nirjitāḥ smeti pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:875: 7.019.007a prāha rājānam āsādya yuddhaṃ me saṃpradīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:876: 7.019.007c nirjito 'smīti vā brūhi mamaitad iha śāsanam 7.019.008a anaraṇyaḥ susaṃkruddho rākṣasendram athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:877: 7.019.008c dīyate dvandvayuddhaṃ te rākṣasādhipate mayā 7.019.009a atha pūrvaṃ śrutārthena sajjitaṃ sumahad dhi yat
GE09ram_07_u:878: 7.019.009c niṣkrāmat tan narendrasya balaṃ rakṣovadhodyatam 7.019.010a nāgānāṃ bahusāhasraṃ vājinām ayutaṃ tathā 7.019.010c mahīṃ saṃchādya niṣkrāntaṃ sapadātirathaṃ kṣaṇāt 7.019.011a tad rāvaṇabalaṃ prāpya balaṃ tasya mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:879: 7.019.011c prāṇaśyata tadā rājan havyaṃ hutam ivānale
GE09ram_07_u:880: 7.019.012a so 'paśyata narendras tu naśyamānaṃ mahad balam 7.019.012c mahārṇavaṃ samāsādya yathā pañcāpagā jalam 7.019.013a tataḥ śakradhanuḥprakhyaṃ dhanur visphārayan svayam 7.019.013c āsadāda narendrās taṃ rāvaṇaṃ krodhamūrchitaḥ 7.019.014a tato bāṇaśatāny aṣṭau pātayām āsa mūrdhani
GE09ram_07_u:882: 7.019.015a tasya bāṇāḥ patantas te cakrire na kṣataṃ kva cit
GE09ram_07_u:884: 7.019.016a tato rākṣasarājena kruddhena nṛpatis tadā 7.019.016c talena bhihato mūrdhni sa rathān nipapāta ha
GE09ram_07_u:885: 7.019.017a sa rājā patito bhūmau vihvalāṅgaḥ pravepitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:886: 7.019.017c vajradagdha ivāraṇye sālo nipatito mahān 7.019.018a taṃ prahasyābravīd rakṣa ikṣvākuṃ pṛthivīpatim 7.019.018c kim idānīṃ tvayā prāptaṃ phalaṃ māṃ prati yudhyatā 7.019.019a trailokye nāsti yo dvandvaṃ mama dadyān narādhipa
GE09ram_07_u:887: 7.019.019c śaṅke pramatto bhogeṣu na śṛṇoṣi balaṃ mama
