GE09ram_07_u:888: 7.019.020a tasyaivaṃ bruvato rājā mandāsur vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:889: 7.019.020c kiṃ śakyam iha kartuṃ vai yat kālo duratikramaḥ 7.019.021a na hy ahaṃ nirjito rakṣas tvayā cātmapraśaṃsinā
GE09ram_07_u:890: 7.019.021c kāleneha vipanno 'haṃ hetubhūtas tu me bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:891: 7.019.022a kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ prāṇaparikṣaye
GE09ram_07_u:893: 7.019.023a yadi dattaṃ yadi hutaṃ yadi me sukṛtaṃ tapaḥ 7.019.023c yadi guptāḥ prajāḥ samyak tathā satyaṃ vaco 'stu me
GE09ram_07_u:894: 7.019.024a utpatsyate kule hy asminn ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:895: 7.019.024c rājā paramatejasvī yas te prāṇān hariṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:897: 7.019.025c tasminn udāhṛte śāpe puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca khāc cyutā
GE09ram_07_u:898: 7.019.026a tataḥ sa rājā rājendra gataḥ sthānaṃ triviṣṭapam
GE09ram_07_u:899: 7.019.026c svargate ca nṛpe rāma rākṣasaḥ sa nyavartata
GE09ram_07_u:900: 7.020.001a tato vitrāsayan martyān pṛthivyāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ 7.020.001c āsasāda ghane tasmin nāradaṃ munisattamam 7.020.002a nāradas tu mahātejā devarṣir amitaprabhaḥ 7.020.002c abravīn meghapṛṣṭhastho rāvaṇaṃ puṣpake sthitam 7.020.003a rākṣasādhipate saumya tiṣṭha viśravasaḥ suta 7.020.003c prīto 'smy abhijanopeta vikramair ūrjitais tava
GE09ram_07_u:902: 7.020.004c tvayā samaramardaiś ca bhṛśaṃ hi paritoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:903: 7.020.005a kiṃ cid vakṣyāmi tāvat te śrotavyaṃ śroṣyase yadi 7.020.005c śrutvā cānantaraṃ kāryaṃ tvayā rākṣasapuṃgava 7.020.006a kim ayaṃ vadhyate lokas tvayāvadhyena daivataiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:904: 7.020.006c hata eva hy ayaṃ loko yadā mṛtyuvaśaṃ gataḥ 7.020.007a paśya tāvan mahābāho
GE09ram_07_u:905: 7.020.007c lokam enaṃ vicitrārthaṃ yasya na jñāyate gatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:906: 7.020.008a kva cid vāditranṛttāni sevyante muditair janaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:909: 7.020.009c mohenāyaṃ jano dhvastaḥ kleśaṃ svaṃ nāvabudhyate
GE09ram_07_u:910: 7.020.010a tat kim evaṃ parikliśya lokaṃ mohanirākṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:911: 7.020.010c jita eva tvayā saumya martyaloko na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:912: 7.020.011a evam uktas tu laṅkeśo dīpyamāna ivaujasā
GE09ram_07_u:913: 7.020.011c abravīn nāradaṃ tatra saṃprahasyābhivādya ca 7.020.012a maharṣe devagandharvavihāra
GE09ram_07_u:914: 7.020.012c ahaṃ khalūdyato gantuṃ vijayārthī rasātalam 7.020.013a tato lokatrayaṃ jitvā sthāpya nāgān surān vaśe
GE09ram_07_u:915: 7.020.013c samudram amṛtārthaṃ vai mathiṣyāmi rasālayam 7.020.014a athābravīd daśagrīvaṃ nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ 7.020.014c kva khalv idānīṃ mārgeṇa tvayānena gamiṣyate
GE09ram_07_u:916: 7.020.015a ayaṃ khalu sudurgamyaḥ pitṛrājñaḥ puraṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:918: 7.020.016a sa tu śāradameghābhaṃ muktvā hāsaṃ daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:919: 7.020.016c uvāca kṛtam ity eva vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:921: 7.020.017c gacchāmi dakṣiṇām āśāṃ yatra sūryātmajo nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:922: 7.020.018a mayā hi bhagavan krodhāt pratijñātaṃ raṇārthinā
GE09ram_07_u:923: 7.020.018c avajeṣyāmi caturo lokapālān iti prabho 7.020.019a tenaiṣa prasthito 'haṃ vai pitṛrājapuraṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:925: 7.020.020a evam uktvā daśagrīvo muniṃ tam abhivādya ca
GE09ram_07_u:926: 7.020.020c prayayau dakṣiṇām āśāṃ prahṛṣṭaiḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:927: 7.020.021a nāradas tu mahātejā muhūrtaṃ dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:928: 7.020.021c cintayām āsa viprendro vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:929: 7.020.022a yena lokās trayaḥ sendrāḥ kliśyante sacarācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:930: 7.020.022c kṣīṇe cāyuṣi dharme ca sa kālo hiṃsyate katham 7.020.023a yasya nityaṃ trayo lokā vidravanti bhayārditāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:931: 7.020.023c taṃ kathaṃ rākṣasendro 'sau svayam evābhigacchati 7.020.024a yo vidhātā ca dhātā ca sukṛte duṣkṛte yathā 7.020.024c trailokyaṃ vijitaṃ yena taṃ kathaṃ nu vijeṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:932: 7.020.025a aparaṃ kiṃ nu kṛtvaivaṃ vidhānaṃ saṃvidhāsyati
GE09ram_07_u:934: 7.021.001a evaṃ saṃcintya viprendro jagāma laghuvikramaḥ 7.021.001c ākhyātuṃ tad yathāvṛttaṃ yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:935: 7.021.002a apaśyat sa yamaṃ tatra devam agnipuraskṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:936: 7.021.002c vidhānam upatiṣṭhantaṃ prāṇino yasya yādṛśam 7.021.003a sa tu dṛṣṭvā yamaḥ prāptaṃ maharṣiṃ tatra nāradam 7.021.003c abravīt sukham āsīnam arghyam āvedya dharmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:937: 7.021.004a kaccit kṣemaṃ nu devarṣe kaccid dharmo na naśyati 7.021.004c kim āgamanakṛtyaṃ te devagandharvasevita
GE09ram_07_u:938: 7.021.005a abravīt tu tadā vākyaṃ nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:939: 7.021.005c śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi vidhānaṃ ca vidhīyatām 7.021.006a eṣa nāmnā daśagrīvaḥ pitṛrāja niśācaraḥ 7.021.006c upayāti vaśaṃ netuṃ vikramais tvāṃ sudurjayam
GE09ram_07_u:940: 7.021.007a etena kāraṇenāhaṃ tvarito 'smy āgataḥ prabho 7.021.007c daṇḍapraharaṇasyādya tava kiṃ nu kariṣyati 7.021.008a etasminn antare dūrād aṃśumantam ivoditam 7.021.008c dadṛśe divyam āyāntaṃ vimānaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:941: 7.021.009a taṃ deśaṃ prabhayā tasya puṣpakasya mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:942: 7.021.009c kṛtvā vitimiraṃ sarvaṃ samīpaṃ samavartata 7.021.010a sa tv apaśyan mahābāhur daśagrīvas tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:943: 7.021.010c prāṇinaḥ sukṛtaṃ karma bhuñjānāṃś caiva duṣkṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:944: 7.021.011a tatas tān vadhyamānāṃs tu karmabhir duṣkṛtaiḥ svakaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:945: 7.021.011c rāvaṇo mocayām āsa vikrameṇa balād balī
GE09ram_07_u:948: 7.021.013a te prāsaiḥ parighaiḥ śūlair mudgaraiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:951: 7.021.014c puṣpakasya babhañjus te śīghraṃ madhukarā iva
GE09ram_07_u:952: 7.021.015a devaniṣṭhānabhūtaṃ tad vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ mṛdhe 7.021.015c bhajyamānaṃ tathaivāsīd akṣayaṃ brahmatejasā
GE09ram_07_u:953: 7.021.016a tatas te rāvaṇāmātyā yathākāmaṃ yathābalam 7.021.016c ayudhyanta mahāvīryāḥ sa ca rājā daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:955: 7.021.017c amātyā rākṣasendrasya cakrur āyodhanaṃ mahat 7.021.018a anyonyaṃ ca mahābhāgā jaghnuḥ praharaṇair yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:956: 7.021.018c yamasya ca mahat sainyaṃ rākṣasasya ca mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:957: 7.021.019a amātyāṃs tāṃs tu saṃtyajya rākṣasasya mahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:958: 7.021.019c tam eva samadhāvanta śūlavarṣair daśānanam 7.021.020a tataḥ śoṇitadigdhāṅgaḥ prahārair jarjarīkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:960: 7.021.021a sa śūlāni gadāḥ prāsāñ śaktitomarasāyakān 7.021.021c musalāni śilāvṛkṣān mumocāstrabalād
GE09ram_07_u:961: 7.021.022a tāṃs tu sarvān samākṣipya tad astram apahatya ca 7.021.022c jaghnus te rākṣasaṃ ghoram ekaṃ śatasahasrakaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:962: 7.021.023a parivārya ca taṃ sarve śailaṃ meghotkarā iva
GE09ram_07_u:963: 7.021.023c bhindipālaiś ca śūlaiś ca nirucchvāsam akārayan
GE09ram_07_u:965: 7.021.024c sa puṣpakaṃ parityajya pṛthivyām avatiṣṭhata 7.021.025a tataḥ sa kārmukī bāṇī pṛthivyāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:966: 7.021.025c labdhasaṃjño muhūrtena kruddhas tasthau yathāntakaḥ 7.021.026a tataḥ pāśupataṃ divyam astraṃ saṃdhāya kārmuke
GE09ram_07_u:967: 7.021.026c tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti tān uktvā tac cāpaṃ vyapakarṣata
GE09ram_07_u:968: 7.021.027a jvālāmālī sa tu śaraḥ kravyādānugato raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:969: 7.021.027c mukto gulmān drumāṃś caiva bhasmakṛtvā pradhāvati
GE09ram_07_u:970: 7.021.028a te tasya tejasā dagdhāḥ sainyā vaivasvatasya tu
GE09ram_07_u:971: 7.021.028c raṇe tasmin nipatitā dāvadagdhā nagā iva
GE09ram_07_u:972: 7.021.029a tataḥ sa sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ rākṣaso bhīmavikramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:973: 7.021.029c nanāda sumahānādaṃ kampayann iva medinīm 7.022.001a sa tu tasya mahānādaṃ śrutvā vaivasvato yamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:974: 7.022.001c śatruṃ vijayinaṃ mene svabalasya ca saṃkṣayam
GE09ram_07_u:975: 7.022.002a sa tu yodhān hatān matvā krodhaparyākulekṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:976: 7.022.002c abravīt tvaritaṃ sūtaṃ rathaḥ samupanīyatām 7.022.003a tasya sūto rathaṃ divyam upasthāpya mahāsvanam
GE09ram_07_u:977: 7.022.003c sthitaḥ sa ca mahātejā āruroha mahāratham
GE09ram_07_u:978: 7.022.004a pāśamudgarahastaś ca mṛtyus tasyāgrato sthitaḥ 7.022.004c yena saṃkṣipyate sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram 7.022.005a kāladaṇḍaś ca pārśvastho mūrtimān syandane sthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:979: 7.022.005c yamapraharaṇaṃ divyaṃ prajvalann iva tejasā 7.022.006a tato lokās trayas trastāḥ kampante ca divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:980: 7.022.006c kālaṃ kruddhaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā lokatrayabhayāvaham 7.022.007a dṛṣṭvā tu te taṃ vikṛtaṃ rathaṃ mṛtyusamanvitam
GE09ram_07_u:983: 7.022.008c nātra yoddhuṃ samarthāḥ sma ity uktvā vipradudruvuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:984: 7.022.009a sa tu taṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathaṃ lokabhayāvaham
GE09ram_07_u:985: 7.022.009c nākṣubhyata tadā rakṣo vyathā caivāsya nābhavat
GE09ram_07_u:986: 7.022.010a sa tu rāvaṇam āsādya visṛjañ śaktitomarān
GE09ram_07_u:987: 7.022.010c yamo marmāṇi saṃkruddho rākṣasasya nyakṛntata 7.022.011a rāvaṇas tu sthitaḥ svasthaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha
GE09ram_07_u:990: 7.022.012c pratikartuṃ sa nāśaknod rākṣasaḥ śalyapīḍitaḥ 7.022.013a nānāpraharaṇair evaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:991: 7.022.013c saptarātraṃ kṛte saṃkhye na bhagno vijito 'pi vā
GE09ram_07_u:994: 7.022.015a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:995: 7.022.015c prajāpatiṃ puraskṛtya dadṛśus tad raṇājiram 7.022.016a saṃvarta iva lokānām abhavad yudhyatos tayoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:996: 7.022.016c rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pretānām īśvarasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:997: 7.022.017a rākṣasendras tataḥ kruddhaś cāpam āyamya saṃyuge
GE09ram_07_u:998: 7.022.017c nirantaram ivākāśaṃ kurvan bāṇān mumoca ha
GE09ram_07_u:999: 7.022.018a mṛtyuṃ caturbhir viśikhaiḥ sūtaṃ saptabhir ardayat
GE09ram_07_u:1000: 7.022.018c yamaṃ śarasahasreṇa śīghraṃ marmasv atāḍayat 7.022.019a tataḥ kruddhasya sahasā
GE09ram_07_u:1002: 7.022.020a tato 'paśyaṃs tadāścaryaṃ devadānavarākṣasāḥ 7.022.020c krodhajaṃ pāvakaṃ dīptaṃ didhakṣantaṃ ripor balam
GE09ram_07_u:1003: 7.022.021a mṛtyus tu paramakruddho vaivasvatam athābravīt 7.022.021c muñca māṃ deva śīghraṃ tvaṃ nihanmi samare ripum 7.022.022a narakaḥ śambaro vṛtraḥ śambhuḥ kārtasvaro balī
GE09ram_07_u:1004: 7.022.022c namucir virocanaś caiva tāv ubhau madhukaiṭabhau
GE09ram_07_u:1005: 7.022.023a ete cānye ca bahavo balavanto durāsadāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1006: 7.022.023c vinipannā mayā dṛṣṭāḥ kā cintāsmin niśācare
GE09ram_07_u:1007: 7.022.024a muñca māṃ sādhu dharmajña yāvad enaṃ nihanmy aham 7.022.024c na hi kaś cin mayā dṛṣṭo muhūrtam api jīvati
GE09ram_07_u:1008: 7.022.025a balaṃ mama na khalv etan maryādaiṣā nisargataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1009: 7.022.025c saṃspṛṣṭo hi mayā kaś cin na jīved iti niścayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1010: 7.022.026a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā dharmarājaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_07_u:1011: 7.022.026c abravīt tatra taṃ mṛtyumayam enaṃ nihanmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:1012: 7.022.027a tataḥ saṃraktanayanaḥ kruddho vaivasvataḥ prabhuḥ 7.022.027c kāladaṇḍam amoghaṃ taṃ tolayām āsa pāṇinā
GE09ram_07_u:1013: 7.022.028a yasya pārśveṣu niśchidrāḥ kālapāśāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ 7.022.028c pāvakasparśasaṃkāśo mudgaro mūrtimān sthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1014: 7.022.029a darśanād eva yaḥ prāṇān prāṇinām uparudhyati
GE09ram_07_u:1015: 7.022.029c kiṃ punas tāḍanād vāpi pīḍanād vāpi dehinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1016: 7.022.030a sa jvālāparivāras tu pibann iva niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:1017: 7.022.030c karaspṛṣṭo balavatā daṇḍaḥ kruddhaḥ sudāruṇaḥ 7.022.031a tato vidudruvuḥ sarve sattvās tasmād raṇājirāt
GE09ram_07_u:1018: 7.022.031c surāś ca kṣubhitā dṛṣṭvā kāladaṇḍodyataṃ yamam
GE09ram_07_u:1019: 7.022.032a tasmin prahartukāme tu daṇḍam udyamya rāvaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:1020: 7.022.032c yamaṃ pitāmahaḥ sākṣād darśayitvedam abravīt 7.022.033a vaivasvata mahābāho na khalv atulavikrama 7.022.033c prahartavyaṃ tvayaitena daṇḍenāsmin niśācare
GE09ram_07_u:1021: 7.022.034a varaḥ khalu mayā dattas tasya tridaśapuṃgava
GE09ram_07_u:1022: 7.022.034c tat tvayā nānṛtaṃ kāryaṃ yan mayā vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ 7.022.035a amogho hy eṣa sarvāsāṃ prajānāṃ vinipātane
GE09ram_07_u:1023: 7.022.035c kāladaṇḍo mayā sṛṣṭaḥ pūrvaṃ mṛtyupuraskṛtaḥ 7.022.036a tan na khalv eṣa te saumya pātyo rākṣasamūrdhani 7.022.036c na hy asmin patite kaś cin muhūrtam api jīvati
GE09ram_07_u:1024: 7.022.037a yadi hy asmin nipatite na mriyetaiṣa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1026: 7.022.038a rākṣasendrān niyacchādya daṇḍam enaṃ vadhodyatam 7.022.038c satyaṃ mama kuruṣvedaṃ lokāṃs tvaṃ samavekṣya ca
GE09ram_07_u:1027: 7.022.039a evam uktas tu dharmātmā pratyuvāca yamas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:1028: 7.022.039c eṣa vyāvartito daṇḍaḥ prabhaviṣṇur bhavān hi naḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1029: 7.022.040a kiṃ tv idānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ raṇagatena hi 7.022.040c yan mayā yan na hantavyo rākṣaso varadarpitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1030: 7.022.041a eṣa tasmāt praṇaśyāmi darśanād asya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1031: 7.022.041c ity uktvā sarathaḥ sāśvas tatraivāntaradhīyata 7.022.042a daśagrīvas tu taṃ jitvā nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1032: 7.022.042c puṣpakeṇa tu saṃhṛṣṭo niṣkrānto yamasādanāt 7.022.043a tato vaivasvato devaiḥ saha brahmapurogamaiḥ 7.022.043c jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭo nāradaś ca mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1033: 7.023.001a sa tu jitvā daśagrīvo yamaṃ tridaśapuṃgavam
GE09ram_07_u:1034: 7.023.001c rāvaṇas tu jayaślāghī svasahāyān dadarśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:1035: 7.023.002a jayena vardhayitvā ca mārīcapramukhās tataḥ 7.023.002c puṣpakaṃ bhejire sarve sāntvitā ravaṇena ha
GE09ram_07_u:1036: 7.023.003a tato rasātalaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ payaso nidhim
GE09ram_07_u:1038: 7.023.004a sa tu bhogavatīṃ gatvā purīṃ vāsukipālitām
GE09ram_07_u:1039: 7.023.004c sthāpya nāgān vaśe kṛtvā yayau maṇimatīṃ purīm
GE09ram_07_u:1040: 7.023.005a nivātakavacās tatra daityā labdhavarā vasan 7.023.005c rākṣasas tān samāsādya yuddhena samupāhvayat 7.023.006a te tu sarve suvikrāntā daiteyā balaśālinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1042: 7.023.007a teṣāṃ tu yudhyamānānāṃ sāgraḥ saṃvatsaro gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1043: 7.023.007c na cānyatarayos tatra vijayo vā kṣayo 'pi vā
GE09ram_07_u:1044: 7.023.008a tataḥ pitāmahas tatra trailokyagatir avyayaḥ 7.023.008c ājagāma drutaṃ devo vimānavaram āsthitaḥ 7.023.009a nivātakavacānāṃ tu nivārya raṇakarma tat 7.023.009c vṛddhaḥ pitāmaho vākyam uvāca viditārthavat 7.023.010a na hy ayaṃ rāvaṇo yuddhe śakyo jetuṃ surāsuraiḥ 7.023.010c na bhavantaḥ kṣayaṃ netuṃ śakyāḥ sendraiḥ surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1045: 7.023.011a rākṣasasya sakhitvaṃ vai bhavadbhiḥ saha rocate
GE09ram_07_u:1046: 7.023.011c avibhaktā hi sarvārthāḥ suhṛdāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1048: 7.023.012c nivātakavacaiḥ sārdhaṃ prītimān abhavat tadā 7.023.013a arcitas tair yathānyāyaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:1049: 7.023.013c svapurān nirviśeṣaṃ ca pūjāṃ prāpto daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1050: 7.023.014a sa tūpadhārya māyānāṃ śatam ekonam ātmavān
GE09ram_07_u:1052: 7.023.015a tato 'śmanagaraṃ nāma kālakeyābhirakṣitam 7.023.015c taṃ vijitya muhūrtena jaghne daityāṃś catuḥśatam
GE09ram_07_u:1053: 7.023.016a tataḥ pāṇḍurameghābhaṃ kailāsam iva saṃsthitam 7.023.016c varuṇasyālayaṃ divyam apaśyad rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1054: 7.023.017a kṣarantīṃ ca payo nityaṃ surabhiṃ gām avasthitām
GE09ram_07_u:1055: 7.023.017c yasyāḥ payoviniṣyandāt kṣīrodo nāma sāgaraḥ 7.023.018a yasmāc candraḥ prabhavati śītaraśmiḥ prajāhitaḥ 7.023.018c yaṃ samāsādya jīvanti phenapāḥ paramarṣayaḥ 7.023.018e amṛtaṃ yatra cotpannaṃ surā cāpi surāśinām
GE09ram_07_u:1056: 7.023.019a yāṃ bruvanti narā loke surabhiṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1057: 7.023.019c pradakṣiṇaṃ tu tāṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ paramādbhutām
GE09ram_07_u:1058: 7.023.019e praviveśa mahāghoraṃ guptaṃ bahuvidhair balaiḥ 7.023.020a tato dhārāśatākīrṇaṃ śāradābhranibhaṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:1060: 7.023.021a tato hatvā balādhyakṣān samare taiś ca tāḍitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1061: 7.023.021c abravīt kva gato yo vo rājā śīghraṃ nivedyatām 7.023.022a yuddhārthī rāvaṇaḥ prāptas tasya yuddhaṃ pradīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:1062: 7.023.022c vada vā na bhayaṃ te 'sti nirjito 'smīti sāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1063: 7.023.023a etasminn antare kruddhā varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ 7.023.023c putrāḥ pautrāś ca niṣkrāman gauś ca puṣkara eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:1064: 7.023.024a te tu vīryaguṇopetā balaiḥ parivṛtāḥ svakaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1066: 7.023.025a tato yuddhaṃ samabhavad dāruṇaṃ lomaharṣaṇam 7.023.025c salilendrasya putrāṇāṃ rāvaṇasya ca rakṣasaḥ 7.023.026a amātyais tu mahāvīryair daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ 7.023.026c vāruṇaṃ tad balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kṣaṇena vinipātitam
GE09ram_07_u:1067: 7.023.027a samīkṣya svabalaṃ saṃkhye varuṇasyā sutās tadā
GE09ram_07_u:1069: 7.023.028a mahītalagatās te tu rāvaṇaṃ dṛśya puṣpake
GE09ram_07_u:1070: 7.023.028c ākāśam āśu viviśuḥ syandanaiḥ śīghragāmibhiḥ 7.023.029a mahad āsīt tatas teṣāṃ tulyaṃ sthānam avāpya tat 7.023.029c ākāśayuddhaṃ tumulaṃ devadānavayor iva
GE09ram_07_u:1071: 7.023.030a tatas te rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe śaraiḥ pāvakasaṃnibhaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1072: 7.023.030c vimukhīkṛtya saṃhṛṣṭā vinedur vividhān ravān 7.023.031a tato mahodaraḥ kruddho rājānaṃ dṛśya dharṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:1073: 7.023.031c tyaktvā mṛtyubhayaṃ vīro yuddhakāṅkṣī vyalokayat 7.023.032a tena teṣāṃ hayā ye ca kāmagāḥ pavanopamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1074: 7.023.032c mahodareṇa gadayā hatās te prayayuḥ kṣitim
GE09ram_07_u:1075: 7.023.033a teṣāṃ varuṇasūnūnāṃ hatvā yodhān hayāṃś ca tān
GE09ram_07_u:1076: 7.023.033c mumocāśu mahānādaṃ virathān prekṣya tān sthitān
GE09ram_07_u:1077: 7.023.034a te tu teṣāṃ rathāḥ sāśvāḥ saha sārathibhir varaiḥ 7.023.034c mahodareṇa nihatāḥ patitāḥ pṛthivītale
GE09ram_07_u:1078: 7.023.035a te tu tyaktvā rathān putrā varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1079: 7.023.035c ākāśe viṣṭhitāḥ śūrāḥ svaprabhāvān na vivyathuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1080: 7.023.036a dhanūṃṣi kṛtvā sajyāni vinirbhidya mahodaram 7.023.036c rāvaṇaṃ samare kruddhāḥ sahitāḥ samabhidravan 7.023.037a tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvaḥ kālāgnir iva viṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1081: 7.023.037c śaravarṣaṃ mahāvegaṃ teṣāṃ marmasv apātayat 7.023.038a musalāni vicitrāṇi tato bhallaśatāni ca 7.023.038c paṭṭasāṃś caiva śaktīś ca śataghnīs tomarāṃs tathā
GE09ram_07_u:1082: 7.023.038e pātayām āsa durdharṣas teṣām upari viṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1083: 7.023.039a atha viddhās tu te vīrā viniṣpetuḥ padātayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1084: 7.023.040a tato rakṣo mahānādaṃ muktvā hanti sma vāruṇān
GE09ram_07_u:1086: 7.023.041a tatas te vimukhāḥ sarve patitā dharaṇītale
GE09ram_07_u:1087: 7.023.041c raṇāt svapuruṣaiḥ śīghraṃ gṛhāṇy eva praveśitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1088: 7.023.042a tān abravīt tato rakṣo varuṇāya nivedyatām
GE09ram_07_u:1089: 7.023.042c rāvaṇaṃ cābravīn mantrī prabhāso nāma vāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1090: 7.023.043a gataḥ khalu mahātejā brahmalokaṃ jaleśvaraḥ 7.023.043c gāndharvaṃ varuṇaḥ śrotuṃ yaṃ tvam āhvayase yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:1091: 7.023.044a tat kiṃ tava vṛthā vīra pariśrāmya gate nṛpe 7.023.044c ye tu saṃnihitā vīrāḥ kumārās te parājitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1092: 7.023.045a rākṣasendras tu tac chrutvā nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1093: 7.023.045c harṣān nādaṃ vimuñcan vai niṣkrānto varuṇālayāt
GE09ram_07_u:1094: 7.023.046a āgatas tu pathā yena tenaiva vinivṛtya saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1095: 7.023.046c laṅkām abhimukho rakṣo nabhastalagato yayau 7.024.001a nivartamānaḥ saṃhṛṣṭo rāvaṇaḥ sa durātmavān 7.024.001c jahre pathi narendrarṣidevagandharvakanyakāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1096: 7.024.002a darśanīyāṃ hi yāṃ rakṣaḥ kanyāṃ strīṃ vātha paśyati 7.024.002c hatvā bandhujanaṃ tasyā vimāne saṃnyaveśayat 7.024.003a tatra pannagayakṣāṇāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca rakṣasām 7.024.003c daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca kanyā jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1098: 7.024.004c śokāyattās taruṇyaś ca samastā stananamritāḥ 7.024.005a tulyam agnyarciṣāṃ tatra
GE09ram_07_u:1099: 7.024.005c pravepamānā duḥkhārtā mumucur bāṣpajaṃ jalam 7.024.006a tāsāṃ niśvasamānānāṃ niśvasaiḥ saṃpradīpitam
GE09ram_07_u:1101: 7.024.007a kā cid dadhyau suduḥkhārtā hanyād api hi mām ayam
GE09ram_07_u:1102: 7.024.007c smṛtvā mātṝh pitṝn bhrātṝn putrān vai śvaśurān api 7.024.007e duḥkhaśokasamāviṣṭā vilepuḥ sahitāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1103: 7.024.008a kathaṃ nu khalu me putraḥ kariṣyati mayā vinā 7.024.008c kathaṃ mātā kathaṃ bhrātā nimagnāḥ śokasāgare
GE09ram_07_u:1104: 7.024.009a hā kathaṃ nu kariṣyāmi bhartāraṃ daivataṃ vinā
GE09ram_07_u:1105: 7.024.009c mṛtyo prasīda yāce tvāṃ naya māṃ yamasādanam
GE09ram_07_u:1106: 7.024.010a kiṃ nu me duṣkṛtaṃ karma kṛtaṃ dehāntare purā 7.024.010c tato 'smi dharṣitānena patitā śokasāgare
GE09ram_07_u:1107: 7.024.011a na khalv idānīṃ paśyāmi duḥkhasyāntam ihātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1108: 7.024.011c aho dhin mānuṣāṃl lokān nāsti khalv adhamaḥ paraḥ 7.024.012a yad durbalā balavatā bāndhavā rāvaṇena me
GE09ram_07_u:1109: 7.024.012c uditenaiva sūryeṇa tārakā iva nāśitāḥ 7.024.013a aho subalavad rakṣo vadhopāyeṣu rajyate 7.024.013c aho durvṛttam ātmānaṃ svayam eva na budhyate
GE09ram_07_u:1111: 7.024.014c idaṃ tv asadṛśaṃ karma paradārābhimarśanam 7.024.015a yasmād eṣa parakhyāsu strīṣu rajyati durmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1112: 7.024.015c tasmād dhi strīkṛtenaiva vadhaṃ prāpsyati vāraṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1113: 7.024.016a śaptaḥ strībhiḥ sa tu tadā hatatejāḥ suniṣprabha
GE09ram_07_u:1114: 7.024.016c pativratābhiḥ sādhvībhiḥ sthitābhiḥ sādhu vartmani 7.024.017a evaṃ vilapamānāsu rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1115: 7.024.017c praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ pūjyamāno niśācaraiḥ 7.024.018a tato rākṣasarājasya svasā
GE09ram_07_u:1116: 7.024.018c pādayoḥ patitā tasya vaktum evopacakrame 7.024.019a tataḥ svasāram utthāpya rāvaṇaḥ parisāntvayan 7.024.019c abravīt kim idaṃ bhadre vaktum arhasi me drutam 7.024.020a sā bāṣpapariruddhākṣī rākṣasī vākyam abravīt 7.024.020c hatāsmi vidhavā rājaṃs tvayā balavatā kṛtā
GE09ram_07_u:1117: 7.024.021a ete viryāt tvayā rājan daityā vinihatā raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:1119: 7.024.022a tatra me nihato bhartā garīyāñ jīvitād api
GE09ram_07_u:1120: 7.024.022c sa tvayā dayitas tatra bhrātrā śatrusamena vai
GE09ram_07_u:1121: 7.024.023a yā tvayāsmi hatā rājan svayam eveha bandhunā
GE09ram_07_u:1122: 7.024.023c duḥkhaṃ vaidhavyaśabdaṃ ca dattaṃ bhokṣyāmy ahaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:1123: 7.024.024a nanu nāma tvayā rakṣyo jāmātā samareṣv api
GE09ram_07_u:1124: 7.024.024c taṃ nihatya raṇe rājan svayam eva na lajjase 7.024.025a evam uktas tayā rakṣo bhaginyā krośamānayā
GE09ram_07_u:1125: 7.024.025c abravīt sāntvayitvā tāṃ sāmapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1126: 7.024.026a alaṃ vatse viṣādena na bhetavyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1128: 7.024.027a yuddhe pramatto vyākṣipto jayakāṅkṣī kṣipañ śarān
GE09ram_07_u:1129: 7.024.027c nāvagacchāmi yuddheṣu svān parān vāpy ahaṃ śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:1130: 7.024.027e tenāsau nihataḥ saṃkhye mayā bhartā tava svasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1131: 7.024.028a asmin kāle tu yat prāptaṃ tat kariṣyāmi te hitam
GE09ram_07_u:1132: 7.024.028c bhrātur aiśvaryasaṃsthasya kharasya bhava pārśvataḥ 7.024.029a caturdaśānāṃ bhrātā te sahasrāṇāṃ bhaviṣyati 7.024.029c prabhuḥ prayāṇe dāne ca rākṣasānāṃ mahaujasām
GE09ram_07_u:1133: 7.024.030a tatra mātṛṣvasuḥ putro bhrātā tava kharaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1134: 7.024.030c bhaviṣyati sadā kurvan yad vakṣyasi vacaḥ svayam
GE09ram_07_u:1135: 7.024.031a śīghraṃ gacchatv ayaṃ śūro daṇḍakān parirakṣitum
GE09ram_07_u:1137: 7.024.032a sa hi śapto vanoddeśaḥ kruddhenośanasā purā
GE09ram_07_u:1138: 7.024.032c rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāso bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1139: 7.024.033a evam uktvā daśagrīvaḥ sainyaṃ tasyādideśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:1141: 7.024.034a sa taiḥ sarvaiḥ parivṛto rākṣasair ghoradarśanaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1142: 7.024.034c kharaḥ saṃprayayau śīghraṃ daṇḍakān akutobhayaḥ 7.024.035a sa tatra kārayām āsa rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam
GE09ram_07_u:1143: 7.024.035c sā ca śūrpaṇakhā prītā nyavasad daṇḍakāvane
GE09ram_07_u:1144: 7.025.001a sa tu dattvā daśagrīvo vanaṃ ghoraṃ kharasya tat 7.025.001c bhaginīṃ ca samāśvāsya hṛṣṭaḥ svasthataro 'bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:1145: 7.025.002a tato nikumbhilā nāma laṅkāyāḥ kānanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_07_u:1146: 7.025.002c mahātmā rākṣasendras tat praviveśa sahānugaḥ 7.025.003a tatra yūpaśatākīrṇaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:1147: 7.025.003c dadarśa viṣṭhitaṃ yajñaṃ saṃpradīptam iva śriyā
GE09ram_07_u:1149: 7.025.004c dadarśa svasutaṃ tatra meghanādam ariṃdamam 7.025.005a rakṣaḥpatiḥ samāsādya samāśliṣya ca bāhubhiḥ 7.025.005c abravīt kim idaṃ vatsa vartate tad bravīhi me 7.025.006a uśanā tv abravīt tatra gurur yajñasamṛddhaye
GE09ram_07_u:1151: 7.025.007a aham ākhyāmi te rājañ śrūyatāṃ sarvam eva ca 7.025.007c yajñās te sapta putreṇa prāptāḥ subahuvistarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1153: 7.025.008c rājasūyas tathā yajño gomedho vaiṣṇavas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:1154: 7.025.009a māheśvare pravṛtte tu yajñe pumbhiḥ sudurlabhe
GE09ram_07_u:1155: 7.025.009c varāṃs te labdhavān putraḥ sākṣāt paśupater iha
GE09ram_07_u:1156: 7.025.010a kāmagaṃ syandanaṃ divyam antarikṣacaraṃ dhruvam 7.025.010c māyāṃ ca tāmasīṃ nāma yayā saṃpadyate tamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1157: 7.025.011a etayā kila saṃgrāme māyayā rākṣaseśvara 7.025.011c prayuddhasya gatiḥ śakyā na hi jñātuṃ surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1158: 7.025.012a akṣayāv iṣudhī bāṇaiś cāpaṃ cāpi sudurjayam
GE09ram_07_u:1159: 7.025.012c astraṃ ca balavat saumya śatruvidhvaṃsanaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:1160: 7.025.013a etān sarvān varāṃl labdhvā putras te 'yaṃ daśānana
GE09ram_07_u:1161: 7.025.013c adya yajñasamāptau ca tvatpratīkṣaḥ sthito aham
GE09ram_07_u:1162: 7.025.014a tato 'bravīd daśagrīvo na śobhanam idaṃ kṛtam 7.025.014c pūjitāḥ śatravo yasmād dravyair indrapurogamāḥ 7.025.015a ehīdānīṃ kṛtaṃ yad dhi tad akartuṃ na śakyate 7.025.015c āgaccha saumya gacchāmaḥ svam eva bhavanaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:1163: 7.025.016a tato gatvā daśagrīvaḥ saputraḥ savibhīṣaṇaḥ 7.025.016c striyo 'vatārayām āsa sarvās tā bāṣpaviklavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1166: 7.025.018a vibhīṣaṇas tu tā nārīr dṛṣṭvā śokasamākulāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1167: 7.025.018c tasya tāṃ ca matiṃ jñātvā dharmātmā vākyam abravīt 7.025.019a īdṛśais taiḥ samācārair
GE09ram_07_u:1168: 7.025.019c dharṣaṇaṃ prāṇināṃ dattvā svamatena viceṣṭase 7.025.020a jñātīn vai dharṣayitvemās tvayānītā varāṅganāḥ 7.025.020c tvām atikramya madhunā rājan kumbhīnasī hṛtā
GE09ram_07_u:1169: 7.025.021a rāvaṇas tv abravīd vākyaṃ nāvagacchāmi kiṃ tv idam 7.025.021c ko vāyaṃ yas tvayākhyāto madhur ity eva nāmataḥ 7.025.022a vibhīṣaṇas tu saṃkruddho bhrātaraṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:1170: 7.025.022c śrūyatām asya pāpasya karmaṇaḥ phalam āgatam
GE09ram_07_u:1172: 7.025.023c mālyavān iti vikhyāto vṛddhaprājño niśācaraḥ 7.025.024a pitur jyeṣṭho jananyāś ca asmākaṃ tv āryako 'bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:1173: 7.025.024c tasya kumbhīnasī nāma duhitur duhitābhavat 7.025.025a mātṛṣvasur athāsmākaṃ sā kanyā cānalodbhavā 7.025.025c bhavaty asmākam eṣā vai bhrātṝṇāṃ dharmataḥ svasā
GE09ram_07_u:1174: 7.025.026a sā hṛtā madhunā rājan rākṣasena balīyasā
GE09ram_07_u:1175: 7.025.026c yajñapravṛtte putre te mayi cāntarjaloṣite 7.025.027a nihatya rākṣasaśreṣṭhān amātyāṃs tava saṃmatān 7.025.027c dharṣayitvā hṛtā rājan guptā hy antaḥpure tava
GE09ram_07_u:1176: 7.025.028a śrutvā tv etan mahārāja kṣāntam eva hato na saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1177: 7.025.028c yasmād avaśyaṃ dātavyā kanyā bhartre hi dātṛbhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1178: 7.025.028e asminn evābhisaṃprāptaṃ loke viditam astu te
GE09ram_07_u:1180: 7.025.029c kalpyatāṃ me rathaḥ śīghraṃ śūrāḥ sajjībhavantu ca
GE09ram_07_u:1181: 7.025.030a bhrātā me kumbhakarṇaś ca ye ca mukhyā niśācarāḥ 7.025.030c vāhanāny adhirohantu
GE09ram_07_u:1182: 7.025.031a adya taṃ samare hatvā madhuṃ rāvaṇanirbhayam
GE09ram_07_u:1184: 7.025.032a tato vijitya tridivaṃ vaśe sthāpya puraṃdaram
GE09ram_07_u:1188: 7.025.034a indrajit tv agrataḥ sainyaṃ sainikān parigṛhya ca
GE09ram_07_u:1189: 7.025.034c rāvaṇo madhyataḥ śūraḥ kumbhakarṇaś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1190: 7.025.035a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā laṅkāyāṃ dharmam ācarat
GE09ram_07_u:1191: 7.025.035c te tu sarve mahābhāgā yayur madhupuraṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:1192: 7.025.036a rathair nāgaiḥ kharair uṣṭrair hayair dīptair mahoragaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1193: 7.025.036c rākṣasāḥ prayayuḥ sarve kṛtvākāśaṃ nirantaram 7.025.037a daityāś ca śataśas tatra kṛtavairāḥ suraiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:1194: 7.025.037c rāvaṇaṃ prekṣya gacchantam anvagacchanta pṛṣṭhataḥ 7.025.038a sa tu gatvā madhupuraṃ praviśya ca daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1195: 7.025.038c na dadarśa madhuṃ tatra bhaginīṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān
GE09ram_07_u:1196: 7.025.039a sā prahvā prāñjalir bhūtvā śirasā pādayor gatā
GE09ram_07_u:1197: 7.025.039c tasya rākṣasarājasya trastā kumbhīnasī svasā 7.025.040a tāṃ samutthāpayām āsa na bhetavyam iti bruvan
GE09ram_07_u:1198: 7.025.040c rāvaṇo rākṣasaśreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ cāpi karavāṇi te
GE09ram_07_u:1199: 7.025.041a sābravīd yadi me rājan prasannas tvaṃ mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:1200: 7.025.041c bhartāraṃ na mamehādya hantum arhasi mānada
GE09ram_07_u:1201: 7.025.042a satyavāg bhava rājendra mām avekṣasva yācatīm
GE09ram_07_u:1202: 7.025.042c tvayā hy uktaṃ mahābāho na bhetavyam iti svayam 7.025.043a rāvaṇas tv abravīd dhṛṣṭaḥ svasāraṃ tatra saṃsthitām
GE09ram_07_u:1203: 7.025.043c kva cāsau tava bhartā vai mama śīghraṃ nivedyatām 7.025.044a saha tena gamiṣyāmi suralokaṃ jayāya vai
GE09ram_07_u:1204: 7.025.044c tava kāruṇyasauhārdān nivṛtto 'smi madhor vadhāt 7.025.045a ity uktā sā prasuptaṃ taṃ samutthāpya niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:1206: 7.025.046a eṣa prāpto daśagrīvo mama bhrātā niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1207: 7.025.046c suralokajayākāṅkṣī sāhāyye tvāṃ vṛṇoti ca 7.025.047a tad asya tvaṃ sahāyārthaṃ sabandhur gaccha rākṣasa
GE09ram_07_u:1208: 7.025.047c snigdhasya bhajamānasya yuktam arthāya kalpitum 7.025.048a tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tathety āha madhur vacaḥ 7.025.048c dadarśa rākṣasaśreṣṭhaṃ yathānyāyam upetya saḥ 7.025.049a pūjayām āsa dharmeṇa rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam 7.025.049c prāptapūjo daśagrīvo madhuveśmani vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:1209: 7.025.049e tatra caikāṃ niśām uṣya gamanāyopacakrame 7.025.050a tataḥ kailāsam āsādya śailaṃ vaiśravaṇālayam 7.025.050c rākṣasendro mahendrābhaḥ senām upaniveśayat
GE09ram_07_u:1210: 7.026.001a sa tu tatra daśagrīvaḥ saha sainyena vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:1211: 7.026.001c astaṃ prāpte dinakare nivāsaṃ samarocayat 7.026.002a udite vimale candre tulyaparvatavarcasi
GE09ram_07_u:1212: 7.026.002c sa dadarśa guṇāṃs tatra candrapādopaśobhitān 7.026.003a karṇikāravanair divyaiḥ kadambagahanais tathā
GE09ram_07_u:1213: 7.026.003c padminībhiś ca phullābhir mandākinyā jalair api
GE09ram_07_u:1214: 7.026.004a ghaṇṭānām iva saṃnādaḥ śuśruve madhurasvanaḥ 7.026.004c apsarogaṇasaṃghanāṃ gāyatāṃ dhanadālaye
GE09ram_07_u:1219: 7.026.007a geyāt puṣpasamṛddhyā ca śaityād vāyor guṇair gireḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1220: 7.026.007c pravṛttāyāṃ rajanyāṃ ca candrasyodayanena ca 7.026.008a rāvaṇaḥ sumahāvīryaḥ kāmabāṇavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1226: 7.026.011a yasya vaktraṃ śaśinibhaṃ bhruvau cāpanibhe śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:1231: 7.026.013a kva gacchasi varārohe kāṃ siddhiṃ bhajase svayam
GE09ram_07_u:1233: 7.026.014a tavānanarasasyādya padmotpalasugandhinaḥ 7.026.014c sudhāmṛtarasasyeva ko 'dya tṛptiṃ gamiṣyati 7.026.015a svarṇakumbhanibhau pīnau śubhau bhīru nirantarau 7.026.015c kasyorasthalasaṃsparśaṃ dāsyatas te kucāv imau 7.026.016a suvarṇacakrapratimaṃ svarṇadāmacitaṃ pṛthu
GE09ram_07_u:1234: 7.026.016c adhyārokṣyati kas te 'dya svargaṃ jaghanarūpiṇam 7.026.017a madviśiṣṭaḥ pumān ko 'nyaḥ śakro viṣṇur athāśvinau
GE09ram_07_u:1235: 7.026.017c mām atītya hi yasya tvaṃ yāsi bhīru na śobhanam
GE09ram_07_u:1236: 7.026.018a viśrama tvaṃ pṛthuśroṇi śilātalam idaṃ śubham
GE09ram_07_u:1237: 7.026.018c trailokye yaḥ prabhuś caiva tulyo mama na vidyate 7.026.019a tad eṣa prāñjaliḥ prahvo yācate tvāṃ daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1238: 7.026.019c yaḥ prabhuś cāpi bhartā ca trailokyasya bhajasva mām 7.026.020a evam uktābravīd rambhā vepamānā kṛtāñjaliḥ 7.026.020c prasīda nārhase vaktum īdṛśaṃ tvaṃ hi me guruḥ 7.026.021a anyebhyo 'pi tvayā rakṣyā prāpnuyāṃ dharṣaṇaṃ yadi 7.026.021c dharmataś ca snuṣā te 'haṃ tattvam etad bravīmi te
GE09ram_07_u:1239: 7.026.022a abravīt tāṃ daśagrīvaś caraṇādhomukhīṃ sthitām 7.026.022c sutasya yadi me bhāryā tatas tvaṃ me snuṣā bhaveḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1240: 7.026.023a bāḍham ity eva sā rambhā prāha rāvaṇam uttaram 7.026.023c dharmatas te sutasyāhaṃ bhāryā rākṣasapuṃgava 7.026.024a putraḥ priyataraḥ prāṇair bhrātur vaiśravaṇasya te
GE09ram_07_u:1241: 7.026.024c khyāto yas triṣu lokeṣu nalakūbara ity asau
GE09ram_07_u:1242: 7.026.025a dharmato yo bhaved vipraḥ kṣatriyo vīryato bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:1243: 7.026.025c krodhād yaś ca bhaved agniḥ kṣāntyā ca vasudhāsamaḥ 7.026.026a tasyāsmi kṛtasaṃketā lokapālasutasya vai
GE09ram_07_u:1244: 7.026.026c tam uddiśya ca me sarvaṃ vibhūṣaṇam idaṃ kṛtam 7.026.027a yasya tasya hi nānyasya bhāvo māṃ prati tiṣṭhati 7.026.027c tena satyena māṃ rājan moktum arhasy ariṃdama
GE09ram_07_u:1245: 7.026.028a sa hi tiṣṭhati dharmātmā sāmprataṃ matsamutsukaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1246: 7.026.028c tan na vighnaṃ sutasyeha kartum arhasi muñca mām 7.026.029a sadbhir ācaritaṃ mārgaṃ gaccha rākṣasapuṃgava 7.026.029c mānanīyo mayā hi tvaṃ lālanīyā tathāsmi te
GE09ram_07_u:1247: 7.026.030a evaṃ bruvāṇāṃ rambhāṃ tāṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1248: 7.026.030c nirbhartsya rākṣaso mohāt pratigṛhya balād balī
GE09ram_07_u:1249: 7.026.030e kāmamohābhisaṃrabdho maithunāyopacakrame 7.026.031a sā vimuktā tato rambhā bhraṣṭamālyavibhūṣaṇā 7.026.031c gajendrākrīḍamathitā nadīvākulatāṃ gatā
GE09ram_07_u:1250: 7.026.032a sā vepamānā lajjantī bhītā karakṛtāñjaliḥ 7.026.032c nalakūbaram āsādya pādayor nipapāta ha 7.026.033a tadavasthāṃ ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmā nalakūbaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1251: 7.026.033c abravīt kim idaṃ bhadre pādayoḥ patitāsi me
GE09ram_07_u:1252: 7.026.034a sā tu niśvasamānā ca vepamānātha sāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1253: 7.026.034c tasmai sarvaṃ yathātathyam ākhyātum upacakrame 7.026.035a eṣa deva daśagrīvaḥ prāpto gantuṃ triviṣṭapam
GE09ram_07_u:1255: 7.026.036a āyāntī tena dṛṣṭāsmi tvatsakāśam ariṃdama 7.026.036c gṛhītvā tena pṛṣṭāsmi kasya tvam iti rakṣasā
GE09ram_07_u:1256: 7.026.037a mayā tu sarvaṃ yat satyaṃ tad dhi tasmai niveditam
GE09ram_07_u:1257: 7.026.037c kāmamohābhibhūtātmā nāśrauṣīt tad vaco mama 7.026.038a yācyamāno mayā deva snuṣā te 'ham iti prabho 7.026.038c tat sarvaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā balāt tenāsmi dharṣitā
GE09ram_07_u:1258: 7.026.039a evaṃ tvam aparādhaṃ me kṣantum arhasi mānada
GE09ram_07_u:1259: 7.026.039c na hi tulyaṃ balaṃ saumya striyāś ca puruṣasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:1260: 7.026.040a evaṃ śrutvā tu saṃkruddhas tadā vaiśvaraṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1261: 7.026.040c dharṣaṇāṃ tāṃ parāṃ śrutvā dhyānaṃ saṃpraviveśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:1262: 7.026.041a tasya tat karma vijñāya tadā vaiśravaṇātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1263: 7.026.041c muhūrtād roṣatāmrākṣas toyaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā 7.026.042a gṛhītvā salilaṃ divyam upaspṛśya yathāvidhi 7.026.042c utsasarja tadā śāpaṃ rākṣasendrāya dāruṇam 7.026.043a akāmā tena yasmāt tvaṃ balād bhadre pradharṣitā
GE09ram_07_u:1264: 7.026.043c tasmāt sa yuvatīm anyāṃ nākāmām upayāsyati
GE09ram_07_u:1265: 7.026.044a yadā tv akāmāṃ kāmārto dharṣayiṣyati yoṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:1266: 7.026.044c mūrdhā tu saptadhā tasya śakalībhavitā tadā
GE09ram_07_u:1268: 7.026.045c devadundubhayo neduḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca khāc cyutā
GE09ram_07_u:1269: 7.026.046a prajāpatimukhāś cāpi sarve devāḥ praharṣitāḥ 7.026.046c jñātvā lokagatiṃ sarvāṃ tasya mṛtyuṃ ca rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1270: 7.026.047a śrutvā tu sa daśagrīvas taṃ śāpaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:1271: 7.026.047c nārīṣu maithunaṃ bhāvaṃ nākāmāsv abhyarocayat 7.027.001a kailāsaṃ laṅghayitvātha daśagrīvaḥ sarākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1275: 7.027.003a śrutvā tu rāvaṇaṃ prāptam indraḥ saṃcalitāsanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1276: 7.027.003c abravīt tatra tān devān sarvān eva samāgatān
GE09ram_07_u:1277: 7.027.004a ādityān savasūn rudrān viśvān sādhyān marudgaṇān
GE09ram_07_u:1279: 7.027.005a evam uktās tu śakreṇa devāḥ śakrasamā yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:1281: 7.027.006a sa tu dīnaḥ paritrasto mahendro rāvaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:1282: 7.027.006c viṣṇoḥ samīpam āgatya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:1284: 7.027.007c asau hi balavān rakṣo yuddhārtham abhivartate
GE09ram_07_u:1285: 7.027.008a varapradānād balavān na khalv anyena hetunā
GE09ram_07_u:1286: 7.027.008c tac ca satyaṃ hi kartavyaṃ vākyaṃ deva prajāpateḥ 7.027.009a tad yathā namucir vṛtro balir narakaśambarau
GE09ram_07_u:1287: 7.027.009c tvan mataṃ samavaṣṭabhya yathā dagdhās tathā kuru
GE09ram_07_u:1288: 7.027.010a na hy anyo deva devānām āpatsu sumahābala
GE09ram_07_u:1289: 7.027.010c gatiḥ parāyaṇaṃ vāsti tvām ṛte puruṣottama
GE09ram_07_u:1290: 7.027.011a tvaṃ hi nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān padmanābhaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1291: 7.027.011c tvayāhaṃ sthāpitaś caiva devarājye sanātane 7.027.012a tad ākhyāhi yathātattvaṃ devadeva mama svayam
GE09ram_07_u:1292: 7.027.012c asicakrasahāyas tvaṃ yudhyase saṃyuge ripum 7.027.013a evam uktaḥ sa śakreṇa devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1293: 7.027.013c abravīn na paritrāsaḥ kāryas te śrūyatāṃ ca me 7.027.014a na tāvad eṣa durvṛttaḥ śakyo daivatadānavaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1294: 7.027.014c hantuṃ yudhi samāsādya varadānena durjayaḥ 7.027.015a sarvathā tu mahat karma kariṣyati balotkaṭaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1296: 7.027.016a bravīṣi yat tu māṃ śakra saṃyuge yotsyasīti ha 7.027.016c naivāhaṃ pratiyotsye taṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam 7.027.017a anihatya ripuṃ viṣṇur na hi pratinivartate
GE09ram_07_u:1297: 7.027.017c durlabhaś caiṣa kāmo 'dya varam āsādya rākṣase
GE09ram_07_u:1300: 7.027.019a aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi rāvaṇaṃ sasutaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:1301: 7.027.019c devatās toṣayiṣyāmi jñātvā kālam upasthitam 7.027.020a etasminn antare nādaḥ śuśruve rajanīkṣaye 7.027.020c tasya rāvaṇasainyasya prayuddhasya samantataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1302: 7.027.021a atha yuddhaṃ samabhavad devarākṣasayos tadā 7.027.021c ghoraṃ tumulanirhrādaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:1303: 7.027.022a etasminn antare śūrā rākṣasā ghoradarśanāḥ 7.027.022c yuddhārtham abhyadhāvanta sacivā rāvaṇājñayā
GE09ram_07_u:1304: 7.027.023a mārīcaś ca prahastaś ca mahāpārśvamahodarau 7.027.023c akampano nikumbhaś ca śukaḥ sāraṇa eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:1305: 7.027.024a saṃhrādir dhūmaketuś ca mahādaṃṣṭro mahāmukhaḥ 7.027.024c jambumālī mahāmālī virūpākṣaś ca rākṣasaḥ 7.027.025a etaiḥ sarvair mahāvīryair vṛto rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ 7.027.025c rāvaṇasyāryakaḥ sainyaṃ sumālī praviveśa ha 7.027.026a sa hi devagaṇān sarvān nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1306: 7.027.026c vidhvaṃsayati saṃkruddhaḥ saha taiḥ kṣaṇadācaraiḥ 7.027.027a etasminn antare śūro vasūnām aṣṭamo vasuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1307: 7.027.027c sāvitra iti vikhyātaḥ praviveśa mahāraṇam 7.027.028a tato yuddhaṃ samabhavat surāṇāṃ rākṣasaiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:1308: 7.027.028c kruddhānāṃ rakṣasāṃ kīrtiṃ samareṣv anivartinām 7.027.029a tatas te rākṣasāḥ śūrā devāṃs tān samare sthitān 7.027.029c nānāpraharaṇair ghorair jaghnuḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1309: 7.027.030a surās tu rākṣasān ghorān mahāvīryān svatejasā
GE09ram_07_u:1310: 7.027.030c samare vividhaiḥ śastrair anayan yamasādanam 7.027.031a etasminn antare śūraḥ sumālī nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1312: 7.027.032a devānāṃ tad balaṃ sarvaṃ nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1313: 7.027.032c vidhvaṃsayati saṃkruddho vāyur jaladharān iva 7.027.033a te mahābāṇavarṣaiś ca śūlaiḥ prāsaiś ca dāruṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1314: 7.027.033c pīḍyamānāḥ surāḥ sarve na vyatiṣṭhan samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1316: 7.027.034c vasūnām aṣṭamo devaḥ sāvitro vyavatiṣṭhata 7.027.035a saṃvṛtaḥ svair anīkais tu praharantaṃ niśācaram
GE09ram_07_u:1317: 7.027.035c vikrameṇa mahātejā vārayām āsa saṃyuge 7.027.036a sumattayos tayor āsīd yuddhaṃ loke sudāruṇam
GE09ram_07_u:1318: 7.027.036c sumālino vasoś caiva samareṣv anivartinoḥ 7.027.037a tatas tasya mahābāṇair vasunā sumahātmanā 7.027.037c mahān sa pannagarathaḥ kṣaṇena vinipātitaḥ 7.027.038a hatvā tu saṃyuge tasya rathaṃ bāṇaśataiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1319: 7.027.038c gadāṃ tasya vadhārthāya vasur jagrāha pāṇinā
GE09ram_07_u:1320: 7.027.039a tāṃ pradīptāṃ pragṛhyāśu kāladaṇḍanibhāṃ śubhām 7.027.039c tasya mūrdhani sāvitraḥ sumāler vinipātayat 7.027.040a tasya mūrdhani solkābhā patantī ca tadā babhau
GE09ram_07_u:1322: 7.027.041a tasya naivāsthi kāyo vā na māṃsaṃ dadṛśe tadā 7.027.041c gadayā bhasmasādbhūto raṇe tasmin nipātitaḥ 7.027.042a taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ saṃkhye rākṣasās te samantataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1323: 7.027.042c dudruvuḥ sahitāḥ sarve krośamānā mahāsvanam 7.028.001a sumālinaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā vasunā bhasmasātkṛtam 7.028.001c vidrutaṃ cāpi svaṃ sainyaṃ lakṣayitvārditaṃ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1324: 7.028.002a tataḥ sa balavān kruddho rāvaṇasya suto yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:1325: 7.028.002c nivartya rākṣasān sarvān meghanādo vyatiṣṭhata 7.028.003a sa rathenāgnivarṇena kāmagena mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1326: 7.028.003c abhidudrāva senāṃ tāṃ vanāny agnir iva jvalan
GE09ram_07_u:1328: 7.028.004c vidudruvur diśaḥ sarvā devās tasya ca darśanāt
GE09ram_07_u:1329: 7.028.005a na tatrāvasthitaḥ kaś cid raṇe tasya yuyutsataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1331: 7.028.006a na bhetavyaṃ na gantavyaṃ nivartadhvaṃ raṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:1332: 7.028.006c eṣa gacchati me putro yuddhārtham aparājitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1333: 7.028.007a tataḥ śakrasuto devo jayanta iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1335: 7.028.008a tatas te tridaśāḥ sarve parivārya śacīsutam
GE09ram_07_u:1336: 7.028.008c rāvaṇasya sutaṃ yuddhe samāsādya vyavasthitāḥ 7.028.009a teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ mahad abhūt sadṛśaṃ devarakṣasām
GE09ram_07_u:1338: 7.028.010a tato mātaliputre tu gomukhe rākṣasātmajaḥ 7.028.010c sārathau pātayām āsa śarān kāñcanabhūṣaṇān 7.028.011a śacīsutas tv api tathā jayantas tasya sārathim
GE09ram_07_u:1339: 7.028.011c taṃ caiva rāvaṇiṃ kruddhaḥ pratyavidhyad raṇājire
GE09ram_07_u:1340: 7.028.012a tataḥ kruddho mahātejā rakṣo visphāritekṣaṇaḥ 7.028.012c rāvaṇiḥ śakraputraṃ taṃ śaravarṣair avākirat 7.028.013a tataḥ pragṛhya śastrāṇi sāravanti mahānti ca
GE09ram_07_u:1342: 7.028.013e sumahānty adriśṛṅgāṇi pātayām āsa rāvaṇiḥ 7.028.014a tataḥ pravyathitā lokāḥ saṃjajñe ca tamo mahat
GE09ram_07_u:1343: 7.028.014c tasya rāvaṇaputrasya tadā śatrūn abhighnataḥ 7.028.015a tatas tad daivatabalaṃ samantāt taṃ śacīsutam
GE09ram_07_u:1344: 7.028.015c bahuprakāram asvasthaṃ tatra tatra sma dhāvati
GE09ram_07_u:1345: 7.028.016a nābhyajānaṃs tadānyonyaṃ śatrūn vā daivatāni vā
GE09ram_07_u:1346: 7.028.016c tatra tatra viparyastaṃ samantāt paridhāvitam 7.028.017a etasminn antare śūraḥ pulomā nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:1348: 7.028.018a gṛhītvā taṃ tu naptāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa mahodadhim
GE09ram_07_u:1349: 7.028.018c mātāmaho 'ryakas tasya paulomī yena sā śacī 7.028.019a praṇāśaṃ dṛśya tu surā jayantasyātidāruṇam 7.028.019c vyathitāś cāprahṛṣṭāś ca samantād vipradudruvuḥ 7.028.020a rāvaṇis tv atha saṃhṛṣṭo balaiḥ parivṛtaḥ svakaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1350: 7.028.020c abhyadhāvata devāṃs tān mumoca ca mahāsvanam
GE09ram_07_u:1351: 7.028.021a dṛṣṭvā praṇāśaṃ putrasya rāvaṇeś cāpi vikramam
GE09ram_07_u:1352: 7.028.021c mātaliṃ prāha devendro rathaḥ samupanīyatām 7.028.022a sa tu divyo mahābhīmaḥ sajja eva mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1354: 7.028.023a tato meghā rathe tasmiṃs taḍidvanto mahāsvanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1355: 7.028.023c agrato vāyucapalā gacchanto vyanadaṃs tadā 7.028.024a nānāvādyāni vādyanta stutayaś ca samāhitāḥ 7.028.024c nanṛtuś cāpsaraḥsaṃghāḥ prayāte vāsave raṇam 7.028.025a rudrair vasubhir ādityaiḥ sādhyaiś ca samarudgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1357: 7.028.026a nirgacchatas tu śakrasya paruṣaṃ pavano vavau
GE09ram_07_u:1358: 7.028.026c bhāskaro niṣprabhaś cāsīn maholkāś ca prapedire
GE09ram_07_u:1359: 7.028.027a etasminn antare śūro daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān 7.028.027c āruroha rathaṃ divyaṃ nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā 7.028.028a pannagaiḥ sumahākāyair veṣṭitaṃ lomaharṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1360: 7.028.028c yeṣāṃ niśvāsavātena pradīptam iva saṃyugam 7.028.029a daityair niśācaraiḥ śūrai rathaḥ saṃparivāritaḥ 7.028.029c samarābhimukho divyo mahendram abhivartata
GE09ram_07_u:1361: 7.028.030a putraṃ taṃ vārayitvāsau svayam eva vyavasthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1363: 7.028.031a tato yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ tu surāṇāṃ rākṣasaiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:1364: 7.028.031c śastrābhivarṣaṇaṃ ghoraṃ meghānām iva saṃyuge 7.028.032a kumbhakarṇas tu duṣṭātmā
GE09ram_07_u:1365: 7.028.032c nājñāyata tadā yuddhe saha kenāpy ayudhyata
GE09ram_07_u:1366: 7.028.033a dantair bhujābhyāṃ padbhyāṃ ca śaktitomarasāyakaiḥ 7.028.033c yena kenaiva saṃrabdhas tāḍayām āsa vai surān
GE09ram_07_u:1367: 7.028.034a tato rudrair mahābhāgaiḥ sahādityair niśācaraḥ 7.028.034c prayuddhas taiś ca saṃgrāme kṛttaḥ śastrair nirantaram
GE09ram_07_u:1368: 7.028.035a tatas tad rākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ tridaśaiḥ samarudgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1369: 7.028.035c raṇe vidrāvitaṃ sarvaṃ nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ 7.028.036a ke cid vinihatāḥ śastrair veṣṭanti sma mahītale
GE09ram_07_u:1370: 7.028.036c vāhaneṣv avasaktāś ca sthitā evāpare raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:1371: 7.028.037a rathān nāgān kharān uṣṭrān pannagāṃs turagāṃs tathā
GE09ram_07_u:1372: 7.028.037c śiṃśumārān varāhāṃś ca piśācavadanāṃs tathā 7.028.038a tān samāliṅgya bāhubhyāṃ viṣṭabdhāḥ ke cid ucchritāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1373: 7.028.038c devais tu śastrasaṃviddhā mamrire ca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1374: 7.028.039a citrakarma ivābhāti sa teṣāṃ raṇasaṃplavaḥ 7.028.039c nihatānāṃ pramattānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahītale
GE09ram_07_u:1376: 7.028.041a etasminn antare kruddho daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān 7.028.041c nirīkṣya tad balaṃ sarvaṃ daivatair vinipātitam
GE09ram_07_u:1377: 7.028.042a sa taṃ prativigāhyāśu pravṛddhaṃ sainyasāgaram 7.028.042c tridaśān samare nighnañ śakram evābhyavartata 7.028.043a tataḥ śakro mahac cāpaṃ visphārya sumahāsvanam
GE09ram_07_u:1378: 7.028.043c yasya visphāraghoṣeṇa svananti sma diśo daśa
GE09ram_07_u:1379: 7.028.044a tad vikṛṣya mahac cāpam indro rāvaṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_07_u:1381: 7.028.045a tathaiva ca mahābāhur daśagrīvo vyavasthitaḥ 7.028.045c śakraṃ kārmukavibhraṣṭaiḥ śaravarṣair avākirat
GE09ram_07_u:1382: 7.028.046a prayudhyator atha tayor bāṇavarṣaiḥ samantataḥ 7.028.046c nājñāyata tadā kiṃ cit sarvaṃ hi tamasā vṛtam 7.029.001a tatas tamasi saṃjāte rākṣasā daivataiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:1384: 7.029.002a tatas tu devasainyena rākṣasānāṃ mahad balam
GE09ram_07_u:1385: 7.029.002c daśāṃśaṃ sthāpitaṃ yuddhe śeṣaṃ nītaṃ yamakṣayam
GE09ram_07_u:1386: 7.029.003a tasmiṃs tu tamasā naddhe sarve te devarākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1388: 7.029.004a indraś ca rāvaṇaś caiva rāvaṇiś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1389: 7.029.004c tasmiṃs tamojālavṛte moham īyur na te trayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1390: 7.029.005a sa tu dṛṣṭvā balaṃ sarvaṃ nihataṃ rāvaṇo raṇe 7.029.005c krodham abhyāgamat tīvraṃ mahānādaṃ ca muktavān
GE09ram_07_u:1391: 7.029.006a krodhāt sūtaṃ ca durdharṣaḥ syandanastham uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:1392: 7.029.006c parasainyasya madhyena yāvadantaṃ nayasva mām 7.029.007a adyaitāṃs tridaśān sarvān vikramaiḥ samare svayam
GE09ram_07_u:1394: 7.029.008a aham indraṃ vadhiṣyāmi varuṇaṃ dhanadaṃ yamam
GE09ram_07_u:1395: 7.029.008c tridaśān vinihatyāśu svayaṃ sthāsyāmy athopari 7.029.009a viṣādo na ca kartavyaḥ śīghraṃ vāhaya me ratham 7.029.009c dviḥ khalu tvāṃ bravīmy adya yāvadantaṃ nayasva mām 7.029.010a ayaṃ sa nandanoddeśo yatra vartāmahe vayam
GE09ram_07_u:1396: 7.029.010c naya mām adya tatra tvam udayo yatra parvataḥ 7.029.011a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā turagān sa manojavān
GE09ram_07_u:1397: 7.029.011c ādideśātha śatrūṇāṃ madhyenaiva ca sārathiḥ 7.029.012a tasya taṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā śakro deveśvaras tadā
GE09ram_07_u:1398: 7.029.012c rathasthaḥ samarasthāṃs tān devān vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:1399: 7.029.013a surāḥ śṛṇuta madvākyaṃ yat tāvan mama rocate
GE09ram_07_u:1400: 7.029.013c jīvann eva daśagrīvaḥ sādhu rakṣo nigṛhyatām
GE09ram_07_u:1401: 7.029.014a eṣa hy atibalaḥ sainye rathena pavanaujasā
GE09ram_07_u:1402: 7.029.014c gamiṣyati pravṛddhormiḥ samudra iva parvaṇi 7.029.015a na hy eṣa hantuṃ śakyo 'dya varadānāt sunirbhayaḥ 7.029.015c tad grahīṣyāmahe rakṣo yattā bhavata saṃyuge
GE09ram_07_u:1403: 7.029.016a yathā baliṃ nigṛhyaitat trailokyaṃ bhujyate mayā
GE09ram_07_u:1404: 7.029.016c evam etasya pāpasya nigraho mama rocate
GE09ram_07_u:1405: 7.029.017a tato 'nyaṃ deśam āsthāya śakraḥ saṃtyajya rāvaṇam 7.029.017c ayudhyata mahātejā rākṣasān nāśayan raṇe 7.029.018a uttareṇa daśagrīvaḥ praviveśānivartitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1406: 7.029.018c dakṣiṇena tu pārśvena praviveśa śatakratuḥ 7.029.019a tataḥ sa yojanaśataṃ praviṣṭo rākṣasādhipaḥ 7.029.019c devatānāṃ balaṃ kṛtsnaṃ śaravarṣair avākirat 7.029.020a tataḥ śakro nirīkṣyātha praviṣṭaṃ taṃ balaṃ svakam
GE09ram_07_u:1408: 7.029.021a etasminn antare nādo mukto dānavarākṣasaiḥ 7.029.021c hā hatāḥ smeti taṃ dṛṣṭvā grastaṃ śakreṇa rāvaṇam 7.029.022a tato rathaṃ samāruhya rāvaṇiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ 7.029.022c tat sainyam atisaṃkruddhaḥ praviveśa sudāruṇam 7.029.023a sa tāṃ praviśya māyāṃ tu dattāṃ gopatinā purā 7.029.023c adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tat sainyaṃ samavākirat 7.029.024a tataḥ sa devān saṃtyajya śakram evābhyayād drutam
GE09ram_07_u:1409: 7.029.024c mahendraś ca mahātejā na dadarśa sutaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1410: 7.029.025a sa mātaliṃ hayāṃś caiva tāḍayitvā śarottamaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1411: 7.029.025c mahendraṃ bāṇavarṣeṇa śīghrahasto hy avākirat 7.029.026a tataḥ śakro rathaṃ tyaktva visṛjya ca sa mātalim 7.029.026c airāvataṃ samāruhya mṛgayām āsa rāvaṇim 7.029.027a sa tu māyā balād rakṣaḥ saṃgrāme nābhyadṛśyata
GE09ram_07_u:1413: 7.029.028a sa taṃ yadā pariśrāntam indraṃ mene 'tha rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1415: 7.029.029a taṃ dṛṣṭvātha balāt tasmin māyayāpahṛtaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_07_u:1416: 7.029.029c mahendram amarāḥ sarve kiṃ nv etad iti cukruśuḥ 7.029.029e na hi dṛśyati vidyāvān māyayā yena nīyate
GE09ram_07_u:1417: 7.029.030a etasminn antare cāpi sarve suragaṇās tadā
GE09ram_07_u:1420: 7.029.031c na śaśāka raṇe sthātuṃ na yoddhuṃ śastrapīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1421: 7.029.032a taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā pariśrāntaṃ prahārair jarjaracchavim
GE09ram_07_u:1423: 7.029.033a āgaccha tāta gacchāvo nivṛttaṃ raṇakarma tat
GE09ram_07_u:1424: 7.029.033c jitaṃ te viditaṃ bho 'stu svastho bhava gatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1425: 7.029.034a ayaṃ hi surasainyasya trailokyasya ca yaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1426: 7.029.034c sa gṛhīto mayā śakro bhagnamānāḥ surāḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1427: 7.029.035a yatheṣṭaṃ bhuṅkṣva trailokyaṃ nigṛhya ripum ojasā
GE09ram_07_u:1428: 7.029.035c vṛthā te kiṃ śramaṃ kṛtvā yuddhaṃ hi tava niṣphalam
GE09ram_07_u:1429: 7.029.036a sa daivatabalāt tasmān nivṛtto raṇakarmaṇaḥ 7.029.036c tac chrutvā rāvaṇer vākyaṃ svasthacetā daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1430: 7.029.037a atha raṇavigatajvaraḥ prabhur; vijayam avāpya niśācarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1431: 7.029.037c bhavanam abhi tato jagāma hṛṣṭaḥ; svasutam avāpya ca vākyam abravīt 7.029.038a atibalasadṛśaiḥ parākramais tair; mama kulamānavivardhanaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:1432: 7.029.038c yad amarasamavikrama tvayā; tridaśapatis tridaśāś ca nirjitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1433: 7.029.039a tvaritam upanayasva vāsavaṃ; nagaram ito vraja sainyasaṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1434: 7.029.039c aham api tava gacchato drutaṃ; saha sacivair anuyāmi pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1435: 7.029.040a atha sa balavṛtaḥ savāhanas; tridaśapatiṃ parigṛhya rāvaṇiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1436: 7.029.040c svabhavanam upagamya rākṣaso; muditamanā visasarja rākṣasān
GE09ram_07_u:1438: 7.030.001c prajāpatiṃ puraskṛtya gatā laṅkāṃ surās tadā
GE09ram_07_u:1439: 7.030.002a taṃ rāvaṇaṃ samāsādya putrabhrātṛbhir āvṛtam 7.030.002c abravīd gagane tiṣṭhan sāntvapūrvaṃ prajāpatiḥ 7.030.003a vatsa rāvaṇa tuṣṭo 'smi tava putrasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_07_u:1441: 7.030.004a jitaṃ hi bhavatā sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ svena tejasā
GE09ram_07_u:1442: 7.030.004c kṛtā pratijñā saphalā prīto 'smi svasutena vai 7.030.005a ayaṃ ca putro 'tibalas tava rāvaṇarāvaṇiḥ 7.030.005c indrajit tv iti vikhyāto jagaty eṣa bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:1443: 7.030.006a balavāñ śatrunirjetā bhaviṣyaty eṣa rākṣasaḥ 7.030.006c yam āśritya tvayā rājan sthāpitās tridaśā vaśe
GE09ram_07_u:1444: 7.030.007a tan mucyatāṃ mahābāho mahendraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ 7.030.007c kiṃ cāsya mokṣaṇārthāya prayacchanti divaukasaḥ 7.030.008a athābravīn mahātejā indrajit samitiṃjayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1445: 7.030.008c amaratvam ahaṃ deva vṛṇomīhāsya mokṣaṇe 7.030.009a abravīt tu tadā devo rāvaṇiṃ
GE09ram_07_u:1446: 7.030.009c nāsti sarvāmaratvaṃ hi keṣāṃ cit prāṇināṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_07_u:1447: 7.030.010a athābravīt sa tatrastham indrajit padmasaṃbhavam 7.030.010c śrūyatāṃ yā bhavet siddhiḥ śatakratuvimokṣaṇe 7.030.011a mameṣṭaṃ nityaśo deva havyaiḥ saṃpūjya pāvakam
GE09ram_07_u:1449: 7.030.012a tasmiṃś ced asamāpte tu japyahome vibhāvasoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1450: 7.030.012c yudhyeyaṃ deva saṃgrāme tadā me syād vināśanam
GE09ram_07_u:1451: 7.030.013a sarvo hi tapasā caiva vṛṇoty amaratāṃ pumān
GE09ram_07_u:1452: 7.030.013c vikrameṇa mayā tv etad amaratvaṃ pravartitam
GE09ram_07_u:1453: 7.030.014a evam astv iti taṃ prāha vākyaṃ devaḥ prajāpatiḥ 7.030.014c muktaś cendrajitā śakro gatāś ca tridivaṃ surāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1454: 7.030.015a etasminn antare śakro dīno bhraṣṭāmbarasrajaḥ 7.030.015c rāma cintāparītātmā dhyānatatparatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1455: 7.030.016a taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathābhūtaṃ prāha devaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1456: 7.030.016c śakrakrato kim utkaṇṭhāṃ karoṣi smara duṣkṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:1457: 7.030.017a amarendra mayā bahvyaḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ purā prabho
GE09ram_07_u:1458: 7.030.017c ekavarṇāḥ samābhāṣā ekarūpāś ca sarvaśaḥ 7.030.018a tāsāṃ nāsti viśeṣo hi darśane lakṣaṇe 'pi vā
GE09ram_07_u:1460: 7.030.019a so 'haṃ tāsāṃ viśeṣārthaṃ striyam ekāṃ vinirmame 7.030.019c yad yat prajānāṃ pratyaṅgaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ tat tad uddhṛtam 7.030.020a tato mayā rūpaguṇair ahalyā strī vinirmitā
GE09ram_07_u:1461: 7.030.020c ahalyety eva ca mayā tasyā nāma pravartitam
GE09ram_07_u:1462: 7.030.021a nirmitāyāṃ tu devendra tasyāṃ nāryāṃ surarṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:1464: 7.030.022a tvaṃ tu śakra tadā nārīṃ jānīṣe manasā prabho 7.030.022c sthānādhikatayā patnī mamaiṣeti puraṃdara
GE09ram_07_u:1465: 7.030.023a sā mayā nyāsabhūtā tu gautamasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1466: 7.030.023c nyastā bahūni varṣāṇi tena niryātitā ca sā
GE09ram_07_u:1467: 7.030.024a tatas tasya parijñāya mayā sthairyaṃ mahāmuneḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1468: 7.030.024c jñātvā tapasi siddhiṃ ca patnyarthaṃ sparśitā tadā
GE09ram_07_u:1469: 7.030.025a sa tayā saha dharmātmā ramate sma mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1470: 7.030.025c āsan nirāśā devās tu gautame dattayā tayā
GE09ram_07_u:1471: 7.030.026a tvaṃ kruddhas tv iha kāmātmā gatvā tasyāśramaṃ muneḥ 7.030.026c dṛṣṭavāṃś ca tadā tāṃ strīṃ dīptām agniśikhām iva 7.030.027a sā tvayā dharṣitā śakra kāmārtena samanyunā
GE09ram_07_u:1472: 7.030.027c dṛṣṭas tvaṃ ca tadā tena āśrame paramarṣiṇā
GE09ram_07_u:1473: 7.030.028a tataḥ kruddhena tenāsi śaptaḥ paramatejasā 7.030.028c gato 'si yena devendra
GE09ram_07_u:1474: 7.030.029a yasmān me dharṣitā patnī tvayā vāsava nirbhayam
GE09ram_07_u:1475: 7.030.029c tasmāt tvaṃ samare rājañ śatruhastaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:1476: 7.030.030a ayaṃ tu bhāvo durbuddhe yas tvayeha pravartitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1477: 7.030.030c mānuṣeṣv api sarveṣu bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1478: 7.030.031a tatrādharmaḥ subalavān samutthāsyati yo mahān 7.030.031c tatrārdhaṃ tasya yaḥ kartā tvayy ardhaṃ nipatiṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:1479: 7.030.032a na ca te sthāvaraṃ sthānaṃ bhaviṣyati puraṃdara
GE09ram_07_u:1481: 7.030.033a yaś ca yaś ca surendraḥ syād dhruvaḥ sa na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:1482: 7.030.033c eṣa śāpo mayā mukta ity asau tvāṃ tadābravīt 7.030.034a tāṃ tu bhāryāṃ vinirbhartsya so 'bravīt sumahātapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1485: 7.030.035c tasmād rūpavatī loke na tvam ekā bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:1486: 7.030.036a rūpaṃ ca tat prajāḥ sarvā gamiṣyanti sudurlabham
GE09ram_07_u:1488: 7.030.037a tadā prabhṛti bhūyiṣṭhaṃ prajā rūpasamanvitāḥ 7.030.037c śāpotsargād dhi tasyedaṃ muneḥ sarvam upāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:1489: 7.030.038a tat smara tvaṃ mahābāho duṣkṛtaṃ yat tvayā kṛtam 7.030.038c yena tvaṃ grahaṇaṃ śatror gato nānyena vāsava
GE09ram_07_u:1490: 7.030.039a śīghraṃ yajasva yajñaṃ tvaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1491: 7.030.039c pāvitas tena yajñena yāsyasi tridivaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1492: 7.030.040a putraś ca tava devendra na vinaṣṭo mahāraṇe
GE09ram_07_u:1493: 7.030.040c nītaḥ saṃnihitaś caiva aryakeṇa mahodadhau 7.030.041a etac chrutvā mahendras tu yajñam iṣṭvā ca vaiṣṇavam 7.030.041c punas tridivam ākrāmad anvaśāsac ca devatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1494: 7.030.042a etad indrajito rāma balaṃ yat kīrtitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_07_u:1495: 7.030.042c nirjitas tena devendraḥ prāṇino 'nye ca kiṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1496: 7.031.001a tato rāmo mahātejā vismayāt punar eva hi
GE09ram_07_u:1497: 7.031.001c uvāca praṇato vākyam agastyam ṛṣisattamam 7.031.002a bhagavan kiṃ tadā lokāḥ śūnyā āsan dvijottama
GE09ram_07_u:1498: 7.031.002c dharṣaṇāṃ yatra na prāpto rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1499: 7.031.003a utāho hīnavīryās te babhuvuḥ pṛthivīkṣitaḥ 7.031.003c bahiṣkṛtā varāstraiś ca bahavo nirjitā nṛpāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1500: 7.031.004a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1501: 7.031.004c uvāca rāmaṃ prahasan pitāmaha iveśvaram 7.031.005a sa evaṃ bādhamānas tu pārthivān
GE09ram_07_u:1502: 7.031.005c cacāra rāvaṇo rāma pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpate 7.031.006a tato māhiṣmatīṃ nāma purīṃ svargapurīprabhām 7.031.006c saṃprāpto yatra sāmnidhyaṃ paramaṃ vasuretasaḥ 7.031.007a tulya āsīn nṛpas tasya pratāpād vasuretasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1503: 7.031.007c arjuno nāma yasyāgniḥ śarakuṇḍe śayaḥ sadā
GE09ram_07_u:1504: 7.031.008a tam eva divasaṃ so 'tha haihayādhipatir balī 7.031.008c arjuno narmadāṃ rantuṃ gataḥ strībhiḥ saheśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1505: 7.031.009a rāvaṇo rākṣasendras tu tasyāmātyān apṛcchata 7.031.009c kvārjuno vo nṛpaḥ so 'dya śīghram ākhyātum arhatha
GE09ram_07_u:1510: 7.031.012a śrutvā viśravasaḥ putraḥ paurāṇām arjunaṃ gatam
GE09ram_07_u:1512: 7.031.013a sa tam abhram ivāviṣṭam udbhrāntam iva medinīm
GE09ram_07_u:1513: 7.031.013c apaśyad rāvaṇo vindhyam ālikhantam ivāmbaram 7.031.014a sahasraśikharopetaṃ siṃhādhyuṣitakandaram 7.031.014c prapāta patitaiḥ śītaiḥ sāṭṭahāsam ivāmbubhiḥ 7.031.015a devadānavagandharvaiḥ sāpsarogaṇakiṃnaraiḥ 7.031.015c sāha strībhiḥ krīḍamānaiḥ svargabhūtaṃ mahocchrayam 7.031.016a nadībhiḥ syandamānābhir agatipratimaṃ jalam
GE09ram_07_u:1514: 7.031.016c sphuṭībhiś calajihvābhir vamantam iva viṣṭhitam 7.031.017a ulkāvantaṃ darīvantaṃ himavatsaṃnibhaṃ girim
GE09ram_07_u:1515: 7.031.017c paśyamānas tato vindhyaṃ rāvaṇo narmadāṃ yayau
GE09ram_07_u:1520: 7.031.019c sārasaiś ca sadāmattaiḥ kokūjadbhiḥ samāvṛtām 7.031.020a phulladrumakṛtottaṃsāṃ cakravākayugastanīm 7.031.020c vistīrṇapulinaśroṇīṃ haṃsāvalisumekhalām 7.031.021a puṣpareṇvanuliptāṅgīṃ jalaphenāmalāṃśukām 7.031.021c jalāvagāhasaṃsparśāṃ phullotpalaśubhekṣaṇām 7.031.022a puṣpakād avaruhyāśu narmadāṃ saritāṃ varām 7.031.022c iṣṭām iva varāṃ nārīm avagāhya daśānanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1521: 7.031.023a sa tasyāḥ puline ramye nānākusumaśobhite 7.031.023c upopaviṣṭaḥ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:1522: 7.031.023e narmadā darśajaṃ harṣam āptavān rākṣaseśvaraḥ 7.031.024a tataḥ salīlaṃ prahasān rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ 7.031.024c uvāca sacivāṃs tatra mārīcaśukasāraṇān
GE09ram_07_u:1523: 7.031.025a eṣa raśmisahasreṇa jagat kṛtveva kāñcanam 7.031.025c tīkṣṇatāpakaraḥ sūryo nabhaso madhyam āsthitaḥ 7.031.025e mām āsīnaṃ viditveha candrāyāti divākaraḥ 7.031.026a narmadā jalaśītaś ca sugandhiḥ śramanāaśanaḥ 7.031.026c madbhayād anilo hy eṣa vāty asau susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1524: 7.031.027a iyaṃ cāpi saricchreṣṭhā narmadā narma vardhinī
GE09ram_07_u:1526: 7.031.028a tad bhavantaḥ kṣatāḥ śastrair nṛpair indrasamair yudhi
GE09ram_07_u:1528: 7.031.029a te yūyam avagāhadhvaṃ narmadāṃ śarmadāṃ nṛṇām
GE09ram_07_u:1529: 7.031.029c mahāpadmamukhā mattā gaṅgām iva mahāgajāḥ 7.031.030a asyāṃ snātvā mahānadyāṃ pāpmānaṃ vipramokṣyatha 7.031.031a aham apy atra puline śaradindusamaprabhe 7.031.031c puṣpopaharaṃ śanakaiḥ kariṣyāmi umāpateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1532: 7.031.033a rākṣasendragajais tais tu kṣobhyate narmadā nadī
GE09ram_07_u:1534: 7.031.034a tatas te rākṣasāaḥ snātvā narmadāyā varāmbhasi
GE09ram_07_u:1535: 7.031.034c uttīrya puṣpāṇy ājahrur balyarthaṃ rāvaṇasya tu
GE09ram_07_u:1537: 7.031.035c rākṣasendrair muhūrtena kṛtaḥ puṣpamayo giriḥ 7.031.036a puṣpeṣūpahṛteṣv eva rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1538: 7.031.036c avatīrṇo nadīṃ snātuṃ gaṅgām iva mahāgajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1539: 7.031.037a tatra snātvā ca vidhivaj japtvā japyam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:1540: 7.031.037c narmadā salilāt tasmād uttatāra sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1541: 7.031.038a rāvaṇaṃ prāñjaliṃ yāntam anvayuḥ saptarākṣasāḥ 7.031.038c yatra yatra sa yāti sma rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1542: 7.031.038e jāmbūnadamayaṃ liṅgaṃ tatra tatra sma nīyate
GE09ram_07_u:1543: 7.031.039a vālukavedimadhye tu tal liṅgaṃ sthāpya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1544: 7.031.039c arcayām āsa gandhaiś ca puṣpaiś cāmṛtagandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1545: 7.031.040a tataḥ satām ārtiharaṃ haraṃ paraṃ; varapradaṃ candramayūkhabhūṣaṇam 7.031.040c samarcayitvā sa niśācaro jagau; prasārya hastān praṇanarta
GE09ram_07_u:1547: 7.032.001a narmadā puline yatra rākṣasendraḥ sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1548: 7.032.001c puṣpopahāraṃ kurute tasmād deśād adūrataḥ 7.032.002a arjuno jayatāṃ śreṣṭho māhiṣmatyāḥ patiḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1549: 7.032.002c krīḍite saha nārībhir narmadātoyam āśritaḥ 7.032.003a tāsāṃ madhyagato rāja rarāja sa tato 'rjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1550: 7.032.003c kareṇūnāṃ sahasrasya madhyastha iva kuñjaraḥ 7.032.004a jijñāsuḥ sa tu bāhūnāṃ sahasrasyottamaṃ balam
GE09ram_07_u:1551: 7.032.004c rurodha narmadā vegaṃ bāhubhiḥ sa tadārjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1552: 7.032.005a kārtavīryabhujāsetuṃ taj jalaṃ prāpya nirmalam 7.032.005c kūlāpahāraṃ kurvāṇaṃ pratisrotaḥ pradhāvati
GE09ram_07_u:1553: 7.032.006a samīnanakramakaraḥ sapuṣpakuśasaṃstaraḥ 7.032.006c sa narmadāmbhaso vegaḥ prāvṛṭkāla ivābabhau 7.032.007a sa vegaḥ kārtavīryeṇa saṃpreṣiṭa ivāmbhasaḥ 7.032.007c puṣpopahāraṃ tat sarvaṃ rāvaṇasya jahāra ha
GE09ram_07_u:1555: 7.032.008c narmadāṃ paśyate kāntāṃ pratikūlāṃ yathā priyām
GE09ram_07_u:1556: 7.032.009a paścimena tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā sāgarodgārasaṃnibham 7.032.009c vardhantam ambhaso vegaṃ pūrvām āśāṃ praviśya tu
GE09ram_07_u:1561: 7.032.012a tau tu rāvaṇasaṃdiṣṭau bhrātarau śukasāraṇau 7.032.012c vyomāntaracarau vīrau prasthitau paścimonmukhau
GE09ram_07_u:1562: 7.032.013a ardhayojanamātraṃ tu gatvā tau tu niśācarau
GE09ram_07_u:1563: 7.032.013c paśyetāṃ puruṣaṃ toye krīḍantaṃ sahayoṣitam 7.032.014a bṛhatsālapratīkaśaṃ toyavyākulamūrdhajam 7.032.014c madaraktāntanayanaṃ madanākāravarcasaṃ 7.032.015a nadīṃ bāhusahasreṇa rundhantam arimardanam
GE09ram_07_u:1564: 7.032.015c giriṃ pādasahasreṇa rundhantam iva medinīm 7.032.016a bālānāṃ varanārīṇāṃ sahasreṇābhisaṃvṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:1566: 7.032.017a tam adbhutatamaṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasau śukasāraṇau 7.032.017c saṃnivṛttāv upāgamya rāvaṇaṃ tam athocatuḥ 7.032.018a bṛhatsālapratīkāśaḥ ko 'py asau rākṣaseśvara 7.032.018c narmadāṃ rodhavad ruddhvā krīḍāpayati yoṣitaḥ 7.032.019a tena bāhusahasreṇa saṃniruddhajalā nadī
GE09ram_07_u:1568: 7.032.020a ity evaṃ bhāṣamāṇau tau niśamya śukasāraṇau
GE09ram_07_u:1571: 7.032.021c sakṛd eva kṛto rāvaḥ saraktaḥ preṣito ghanaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1573: 7.032.022c saṃvṛto rākṣasendras tu tatrāgād yatra so 'rjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1574: 7.032.023a nātidīrgheṇa kālena sa tato rākṣaso balī
GE09ram_07_u:1575: 7.032.023c taṃ narmadā hradaṃ bhīmam ājagāmāñjanaprabhaḥ 7.032.024a sa tatra strīparivṛtaṃ vāśitābhir iva dvipam
GE09ram_07_u:1576: 7.032.024c narendraṃ paśyate rājā rākṣasānāṃ tadārjunam 7.032.025a sa roṣād raktanayano rākṣasendro baloddhataḥ 7.032.025c ity evam arjunāmātyān āha gambhīrayā girā
GE09ram_07_u:1577: 7.032.026a amātyāḥ kṣipram ākhyāta haihayasya nṛpasya vai
GE09ram_07_u:1578: 7.032.026c yuddhārthaṃ samanuprāpto rāvaṇo nāma nāmataḥ 7.032.027a rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā mantriṇo 'thārjunasya te
GE09ram_07_u:1579: 7.032.027c uttasthuḥ sāyudhās taṃ ca rāvaṇaṃ vākyam abruvan
GE09ram_07_u:1580: 7.032.028a yuddhasya kālo vijñātaḥ sādhu bhoḥ sādhu rāvaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:1581: 7.032.028c yaḥ kṣībaṃ strīvṛtaṃ caiva yoddhum icchasi no nṛpam 7.032.028e vāśitāmadhyagaṃ mattaṃ śārdūla iva kuñjaram 7.032.029a kṣamasvādya daśagrīva uṣyatāṃ rajanī tvayā 7.032.029c yuddhaśraddhā tu yady asti śvas tāta samare 'rjunam
GE09ram_07_u:1582: 7.032.030a yadi vāpi tvarā tubhyaṃ yuddhatṛṣṇāsamāvṛtā 7.032.030c nihatyāsmāṃs tato yuddham
GE09ram_07_u:1583: 7.032.031a tatas te rāvaṇāmātyair amātyāḥ pārthivasya tu
GE09ram_07_u:1584: 7.032.031c sūditāś cāpi te yuddhe bhakṣitāś ca bubhukṣitaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1585: 7.032.032a tato halahalāśabdo narmadā tira ābabhau 7.032.032c arjunasyānuyātrāṇāṃ rāvaṇasya ca mantriṇām
GE09ram_07_u:1586: 7.032.033a iṣubhis tomaraiḥ śūlair vajrakalpaiḥ sakarṣaṇaiḥ 7.032.033c sarāvaṇān ardayantaḥ samantāt samabhidrutāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1588: 7.032.034c sanakramīnamakarasamudrasyeva nisvanaḥ 7.032.035a rāvaṇasya tu te 'mātyāḥ prahastaśukasāraṇāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1590: 7.032.036a arjunāya tu tat karma rāvaṇasya samantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1592: 7.032.037a uktvā na bhetavyam iti strījanaṃ sa tato 'rjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1593: 7.032.037c uttatāra jalāt tasmād gaṅgātoyād ivāñjanaḥ 7.032.038a krodhadūṣitanetras tu sa tato 'rjuna pāvakaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1594: 7.032.038c prajajvāla mahāghoro yugānta iva pāvakaḥ 7.032.039a sa tūrṇataram ādāya varahemāṅgado gadām 7.032.039c abhidravati rakṣāṃsi tamāṃsīva divākaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1598: 7.032.041c sthito vindhya ivākampyaḥ prahasto musalāyudhaḥ 7.032.042a tato 'sya musalaṃ ghoraṃ lohabaddhaṃ madoddhataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1599: 7.032.042c prahastaḥ preṣayan kruddho rarāsa ca yathāmbudaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1603: 7.032.044c nipuṇaṃ vañcayām āsa sagado gajavikramaḥ 7.032.045a tatas tam abhidudrāva prahastaṃ haihayādhipaḥ 7.032.045c bhrāmayāṇo gadāṃ gurvīṃ pañcabāhuśatocchrayām
GE09ram_07_u:1605: 7.032.046c nipapāta sthitaḥ śailo vajrivajrahato yathā 7.032.047a prahastaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā
GE09ram_07_u:1607: 7.032.048a apakrānteṣv amātyeṣu prahaste ca nipātite 7.032.048c rāvaṇo 'bhyadravat tūrṇam arjunaṃ nṛpasattamam
GE09ram_07_u:1608: 7.032.049a sahasrabāhos tad yuddhaṃ viṃśadbāhoś ca dāruṇam
GE09ram_07_u:1610: 7.032.050a sāgarāv iva saṃkṣubdhau calamūlāv ivācalau 7.032.050c tejoyuktāv ivādityau pradahantāv
GE09ram_07_u:1611: 7.032.051a baloddhatau yathā nāgau vāśitārthe yathā vṛṣau
GE09ram_07_u:1612: 7.032.051c meghāv iva vinardantau siṃhāv iva balotkaṭau
GE09ram_07_u:1613: 7.032.052a rudrakālāv iva kruddhau tau tathā rākṣasārjunau
GE09ram_07_u:1614: 7.032.052c parasparaṃ gadābhyāṃ tau tāḍayām āsatur bhṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:1615: 7.032.053a vajraprahārān acalā yathā ghorān viṣehire 7.032.053c gadāprahārāṃs tadvat tau sahete nararākṣasau 7.032.054a yathāśaniravebhyas tu jāyate vai pratiśrutiḥ 7.032.054c tathā tābhyāṃ gadāpātair diśaḥ sarvāḥ pratiśrutāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1616: 7.032.055a arjunasya gadā sā tu pātyamānāhitorasi 7.032.055c kāñcanābhaṃ nabhaś cakre vidyutsaudāmanī yathā 7.032.056a tathaiva rāvaṇenāpi pātyamānā muhur muhuḥ 7.032.056c arjunorasi nirbhāti gadolkeva mahāgirau
GE09ram_07_u:1617: 7.032.057a nārjunaḥ khedam āpnoti na rākṣasagaṇeśvaraḥ 7.032.057c samam āsīt tayor yuddhaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ balīndrayoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1618: 7.032.058a śṛṅgair maharṣabhau yadvad dantāgrair iva kuñjarau
GE09ram_07_u:1621: 7.032.059c stanayor antare muktā rāvaṇasya mahāhave 7.032.060a varadānakṛtatrāṇe sā gadā
GE09ram_07_u:1622: 7.032.060c durbaleva yathā senā dvidhābhūtāpatat kṣitau 7.032.061a sa tv arjunapramuktena gadāpātena rāvaṇaḥ 7.032.061c apāsarpad dhanurmātraṃ niṣasāada ca niṣṭanan 7.032.062a sa vihvalaṃ tad ālakṣya daśagrīvaṃ tato 'rjunaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1623: 7.032.062c sahasā pratijagrāha garutmān iva pannagam 7.032.063a sa taṃ bāhusahasreṇa balād gṛhya daśānanam
GE09ram_07_u:1624: 7.032.063c babandha balavān rājā baliṃ nārāyaṇo yathā
GE09ram_07_u:1626: 7.032.064c sādhvīti vādinaḥ puṣpaiḥ kiranty arjunamūrdhani 7.032.065a vyāghro mṛgam ivādāya siṃharāḍ iva dantinam
GE09ram_07_u:1627: 7.032.065c rarāsa haihayo rājā harṣād ambudavan muhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1628: 7.032.066a prahastas tu samāśvasto dṛṣṭvā baddhaṃ daśānanam
GE09ram_07_u:1629: 7.032.066c saha tai rākasaiḥ kruddha abhidudrāva pārthivam
GE09ram_07_u:1630: 7.032.067a naktaṃcarāṇāṃ vegas tu teṣām āpatatāṃ babhau
GE09ram_07_u:1632: 7.032.068a muñca muñceti bhāṣantas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cāsakṛt
GE09ram_07_u:1633: 7.032.068c musalāni ca śūlāni utsasarjus tadārjune 7.032.069a aprāptāny eva tāny āśu asaṃbhrāntas
GE09ram_07_u:1635: 7.032.070a tatas tair eva rakṣāṃsi durdharaiḥ pravarāyudhaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1636: 7.032.070c bhittvā vidrāvayām āsa vāyur ambudharān iva
GE09ram_07_u:1637: 7.032.071a rākṣasāṃs trāsayitvā tu kārtavīryārjunas tadā 7.032.071c rāvaṇaṃ gṛhya nagaraṃ praviveśa suhṛdvṛtaḥ 7.032.072a sa kīryamāṇaḥ kusumākṣatotkarair; dvijaiḥ sapauraiḥ puruhūtasaṃnibhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1638: 7.032.072c tadārjunaḥ saṃpraviveśa tāṃ purīṃ; baliṃ nigṛhyaiva sahasralocanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1640: 7.033.001c ṛṣiḥ pulastyaḥ śuśrāva kathitaṃ divi daivataiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1642: 7.033.002c māhiṣmatīpatiṃ draṣṭum ājagāma mahān ṛṣiḥ 7.033.003a sa vāyumārgam āsthāya vāyutulyagatir dvijaḥ 7.033.003c purīṃ māhiṣmatīṃ prāpto manaḥsaṃtāpavikramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1646: 7.033.005c tatas te pratyabhijñāya arjunāya nyavedayan 7.033.006a pulastya iti taṃ śrutvā vacanaṃ haihayādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1647: 7.033.006c śirasy añjalim uddhṛtya pratyudgacchad dvijottamam 7.033.007a purohito 'sya gṛhyārghyaṃ madhuparkaṃ tathāiva ca
GE09ram_07_u:1648: 7.033.007c purastāt prayayau rājña indrasyeva bṛhaspatiḥ 7.033.008a tatas tam ṛṣim āyāntam udyantam iva bhāskaram
GE09ram_07_u:1649: 7.033.008c arjuno dṛśya saṃprāptaṃ vavandendra iveśvaram 7.033.009a sa tasya madhuparkaṃ ca pādyam arghyaṃ ca dāpayan 7.033.009c pulastyam āha rājendro harṣagadgadayā girā 7.033.010a adyeyam amarāvatyā tulyā māhiṣmatī kṛtā 7.033.010c adyāhaṃ tu dvijendrendra yasmāt paśyāmi durdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:1650: 7.033.011a adya me kuśalaṃ deva adya me kulam uddhṛtam 7.033.011c yat te devagaṇair vandyau vande 'haṃ caraṇāv imau 7.033.012a idaṃ rājyam ime putrā ime dārā ime vayam 7.033.012c brahman kiṃ kurma kiṃ kāryam ājñāpayatu no bhavān 7.033.013a taṃ dharme 'gniṣu bhṛtyeṣu śivaṃ pṛṣṭvātha pārthivam
GE09ram_07_u:1653: 7.033.014c atulaṃ te balaṃ yena daśagrīvas tvayā jitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1655: 7.033.015c so 'yam adya tvayā baddhaḥ pautro me 'tīvadurjayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1656: 7.033.016a tat putraka yaśaḥ sphītaṃ nāma viśrāvitaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:1660: 7.033.018a sa taṃ pramuktvā tridaśārim arjunaḥ; prapūjya divyābharaṇasragambaraiḥ 7.033.018c ahiṃsākaṃ sakhyam upetya sāgnikaṃ; praṇamya sa brahmasutaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:1661: gṛhaṃ yayau 7.033.019a pulastyenāpi saṃgamya rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_07_u:1664: 7.033.020c mocayitvā daśagrīvaṃ brahmalokaṃ jagāma saḥ 7.033.021a evaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ prāptaḥ kārtavīryāt tu dharṣaṇāt
GE09ram_07_u:1665: 7.033.021c pulastyavacanāc cāpi punar mokṣam avāptavān 7.033.022a evaṃ balibhyo balinaḥ santi rāghavanandana 7.033.022c nāvajñā parataḥ kāryā ya icchec chreya ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1666: 7.033.023a tataḥ sa rājā piśitāśanānāṃ; sahasrabāhor upalabhya maitrīm
GE09ram_07_u:1667: 7.033.023c punar narāṇāṃ kadanaṃ cakāra; cacāra sarvāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca darpāt 7.034.001a arjunena vimuktas tu rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ 7.034.001c cacāra pṛthivīṃ sarvām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1668: 7.034.002a rākṣasaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā śṛṇute yaṃ balādhikam
GE09ram_07_u:1669: 7.034.002c rāvaṇas taṃ samāsādya yuddhe hvayati darpitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1670: 7.034.003a tataḥ kadā cit kiṣkindhāṃ nagarīṃ vālipālitām
GE09ram_07_u:1672: 7.034.004a tatas taṃ vānarāmātyas tāras tārāpitā prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1673: 7.034.004c uvāca rāvaṇaṃ vākyaṃ yuddhaprepsum upāgatam 7.034.005a rākṣasendra gato vālī yas te pratibalo bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:1674: 7.034.005c nānyaḥ pramukhataḥ sthātuṃ tava śaktaḥ plavaṃgamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1676: 7.034.006c imaṃ muhūrtam āyāti vālī tiṣṭha muhūrtakam
GE09ram_07_u:1677: 7.034.007a etān asthicayān paśya ya ete śaṅkhapāṇḍurāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1679: 7.034.008a yad vāmṛtarasaḥ pītas tvayā rāvaṇarākṣasa 7.034.008c tathā vālinam āsādya tadantaṃ tava jīvitam
GE09ram_07_u:1680: 7.034.009a atha vā tvarase martuṃ gaccha dakṣiṇasāgaram
GE09ram_07_u:1681: 7.034.009c vālinaṃ drakṣyase tatra bhūmiṣṭham iva bhāskaram
GE09ram_07_u:1682: 7.034.010a sa tu tāraṃ vinirbhartsya rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1683: 7.034.010c puṣpakaṃ tat samāruhya prayayau dakṣiṇārṇavam 7.034.011a tatra hemagiriprakhyaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:1686: 7.034.012c grahītuṃ vālinaṃ tūrṇaṃ niḥśabdapadam ādravat 7.034.013a yadṛcchayonmīlayatā vālināpi sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1687: 7.034.013c pāpābhiprāyavān dṛṣṭaś cakāra na ca saṃbhramam
GE09ram_07_u:1688: 7.034.014a śaśam ālakṣya siṃho vā pannagaṃ garuḍo yathā
GE09ram_07_u:1689: 7.034.014c na cintayati taṃ vālī rāvaṇaṃ pāpaniścayam
GE09ram_07_u:1694: 7.034.017a ity evaṃ matim āsthāya vālī karṇam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1695: 7.034.017c japan vai naigamān mantrāṃs tasthau parvatarāḍ iva
GE09ram_07_u:1697: 7.034.018c prayatnavantau tat karma īhatur baladarpitau 7.034.019a hastagrāhyaṃ tu taṃ matvā pādaśabdena rāvaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:1699: 7.034.020a grahītukāmaṃ taṃ gṛhya rakṣasām īśvaraṃ hariḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1700: 7.034.020c kham utpapāta vegena kṛtvā kakṣāvalambinam 7.034.021a sa taṃ pīḍdayamānas tu vitudantaṃ nakhair muhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1701: 7.034.021c jahāra rāvaṇaṃ vālī pavanas toyadaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:1702: 7.034.022a atha te rākṣasāmātyā hriyamāṇe daśānane 7.034.022c mumokṣayiṣavo ghorā ravamāṇā hy abhidravan 7.034.023a anvīyamānas tair vālī bhrājate 'mbaramadhyagaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1705: 7.034.024c tasya bāhūruvegena pariśrāntaḥ patanti ca 7.034.025a vālimārgād apākrāman parvatendrā hi gacchataḥ 7.034.026a apakṣigaṇasaṃpāto vānarendro mahājavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1706: 7.034.026c kramaśaḥ sāgarān sarvān saṃdhyākālam avandata 7.034.027a sabhājyamāno bhūtais tu khecaraiḥ khecaro hariḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1707: 7.034.027c paścimaṃ sāgaraṃ vālī ājagāma sarāvaṇaḥ 7.034.028a tatra saṃdhyām upāsitvā snātvā japtvā ca vānaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1708: 7.034.028c uttaraṃ sāgaraṃ prāyād vahamāno daśānanam 7.034.029a uttare sāgare saṃdhyām upāsitvā daśānanam 7.034.029c vahamāno 'gamad vālī pūrvam ambumahānidhim
GE09ram_07_u:1709: 7.034.030a tatrāpi saṃdhyām anvāsya vāsaviḥ sa harīśvaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1710: 7.034.030c kiṣkindhābhimukho gṛhya rāvaṇaṃ punar āgamat 7.034.031a caturṣv api samudreṣu saṃdhyām anvāsya vānaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1712: 7.034.032a rāvaṇaṃ tu mumocātha svakakṣāt kapisattamaḥ 7.034.032c kutas tvam iti covāca prahasan rāvaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:1713: 7.034.033a vismayaṃ tu mahad gatvā śramalokanirīkṣaṇaḥ 7.034.033c rākṣaseśo harīśaṃ tam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:1715: 7.034.034c yuddhepsur ahaṃ saṃprāptaḥ sa cādyāsāditas tvayā
GE09ram_07_u:1716: 7.034.035a aho balam aho vīryam aho gambhīratā ca te 7.034.035c yenāhaṃ paśuvad gṛhya bhrāmitaś caturo 'rṇavān
GE09ram_07_u:1717: 7.034.036a evam aśrāntavad vīra śīghram eva ca vānara
GE09ram_07_u:1718: 7.034.036c māṃ caivodvahamānas tu ko 'nyo vīraḥ kramiṣyati 7.034.037a trayāṇām eva bhūtānāṃ gatir eṣā plavaṃgama
GE09ram_07_u:1721: 7.034.038c tvayā saha ciraṃ sakhyaṃ susnigdhaṃ pāvakāgrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1722: 7.034.039a dārāḥ putrāḥ puraṃ rāṣṭraṃ bhogācchādanabhojanam 7.034.039c sarvam evāvibhaktaṃ nau bhaviṣyati harīśvara 7.034.040a tataḥ prajvālayitvāgniṃ tāv ubhau harirākṣasau 7.034.040c bhrātṛtvam upasaṃpannau pariṣvajya parasparam
GE09ram_07_u:1723: 7.034.041a anyonyaṃ lambitakarau tatas tau harirākṣasau 7.034.041c kiṣkindhāṃ viśatur hṛṣṭau siṃhau giriguhām iva
GE09ram_07_u:1724: 7.034.042a sa tatra māsam uṣitaḥ sugrīva iva rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1726: 7.034.043a evam etat purāvṛttaṃ vālinā rāvaṇaḥ prabho
GE09ram_07_u:1727: 7.034.043c dharṣitaś ca kṛtaś cāpi bhrātā pāvakasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_07_u:1729: 7.034.044c so 'pi tayā vinirdagdhaḥ śalabho vahninā yathā 7.035.001a apṛcchata tato rāmo dakṣiṇāśālayaṃ munim 7.035.001c prāñjalir vinayopeta idam āha vaco 'rthavat
GE09ram_07_u:1730: 7.035.002a atulaṃ balam etābhyāṃ vālino rāvaṇasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:1731: 7.035.002c na tv etau hanumadvīryaiḥ samāv iti matir mama 7.035.003a śauryaṃ dākṣyaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ prājñatā nayasādhanam
GE09ram_07_u:1732: 7.035.003c vikramaś ca prabhāvaś ca hanūmati kṛtālayāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1734: 7.035.004c samāśvāsya kapīn bhūyo yojanānāṃ śataṃ plutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1735: 7.035.005a dharṣayitvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ tathā 7.035.005c dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣitā cāpi sītā viśvāsitā tathā
GE09ram_07_u:1737: 7.035.006c ete hanumatā tatra ekena vinipātitāḥ 7.035.007a bhūyo bandhād vimuktena saṃbhāṣitvā daśānanam 7.035.007c laṅkā bhasmīkṛtā tena pāvakeneva medinī 7.035.008a na kālasya na śakrasya na viṣṇor vittapasya ca 7.035.008c karmāṇi tāni śrūyante yāni yuddhe hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1738: 7.035.009a etasya bāhuvīryeṇa laṅkā sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1739: 7.035.009c prāpto mayā jayaś caiva rājyaṃ mitrāṇi bāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1740: 7.035.010a hanūmān yadi me na syād vānarādhipateḥ sakhā
GE09ram_07_u:1741: 7.035.010c pravṛttam api ko vettuṃ jānakyāḥ śaktimān bhavet
GE09ram_07_u:1743: 7.035.011c tadā vaire samutpanne na dagdho vīrudho yathā
GE09ram_07_u:1744: 7.035.012a na hi veditavān manye hanūmān ātmano balam
GE09ram_07_u:1745: 7.035.012c yad dṛṣṭavāñ jīviteṣṭaṃ kliśyantaṃ vānarādhipam 7.035.013a etan me bhagavan sarvaṃ hanūmati mahāmune
GE09ram_07_u:1747: 7.035.014a rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā hetuyuktam ṛṣis tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1748: 7.035.014c hanūmataḥ samakṣaṃ tam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:1749: 7.035.015a satyam etad raghuśreṣṭha yad bravīṣi hanūmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1750: 7.035.015c na bale vidyate tulyo na gatau na matau paraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1751: 7.035.016a amoghaśāpaiḥ śāpas tu datto 'sya ṛṣibhiḥ purā 7.035.016c na veditā balaṃ yena balī sann arimardanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1752: 7.035.017a bālye 'py etena yat karma kṛtaṃ rāma mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:1753: 7.035.017c tan na varṇayituṃ śakyam atibālatayāsya te
GE09ram_07_u:1754: 7.035.018a yadi vāsti tv abhiprāyas tac chrotuṃ tava rāghava 7.035.018c samādhāya matiṃ rāma niśāmaya vadāmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:1756: 7.035.019c yatra rājyaṃ praśāsty asya keṣarī nāma vai pitā 7.035.020a tasya bhāryā babhūveṣṭā hy añjaneti pariśrutā
GE09ram_07_u:1757: 7.035.020c janayām āsa tasyāṃ vai vāyur ātmajam uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:1759: 7.035.021c phalāny āhartukāmā vai niṣkrāntā gahane carā
GE09ram_07_u:1760: 7.035.022a eṣa mātur viyogāc ca kṣudhayā ca bhṛśārditaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1761: 7.035.022c ruroda śiśur atyarthaṃ śiśuḥ śarabharāḍ iva
GE09ram_07_u:1763: 7.035.023c dadṛśe phalalobhāc ca utpapāta raviṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:1764: 7.035.024a bālārkābhimukho bālo bālārka iva mūrtimān 7.035.024c grahītukāmo bālārkaṃ plavate
GE09ram_07_u:1765: 7.035.025a etasmin plavanāne tu śiśubhāve hanūmati 7.035.025c devadānavasiddhānāṃ vismayaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE09ram_07_u:1766: 7.035.026a nāpy evaṃ vegavān vāyur garuḍo na manas tathā 7.035.026c yathāyaṃ vāyuputras tu kramate 'mbaram uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:1767: 7.035.027a yadi tāvac chiśor asya īdṛśau gativikramau
GE09ram_07_u:1768: 7.035.027c yauvanaṃ balam āsādya kathaṃ vego bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:1769: 7.035.028a tam anuplavate vāyuḥ plavantaṃ putram ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1772: 7.035.029c pitur balāc ca bālyāc ca bhāskarābhyāśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1773: 7.035.030a śiśur eṣa tv adoṣajña iti matvā divākaraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1774: 7.035.030c kāryaṃ cātra samāyattam ity evaṃ na dadāha saḥ 7.035.031a yam eva divasaṃ hy eṣa grahītuṃ bhāskaraṃ plutaḥ 7.035.031c tam eva divasaṃ rāhur jighṛkṣati divākaram
GE09ram_07_u:1775: 7.035.032a anena ca parāmṛṣṭo rāma sūryarathopati 7.035.032c apakrāntas tatas trasto rāhuś candrārkamardanaḥ 7.035.033a sa indrabhavanaṃ gatvā saroṣaḥ siṃhikāsutaḥ 7.035.033c abravīd bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā devaṃ devagaṇair vṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:1776: 7.035.034a bubhukṣāpanayaṃ dattvā candrārkau mama vāsava 7.035.034c kim idaṃ tat tvayā dattam anyasya balavṛtrahan
GE09ram_07_u:1777: 7.035.035a adyāhaṃ parvakāle tu jighṛkṣuḥ sūryam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1778: 7.035.035c athānyo rāhur āsādya jagrāha sahasā ravim
GE09ram_07_u:1779: 7.035.036a sa rāhor vacanaṃ śrutvā vāsavaḥ saṃbhramānvitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:1783: 7.035.038a indraḥ karīndram āruhya rāhuṃ kṛtvā puraḥsaram
GE09ram_07_u:1784: 7.035.038c prāyād yatrābhavat sūryaḥ sahānena hanūmatā 7.035.039a athātirabhasenāgād rāhur utsṛjya vāsavam
GE09ram_07_u:1785: 7.035.039c anena ca sa vai dṛṣṭa ādhāvañ śailakūṭavat
GE09ram_07_u:1786: 7.035.040a tataḥ sūryaṃ samutsṛjya rāhum evam avekṣya ca
GE09ram_07_u:1787: 7.035.040c utpapāta punar vyoma grahītuṃ siṃhikā sutam
GE09ram_07_u:1788: 7.035.041a utsṛjyārkam imaṃ rāma ādhāvantaṃ plavaṃgamam 7.035.041c dṛṣṭvā rāhuḥ parāvṛtya mukhaśeṣaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ 7.035.042a indram āśaṃsamānas tu trātāraṃ siṃhikāsutaḥ 7.035.042c indra indreti saṃtrāsān muhur muhur abhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:1789: 7.035.043a rāhor vikrośamānasya prāg evālakṣitaḥ svaraḥ 7.035.043c śrutvendrovāca māṃ bhaiṣīr ayam enaṃ nihanmy aham
GE09ram_07_u:1790: 7.035.044a airāvataṃ tato dṛṣṭvā mahat tad idam ity api 7.035.044c phalaṃ taṃ hastirājānam abhidudrāva mārutiḥ 7.035.045a tadāsya dhāvato rūpam airāvatajighṛkṣayā
GE09ram_07_u:1791: 7.035.045c muhūrtam abhavad ghoram indrāgnyor iva bhāsvaram
GE09ram_07_u:1792: 7.035.046a evam ādhāvamānaṃ tu nātikruddhaḥ śacīpatiḥ 7.035.046c hastāntenātimuktena kuliśenābhyatāḍayat 7.035.047a tato girau papātaiṣa indravajrābhitāḍitaḥ
