GE09ram_07_u:2698: 7.065.024e kṣipraṃ hi narakaṃ yāti sa ca rājā na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2699: 7.065.025a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla mārgasva viṣayaṃ svakam
GE09ram_07_u:2700: 7.065.025c duṣkṛtaṃ yatra paśyethās tatra yatnaṃ samācara
GE09ram_07_u:2701: 7.065.026a evaṃ te dharmavṛddhiś ca nṛṇāṃ cāyurvivardhanam
GE09ram_07_u:2702: 7.065.026c bhaviṣyati naraśreṣṭha bālasyāsya ca jīvitam 7.066.001a nāradasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvāmṛtamayaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:2703: 7.066.001c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe lakṣmaṇaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:2704: 7.066.002a gaccha saumya dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ samāśvāsaya lakṣmaṇa 7.066.002c bālasya ca śarīraṃ tat tailadroṇyāṃ nidhāpaya
GE09ram_07_u:2705: 7.066.003a gandhaiś ca paramodārais tailaiś ca susugandhibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2706: 7.066.003c yathā na kṣīyate bālas tathā saumya vidhīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:2708: 7.066.004c vipattiḥ paribhedo vā bhaven na ca tathā kuru 7.066.005a tathā saṃdiśya kākutstho lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam 7.066.005c manasā puṣpakaṃ dadhyāv āgaccheti mahāyaśāḥ 7.066.006a iṅgitaṃ sa tu vijñāya puṣpako hemabhūṣitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2709: 7.066.006c ājagāma muhūrtena saṃpīpaṃ rāghavasya vai 7.066.007a so 'bravīt praṇato bhūtvā ayam asmi narādhipa 7.066.007c vaśyas tava mahābāho kiṃkaraḥ samupasthitaḥ 7.066.008a bhāṣitaṃ ruciraṃ śrutvā puṣpakasya narādhipaḥ 7.066.008c abhivādya maharṣīs tān vimānaṃ so 'dhyarohata
GE09ram_07_u:2710: 7.066.009a dhanur gṛhītvā tūṇīṃ ca khagdaṃ ca ruciraprabham
GE09ram_07_u:2711: 7.066.009c nikṣipya nagare vīrau saumitribharatāv ubhau 7.066.010a prāyāt pratīcīṃ sa marūn vicinvaṃś ca samantataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2712: 7.066.010c uttarām agamac chrīmān diśaṃ himavadāvṛtam 7.066.011a apaśyamānas tatrāpi svalpam apy atha duṣkṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:2713: 7.066.011c pūrvām api diśaṃ sarvām athāpaśyan narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2714: 7.066.012a dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ākrāmat tato rājarṣinandanaḥ 7.066.012c śaivalasyottare pārśve dadarśa sumahat saraḥ 7.066.013a tasmin sarasi tapyantaṃ tāpasaṃ sumahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2715: 7.066.013c dadarśa rāghavaḥ śrīmāṃl lambamānam adho mukham
GE09ram_07_u:2716: 7.066.014a athainaṃ samupāgamya tapyantaṃ tapa uttamam 7.066.014c uvāca rāghavo vākyaṃ dhanyas tvam asi suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:2718: 7.066.015c kautūhalāt tvāṃ pṛcchāmi rāmo dāśarathir hy aham
GE09ram_07_u:2719: 7.066.016a manīṣitas te ko nv arthaḥ svargalābho varāśrayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2720: 7.066.016c yam aśritya tapas taptaṃ śrotum icchāmi tāpasa
GE09ram_07_u:2721: 7.066.017a brāhmaṇo vāsi bhadraṃ te kṣatriyo vāsi durjayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2722: 7.066.017c vaiśyo vā yadi vā śūdraḥ satyam etad bravīhi me
GE09ram_07_u:2724: 7.067.001c avākśirās tathābhūto vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:2726: 7.067.002c devatvaṃ prārthaye rāma saśarīro mahāyaśaḥ 7.067.003a na mithyāhaṃ vade rājan devalokajigīṣayā 7.067.003c śūdraṃ māṃ viddhi kākutstha śambūkaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2727: 7.067.004a bhāṣatas tasya śūdrasya khaḍgaṃ suruciraprabham 7.067.004c niṣkṛṣya kośād vimalaṃ śiraś ciccheda rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2728: 7.067.005a tasmin muhūrte bālo 'sau jīvena samayujyata 7.067.006a tato 'gastyāśramapadaṃ rāmaḥ kamalalocanaḥ 7.067.006c sa gatvā vinayenaiva taṃ natvā mumude sukhī
GE09ram_07_u:2730: 7.067.007c ātithyaṃ paramaṃ prāpya niṣasāda narādhipaḥ 7.067.008a tam uvāca mahātejāḥ kumbhayonir mahātapāḥ 7.067.008c svāgataṃ te naraśreṣṭha diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:2731: 7.067.009a tvaṃ me bahumato rāma guṇair bahubhir uttamaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2732: 7.067.009c atithiḥ pūjanīyaś ca māma rājan hṛdi sthitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2733: 7.067.010a surā hi kathayanti tvām āgataṃ śūdraghātinam
GE09ram_07_u:2734: 7.067.010c brāhmaṇasya tu dharmeṇa tvayā jīvāpitaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2735: 7.067.011a uṣyatāṃ ceha rajanīṃ sakāśe mama rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:2736: 7.067.011c prabhāte puṣpakeṇa tvaṃ gantā svapuram eva hi
GE09ram_07_u:2737: 7.067.012a idaṃ cābharaṇaṃ saumya nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā 7.067.012c divyaṃ divyena vapuṣā dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā 7.067.012e pratigṛhṇīṣva kākutstha matpriyaṃ kuru rāghava 7.067.013a dattasya hi punar dānaṃ sumahat phalam ucyate
GE09ram_07_u:2738: 7.067.013c tasmāt pradāsye vidhivat tat pratīccha nararṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:2739: 7.067.014a tad rāmaḥ pratijagrāha munes tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2740: 7.067.014c divyam ābharaṇaṃ citraṃ pradīptam iva bhāskaram
GE09ram_07_u:2741: 7.067.015a pratigṛhya tato rāmas tad ābharaṇam uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:2742: 7.067.015c āgamaṃ tasya divyasya praṣṭum evopacakrame 7.067.016a atyadbhutam idaṃ brahman vapuṣā yuktam uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:2743: 7.067.016c kathaṃ bhagavatā prāptaṃ kuto vā kena vāhṛtam
GE09ram_07_u:2744: 7.067.017a kutūhalatayā brahman pṛcchāmi tvāṃ mahāyaśaḥ 7.067.017c āścaryāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ hi nidhiḥ paramako bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:2745: 7.067.018a evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe munir vākyam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:2746: 7.067.018c śṛṇu rāma yathāvṛttaṃ purā tretāyuge gate
GE09ram_07_u:2747: 7.068.001a purā tretāyuge hy āsīd araṇyaṃ bahuvistaram
GE09ram_07_u:2750: 7.068.002c aham ākramituṃ śaumya tad araṇyam upāgamam
GE09ram_07_u:2751: 7.068.003a tasya rūpam araṇyasya nirdeṣṭuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_07_u:2752: 7.068.003c phalamūlaiḥ sukhāsvādair bahurūpaiś ca pādapaiḥ 7.068.004a tasyāraṇyasya madhye tu saro yojanam āyatam
GE09ram_07_u:2753: 7.068.004c padmotpalasamākīrṇaṃ samatikrāntaśaivalam 7.068.005a tad āścaryam ivātyarthaṃ sukhāsvādam anuttamam 7.068.005c arajaskaṃ tathākṣobhyaṃ śrīmatpakṣigaṇāyutam
GE09ram_07_u:2754: 7.068.006a tasmin saraḥsamīpe tu mahad adbhutam āśramam
GE09ram_07_u:2756: 7.068.007a tatrāham avasaṃ rātriṃ naidāghīṃ puruṣarṣabha 7.068.007c prabhāte kālyam utthāya saras tad upacakrame
GE09ram_07_u:2757: 7.068.008a athāpaśyaṃḥ śavaṃ tatra supuṣṭam ajaraṃ kva cit
GE09ram_07_u:2758: 7.068.008c tiṣṭhantaṃ parayā lakṣmyā tasmiṃs toyāśaye nṛpa
GE09ram_07_u:2759: 7.068.009a tam arthaṃ cintayāno 'haṃ muhūrtaṃ tatra rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:2760: 7.068.009c viṣṭhito 'smi sarastīre kiṃ nv idaṃ syād iti prabho
GE09ram_07_u:2761: 7.068.010a athāpaśyaṃ muhūrtāt tu divyam adbhutadarśanam 7.068.010c vimānaṃ paramodāraṃ haṃsayuktaṃ manojavam
GE09ram_07_u:2762: 7.068.011a atyarthaṃ svargiṇaṃ tatra vimāne raghunandana 7.068.011c upāste 'psarasāṃ vīra sahasraṃ divyabhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:2763: 7.068.011e gānti geyāni ramyāṇi vādayanti tathāparāḥ 7.068.012a paśyato me tadā rāma vimānād avaruhya ca
GE09ram_07_u:2764: 7.068.012c taṃ śavaṃ bhakṣayām āsa sa svargī raghunandana
GE09ram_07_u:2765: 7.068.013a tato bhuktvā yathākāmaṃ māṃsaṃ bahu ca suṣṭhu ca 7.068.013c avatīrya saraḥ svargī saṃspraṣṭum upacakrame 7.068.014a upaspṛśya yathānyāyaṃ sa svargī puruṣarṣabha 7.068.014c āroḍhum upacakrāma vimānavaram uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:2766: 7.068.015a tam ahaṃ devasaṃkāśam ārohantam udīkṣya vai
GE09ram_07_u:2767: 7.068.015c athāham abruvaṃ vākyaṃ tam eva puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:2768: 7.068.016a ko bhavān devasaṃkāśa āhāraś ca vigarhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2769: 7.068.016c tvayāyaṃ bhujyate saumya kiṃ karthaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:2770: 7.068.017a āścaryam īdṛśo bhāvo bhāsvaro devasaṃmataḥ 7.068.017c āhāro garhitaḥ saumya śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2771: 7.069.001a bhuktvā tu bhāṣitaṃ vākyaṃ mama rāma śubhākṣaram
GE09ram_07_u:2772: 7.069.001c prāñjaliḥ pratyuvācedaṃ sa svargī raghunandana 7.069.002a śṛṇu brahman yathāvṛttaṃ mamaitat sukhaduḥkhayoḥ 7.069.002c duratikramaṇīyaṃ hi yathā pṛcchasi māṃ dvija
GE09ram_07_u:2773: 7.069.003a purā vaidarbhako rājā pitā mama mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2774: 7.069.003c sudeva iti vikhyātas triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān
GE09ram_07_u:2775: 7.069.004a tasya putradvayaṃ brahman dvābhyāṃ strībhyām ajāyata
GE09ram_07_u:2776: 7.069.004c ahaṃ śveta iti khyāto yavīyān suratho 'bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:2777: 7.069.005a tataḥ pitari svaryāte paurā mām abhyaṣecayan
GE09ram_07_u:2778: 7.069.005c tatrāhaṃ kṛtavān rājyaṃ dharmeṇa susamāhitaḥ 7.069.006a evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi samatītāni suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:2779: 7.069.006c rājyaṃ kārayato brahman prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2780: 7.069.007a so 'haṃ nimitte kasmiṃś cid vijñātāyur dvijottama 7.069.007c kāladharmaṃ hṛdi nyasya tato vanam upāgamam
GE09ram_07_u:2782: 7.069.008c tapaś cartuṃ praviṣṭo 'smi samīpe sarasaḥ śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:2783: 7.069.009a bhrātaraṃ surathaṃ rājye abhiṣicya narādhipam 7.069.009c idaṃ saraḥ samāsādya tapas taptaṃ mayā ciram
GE09ram_07_u:2785: 7.069.010c taptvā suduṣkaraṃ prāpto brahmalokam anuttamam 7.069.011a tato māṃ svargasaṃsthaṃ vai kṣutpipāse dvijottama
GE09ram_07_u:2787: 7.069.012a gatvā tribhuvaṇaśreṣṭhaṃ pitāmaham uvāca ha 7.069.012c bhagavan brahmaloko 'yaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:2789: 7.069.013c āhāraḥ kaś ca me deva tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE09ram_07_u:2790: 7.069.014a pitāmahas tu mām āha tavāhāraḥ sudevaja
GE09ram_07_u:2791: 7.069.014c svādūni svāni māṃsāni tāni bhakṣaya nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2792: 7.069.015a svaśarīraṃ tvayā puṣṭaṃ kurvatā tapa uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:2793: 7.069.015c anuptaṃ rohate śveta na kadā cin mahāmate
GE09ram_07_u:2794: 7.069.016a dattaṃ na te 'sti sūkṣmo 'pi vane sattvaniṣevite 7.069.016c tena svargagato vatsa bādhyase kṣutpipāsayā 7.069.017a sa tvaṃ supuṣṭam āhāraiḥ svaśarīram anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:2795: 7.069.017c bhakṣayasvāmṛtarasaṃ sā te tṛptir bhaviṣyati 7.069.018a yadā tu tad vanaṃ śveta agastyaḥ sumahān ṛṣiḥ 7.069.018c ākramiṣyati durdharṣas tadā kṛcchād vimokṣyase 7.069.019a sa hi tārayituṃ saumya śaktaḥ suragaṇān api
GE09ram_07_u:2796: 7.069.019c kiṃ punas tvāṃ mahābāho kṣutpipāsāvaśaṃ gatam
GE09ram_07_u:2798: 7.069.020c āhāraṃ garhitaṃ kurmi svaśarīraṃ dvijottama 7.069.021a bahūn varṣagaṇān brahman bhujyamānam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_07_u:2799: 7.069.021c kṣayaṃ nābhyeti brahmarṣe tṛptiś cāpi mamottamā
GE09ram_07_u:2800: 7.069.022a tasya me kṛcchrabhūtasya kṛcchrād asmād vimokṣaya
GE09ram_07_u:2801: 7.069.022c anyeṣām agatir hy atra kumbhayonim ṛte dvijam
GE09ram_07_u:2802: 7.069.023a idam ābharaṇaṃ saumya tāraṇārthaṃ dvijottama 7.069.023c pratigṛhṇīṣva brahmarṣe prasādaṃ kartum arhasi 7.069.024a tasyāhaṃ svargiṇo vākyaṃ śrutvā duḥkhasamanvitam 7.069.024c tāraṇāyopajagrāha tad ābharaṇam uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:2803: 7.069.025a mayā pratigṛhīte tu tasminn ābharaṇe śubhe
GE09ram_07_u:2804: 7.069.025c mānuṣaḥ pūrvako deho rājarṣeḥ sa nanāśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:2805: 7.069.026a pranaṣṭe tu śarīre 'sau rājarṣiḥ parayā mudā
GE09ram_07_u:2806: 7.069.026c tṛptaḥ pramudito rājā jagāma tridivaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2807: 7.069.027a tenedaṃ śakratulyena divyam ābharaṇaṃ mama 7.069.027c tasmin nimitte kākutstha dattam adbhutadarśanam 7.070.001a tad adbhutatamaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvāgastyasya rāghavaḥ 7.070.001c gauravād vismayāc caiva bhūyaḥ praṣṭuṃ pracakrame
GE09ram_07_u:2808: 7.070.002a bhagavaṃs tad vanaṃ ghoraṃ tapas tapyati yatra saḥ 7.070.002c śveto vaidarbhako rājā kathaṃ tad amṛgadvijam
GE09ram_07_u:2809: 7.070.003a niḥsattvaṃ ca vanaṃ jātaṃ śūnyaṃ manujavarjitam
GE09ram_07_u:2810: 7.070.003c tapaś cartuṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2813: 7.070.005a purā kṛtayuge rāma manur daṇḍadharaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2814: 7.070.005c tasya putro mahān āsīd ikṣvākuḥ kulavardhanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2815: 7.070.006a taṃ putraṃ pūrvake rājye nikṣipya bhuvi durjayam
GE09ram_07_u:2816: 7.070.006c pṛthivyāṃ rājavaṃśānāṃ bhava kartety uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:2817: 7.070.007a tatheti ca pratijñātaṃ pituḥ putreṇa rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:2818: 7.070.007c tataḥ paramasaṃhṛṣṭo manuḥ punar uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:2820: 7.070.008c daṇḍena ca prajā rakṣa mā ca daṇḍam akāraṇe 7.070.009a aparādhiṣu yo daṇḍaḥ pātyate mānaveṣu vai
GE09ram_07_u:2821: 7.070.009c sa daṇḍo vidhivan muktaḥ svargaṃ nayati pārthivam
GE09ram_07_u:2822: 7.070.010a tasmād daṇḍe mahābāho yatnavān bhava putraka
GE09ram_07_u:2823: 7.070.010c dharmo hi paramo loke kurvatas te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:2824: 7.070.011a iti taṃ bahu saṃdiśya manuḥ putraṃ samādhinā
GE09ram_07_u:2825: 7.070.011c jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭo brahmalokam anuttamam 7.070.012a prayāte tridive tasminn ikṣvākur amitaprabhaḥ 7.070.012c janayiṣye kathaṃ putrān iti cintāparo 'bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:2826: 7.070.013a karmabhir bahurūpaiś ca tais tair manusutaḥ sutān
GE09ram_07_u:2827: 7.070.013c janayām āsa dharmātmā śataṃ devasutopamān 7.070.014a teṣām avarajas tāta sarveṣāṃ raghunandana 7.070.014c mūḍhaś cākṛtividyaś ca na śuśrūṣati pūrvajān
GE09ram_07_u:2828: 7.070.015a nāma tasya ca daṇḍeti pitā cakre 'lpatejasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2830: 7.070.016a sa paśyamānas taṃ doṣaṃ ghoraṃ putrasya rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:2831: 7.070.016c vindhyaśaivalayor madhye rājyaṃ prādād ariṃdama 7.070.017a sa daṇḍas tatra rājābhūd ramye parvatarodhasi
GE09ram_07_u:2832: 7.070.017c puraṃ cāpratimaṃ rāma nyaveśayad anuttamam 7.070.018a purasya cākaron nāma madhumantam iti prabho
GE09ram_07_u:2833: 7.070.018c purohitaṃ cośanasaṃ varayām āsa suvratam 7.070.019a evaṃ sa rājā tad rājyaṃ kārayat sapurohitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2835: 7.071.001a etad ākhyāya rāmāya maharṣiḥ kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ 7.071.001c asyām evāparaṃ vākyaṃ kathāyām upacakrame 7.071.002a tataḥ sa daṇḍaḥ kākutstha bahuvarṣagaṇāyutam 7.071.002c akarot tatra mandātmā rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam 7.071.003a atha kāle tu kasmiṃś cid rājā bhārgavam āśramam 7.071.003c ramaṇīyam upākrāmac caitre māsi manorame 7.071.004a tatra bhārgavakanyāṃ sa rūpeṇāpratimāṃ bhuvi 7.071.004c vicarantīṃ vanoddeśe daṇḍo 'paśyad anuttamām
GE09ram_07_u:2836: 7.071.005a sa dṛṣṭvā tāṃ sudurmedhā anaṅgaśarapīḍitaḥ 7.071.005c abhigamya susaṃvignaḥ kanyāṃ vacanam abravīt 7.071.006a kutas tvam asi suśroṇi kasya vāsi sutā śubhe 7.071.006c pīḍito 'ham anaṅgena pṛcchāmi tvāṃ sumadhyame
GE09ram_07_u:2837: 7.071.007a tasya tv evaṃ bruvāṇasya mohonmattasya kāminaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2838: 7.071.007c bhārgavī pratyuvācedaṃ vacaḥ sānunayaṃ nṛpam 7.071.008a bhārgavasya sutāṃ viddhi
GE09ram_07_u:2839: 7.071.008c arajāṃ nāma rājendra jyeṣṭhām āśramavāsinīm 7.071.009a guruḥ pitā me rājendra tvaṃ ca śiṣyo mahātmanaḥ 7.071.009c vyasanaṃ sumahat kruddhaḥ sa te dadyān mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2840: 7.071.010a yadi vātra mayā kāryaṃ dharmadṛṣṭena satpathā
GE09ram_07_u:2841: 7.071.010c varayasva nṛpa śreṣṭha pitaraṃ me mahādyutim
GE09ram_07_u:2842: 7.071.011a anyathā tu phalaṃ tubhyaṃ bhaved ghorābhisaṃhitam
GE09ram_07_u:2843: 7.071.011c krodhena hi pitā me 'sau trailokyam api nirdahet
GE09ram_07_u:2844: 7.071.012a evaṃ bruvāṇām arajāṃ daṇḍaḥ kāmaśarārditaḥ 7.071.012c pratyuvāca madonmattaḥ śirasy ādhāya so 'ñjalim
GE09ram_07_u:2845: 7.071.013a prasādaṃ kuru suśroṇi na kālaṃ kṣeptum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:2846: 7.071.013c tvatkṛte hi mama prāṇā vidīryante śubhānane
GE09ram_07_u:2847: 7.071.014a tvāṃ prāpya hi vadho vāpi pāpaṃ vāpi sudāruṇam 7.071.014c bhaktaṃ bhajasva māṃ bhīru bhajamānaṃ suvihvalam
GE09ram_07_u:2848: 7.071.015a evam uktvā tu tāṃ kanyāṃ dorbhyāṃ gṛhya balād balī
GE09ram_07_u:2850: 7.071.016a tam anarthaṃ mahāghoraṃ daṇḍaḥ kṛtvā sudāruṇam
GE09ram_07_u:2851: 7.071.016c nagaraṃ prayayau cāśu madhumantam anuttamam 7.071.017a arajāpi rudantī sā āśramasyāvidūrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2853: 7.072.001a sa muhūrtād upaśrutya devarṣir amitaprabhaḥ 7.072.001c svam āśramaṃ śiṣya vṛtaḥ kṣudhārtaḥ saṃnyavartata
GE09ram_07_u:2855: 7.072.002c jyotsnām ivāruṇagrastāṃ pratyūṣe na virājatīm 7.072.003a tasya roṣaḥ samabhavat kṣudhārtasya viśeṣataḥ 7.072.003c nirdahann iva lokāṃs trīñ śiṣyāṃś cedam uvāca ha 7.072.004a paśyadhvaṃ viparītasya daṇḍasyāviditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2856: 7.072.004c vipattiṃ ghorasaṃkāśāṃ kruddhām agniśikhām iva 7.072.005a kṣayo 'sya durmateḥ prāptaḥ sānugasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2857: 7.072.005c yaḥ pradīptāṃ hutāśasya śikhāṃ vai spraṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_07_u:2858: 7.072.006a yasmāt sa kṛtavān pāpam īdṛśaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_07_u:2859: 7.072.006c tasmāt prāpsyati durmedhāḥ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2862: 7.072.008a samantād yojanaśataṃ viṣayaṃ cāsya durmateḥ 7.072.008c dhakṣyate pāṃsuvarṣeṇa mahatā pākaśāsanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2863: 7.072.009a sarvasattvāni yānīha sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca 7.072.009c mahatā pāṃsuvarṣeṇa nāśaṃ yāsyanti sarvaśaḥ 7.072.010a daṇḍasya viṣayo yāvat tāvat sarvasamucchrayaḥ 7.072.010c pāṃsubhuta ivālakṣyaḥ saptarātrād bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:2864: 7.072.011a ity uktvā krodhasaṃtapas tam āśramanivāsinam 7.072.011c janaṃ janapadānteṣu sthīyatām iti cābravīt 7.072.012a śrutvā tūśasano vākyaṃ sa āśramāvasatho janaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2865: 7.072.012c niṣkrānto viṣayāt tasya sthānaṃ cakre 'tha bāhyataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2866: 7.072.013a sa tathoktvā munijanam arajām idam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:2867: 7.072.013c ihaiva vasa durmedhe āśrame susamāhitā 7.072.014a idaṃ yojanaparyantaṃ saraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2868: 7.072.014c araje vijvarā bhuṅkṣva kālaś cātra pratīkṣyatām
GE09ram_07_u:2869: 7.072.015a tvatsamīpe tu ye sattvā vāsam eṣyanti tāṃ niśām 7.072.015c avadhyāḥ pāṃsuvarṣeṇa te bhaviṣyanti nityadā 7.072.016a ity uktvā bhārgavo vāsam anyatra samupākramat
GE09ram_07_u:2872: 7.072.017c śapto brahmarṣiṇā tena purā vaidharmake kṛte
GE09ram_07_u:2873: 7.072.018a tataḥ prabhṛti kākutstha daṇḍakāraṇyam ucyate 7.072.018c tapasvinaḥ sthitā yatra janasthānam atho 'bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:2874: 7.072.019a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi rāghava 7.072.019c saṃdhyām upāsituṃ vīra samayo hy ativartate
GE09ram_07_u:2875: 7.072.020a ete maharṣayaḥ sarve pūrṇakumbhāḥ samantataḥ 7.072.020c kṛtodako naravyāghra ādityaṃ paryupāsate
GE09ram_07_u:2876: 7.072.021a sa tair ṛṣibhir abhyastaḥ sahitair brahmasattamaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2877: 7.072.021c ravir astaṃ gato rāma gacchodakam upaspṛśa
GE09ram_07_u:2878: 7.073.001a ṛṣer vacanam ājñāya rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāsitum
GE09ram_07_u:2879: 7.073.001c upākrāmat saraḥ puṇyam apsarobhir niṣevitam 7.073.002a tatrodakam upaspṛṣśya saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām 7.073.002c āśramaṃ prāviśad rāmaḥ kumbhayoner mahātmanaḥ 7.073.003a asyāgastyo bahuguṇaṃ phalamūlaṃ tathauṣadhīḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2880: 7.073.003c śākāni ca pavitrāṇi bhojanārtham akalpayat 7.073.004a sa bhuktavān naraśreṣṭhas tad annam amṛtopamam
GE09ram_07_u:2881: 7.073.004c prītaś ca parituṣṭaś ca tāṃ rātriṃ samupāvasat
GE09ram_07_u:2882: 7.073.005a prabhāte kālyam utthāya kṛtvāhnikam ariṃdamaḥ 7.073.005c ṛṣiṃ samabhicakrāma gamanāya raghūttamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2884: 7.073.006c āpṛcche tvāṃ gamiṣyāmi mām anujñātum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:2885: 7.073.007a dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi darśanena mahātmanaḥ 7.073.007c draṣṭuṃ caivāgamiṣyāmi pāvanārtham ihātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2886: 7.073.008a tathā vadati kākutsthe vākyam adbhutadarśanam 7.073.008c uvāca paramaprīto dharmanetras
GE09ram_07_u:2887: 7.073.009a atyadbhutam idaṃ vākyaṃ tava rāma śubhākṣaram
GE09ram_07_u:2888: 7.073.009c pāvanaḥ sarvalokānāṃ tvam eva raghunandana 7.073.010a muhūrtam api rāma tvāṃ ye nu paśyanti ke cana
GE09ram_07_u:2889: 7.073.010c pāvitāḥ svargabhūtās te pūjyante divi daivataiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2890: 7.073.011a ye ca tvāṃ ghoracakṣurbhir īkṣante prāṇino bhuvi
GE09ram_07_u:2891: 7.073.011c hatās te yamadaṇḍena sadyo nirayagāminaḥ 7.073.012a gaccha cāriṣṭam avyagraḥ panthānam akutobhayam 7.073.012c praśādhi rājyaṃ dharmeṇa gatir hi jagato bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:2892: 7.073.013a evam uktas tu muninā prāñjaliḥ prpagraho nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2893: 7.073.013c abhyavādayata prājñas tam ṛṣiṃ puṇyaśīlinam 7.073.014a abhivādya muniśreṣṭhaṃ tāṃś ca sarvāṃs tapodhanān
GE09ram_07_u:2894: 7.073.014c adhyārohat tad avyagraḥ puṣpakaṃ hemabhūṣitam 7.073.015a taṃ prayāntaṃ munigaṇā āśīrvādaiḥ samantataḥ 7.073.015c apūjayan mahendrābhaṃ sahasrākṣam ivāmarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2895: 7.073.016a svasthaḥ sa dadṛśe rāmaḥ puṣpake hemabhūṣite
GE09ram_07_u:2898: 7.073.017c ayodhyāṃ prāpya kākutstho vimānād avarohata 7.073.018a tato visṛjya ruciraṃ puṣpakaṃ kāmagāminam 7.073.018c kakṣyāntaravinikṣiptaṃ dvāḥsthaṃ rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2899: 7.073.019a lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ caiva gatvā tau laghuvikramau
GE09ram_07_u:2900: 7.073.019c mamāgamanam ākhyāya śabdāpaya ca māṃ ciram
GE09ram_07_u:2901: 7.074.001a tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ 7.074.001c dvāḥsthaḥ kumārāv āhūya rāghavāya nyavedayat 7.074.002a dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ prāptau priyau bharatalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_07_u:2902: 7.074.002c pariṣvajya tato rāmo vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:2903: 7.074.003a kṛtaṃ mayā yathātathyaṃ dvijakāryam anuttamam 7.074.003c dharmasetumato bhūyaḥ kartum icchāmi rāghavau 7.074.004a yuvābhyām ātmabhūtābhyāṃ rājasūyam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:2904: 7.074.004c sahito yaṣṭum icchāmi tatra dharmo hi śāśvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2905: 7.074.005a iṣṭvā tu rājasūyena mitraḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ 7.074.005c suhutena suyajñena varuṇatvam
GE09ram_07_u:2906: 7.074.006a somaś ca rājasūyena iṣṭvā dharmeṇa dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:2907: 7.074.006c prāptaś ca sarvalokānāṃ kīrtiṃ sthānaṃ ca śāśvatam
GE09ram_07_u:2908: 7.074.007a asminn ahani yac chreyaś cintyatāṃ tan mayā saha 7.074.007c hitaṃ cāyati yuktaṃ ca prayatau vaktum arhatha
GE09ram_07_u:2909: 7.074.008a śrutā tu rāghavasyaitad vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 7.074.008c bharataḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:2910: 7.074.009a tvayi dharmaḥ paraḥ sādho tvayi sarvā vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_07_u:2912: 7.074.010a mahīpālāś ca sarve tvāṃ prajāpatim ivāmarāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2913: 7.074.010c nirīkṣante mahātmāno lokanāthaṃ yathā vayam 7.074.011a prajāś ca pitṛvad rājan paśyanti tvāṃ mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:2915: 7.074.012a sa tvam evaṃvidhaṃ yajñam āhartāsi kathaṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_07_u:2916: 7.074.012c pṛthivyāṃ rājavaṃśānāṃ vināśo yatra dṛśyate 7.074.013a pṛthivyāṃ ye ca puruṣā rājan pauruṣam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2917: 7.074.013c sarveṣāṃ bhavitā tatra kṣayaḥ sarvāntakopamaḥ 7.074.014a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla guṇair atulavikrama 7.074.014c pṛthivīṃ nārhase hantuṃ vaśe hi tava vartate
GE09ram_07_u:2918: 7.074.015a bharatasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvāmṛtamayaṃ yathā
GE09ram_07_u:2919: 7.074.015c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ 7.074.016a uvāca ca śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ kaikeyyā nandivardhanam
GE09ram_07_u:2921: 7.074.017a idaṃ vacanam aklībaṃ tvayā dharmasamāhitam 7.074.017c vyāhṛtaṃ puruṣavyāghra pṛthivyāḥ paripālanam
GE09ram_07_u:2922: 7.074.018a eṣa tasmād abhiprāyād rājasūyāt kratūttamān 7.074.018c nivartayāmi dharmajña tava suvyāhṛtena vai 7.074.019a prajānāṃ pālanaṃ dharmo rājñāṃ yajñena saṃmitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2923: 7.074.019c tasmāc chṛṇomi te vākyaṃ sādhūktaṃ susamāhitam
GE09ram_07_u:2924: 7.075.001a tathoktavati rāme tu bharate ca mahātmani
GE09ram_07_u:2927: 7.075.002c pāvanas tava durdharṣo rocatāṃ kratupuṃgavaḥ 7.075.003a śrūyate hi purāvṛttaṃ vāsave sumahātmani 7.075.003c brahmahatyāvṛtaḥ śakro hayamedhena pāvitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2929: 7.075.004c vṛtro nāma mahān āsīd daiteyo lokasaṃmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2930: 7.075.005a vistīrṇā yojanaśatam ucchritas triguṇaṃ tataḥ 7.075.005c anurāgeṇa lokāṃs trīn snehāt paśyati sarvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2931: 7.075.006a dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2932: 7.075.006c śaśāsa pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ dharmeṇa susamāhitaḥ 7.075.007a tasmin praśāsati tadā sarvakāmadughā mahī 7.075.007c rasavanti prasūtāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:2934: 7.075.008c sa rājyaṃ tādṛśaṃ bhuṅkte sphītam adbhutadarśanam
GE09ram_07_u:2935: 7.075.009a tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā tapaḥ kuryām anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:2936: 7.075.009c tapo hi paramaṃ śreyas tapo hi paramaṃ sukham 7.075.010a sa nikṣipya sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ paureṣu parameśvaram
GE09ram_07_u:2937: 7.075.010c tapa ugram upātiṣṭhat tāpayan sarvadevatāḥ 7.075.011a tapas tapyati vṛtre tu vāsavaḥ paramārtavat
GE09ram_07_u:2938: 7.075.011c viṣṇuṃ samupasaṃkramya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:2939: 7.075.012a tapasyatā mahābāho lokā vṛtreṇa nirjitāḥ 7.075.012c balavān sa hi dharmātmā nainaṃ śakṣyāmi bādhitum
GE09ram_07_u:2940: 7.075.013a yady asau tapa ātiṣṭhed bhūya eva sureśvara
GE09ram_07_u:2941: 7.075.013c yāval lokā dhariṣyanti tāvad asya vaśānugāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2942: 7.075.014a tvaṃ cainaṃ paramodāram upekṣasi mahābala 7.075.014c kṣaṇaṃ hi na bhaved vṛtraḥ kruddhe tvayi sureśvara 7.075.015a yadā hi prītisaṃyogaṃ tvayā viṣṇo samāgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2943: 7.075.015c tadā prabhṛti lokānāṃ nāthatvam upalabdhavān 7.075.016a sa tvaṃ prasādaṃ lokānāṃ kuruṣva sumahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2944: 7.075.016c tvatkṛtena hi sarvaṃ syāt praśāntam ajaraṃ jagat
GE09ram_07_u:2945: 7.075.017a ime hi sarve viṣṇo tvāṃ nirīkṣante divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2946: 7.075.017c vṛtraghatena mahatā eṣāṃ sāhyaṃ kuruṣva ha
GE09ram_07_u:2947: 7.075.018a tvayā hi nityaśaḥ sāhyaṃ kṛtam eṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_07_u:2948: 7.075.018c asahyam idam anyeṣām agatīnāṃ gatir bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:2949: 7.076.001a lakṣmaṇasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2950: 7.076.001c vṛtraghātam aśeṣeṇa kathayety āha lakṣmaṇam 7.076.002a rāghaveṇaivam uktas tu
GE09ram_07_u:2951: 7.076.002c bhūya eva kathāṃ divyāṃ kathayām āsa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2952: 7.076.003a sahasrākṣavacaḥ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ ca divaukasām 7.076.003c viṣṇur devān uvācedaṃ sarvān indrapurogamān 7.076.004a pūrvaṃ sauhṛdabaddho 'smi vṛtrasya sumahātmanaḥ 7.076.004c tena yuṣmat priyārthaṃ vai nāhaṃ hanmi mahāsuram
GE09ram_07_u:2953: 7.076.005a avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca bhavatāṃ sukham uttamam
GE09ram_07_u:2954: 7.076.005c tasmād upāyam ākhyāsye yena vṛtraṃ haniṣyatha
GE09ram_07_u:2955: 7.076.006a tridhā bhūtaṃ kariṣye 'ham ātmānaṃ surasattamāḥ 7.076.006c tena vṛtraṃ sahasrākṣo haniṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2956: 7.076.007a eko 'ṃśo vāsavaṃ yātu dvitīyo vajram eva tu
GE09ram_07_u:2957: 7.076.007c tṛtīyo bhūtalaṃ śakras tato vṛtraṃ haniṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:2958: 7.076.008a tathā bruvati deveśe devā vākyam athābruvan
GE09ram_07_u:2959: 7.076.008c evam etan na saṃdeho yathā vadasi daityahan
GE09ram_07_u:2960: 7.076.009a bhadraṃ te 'stu gamiṣyāmo vṛtrāsuravadhaiṣiṇaḥ 7.076.009c bhajasva paramodāravāsavaṃ svena tejasā
GE09ram_07_u:2962: 7.076.010c tad araṇyam upākrāman yatra vṛtro mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2964: 7.076.011c pibantam iva lokāṃs trīn nirdahantam ivāmbaram
GE09ram_07_u:2965: 7.076.012a dṛṣṭvaiva cāsuraśreṣṭhaṃ devās trāsam upāgaman 7.076.012c katham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmaḥ kathaṃ na syāt parājayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2966: 7.076.013a teṣāṃ cintayatāṃ tatra sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ 7.076.013c vajraṃ pragṛhya bāhubhyāṃ prahiṇod vṛtramūrdhani 7.076.014a kālāgnineva ghoreṇa dīpteneva mahārciṣā
GE09ram_07_u:2967: 7.076.014c prataptaṃ vṛtraśirasi jagat trāsam upāgamat 7.076.015a asaṃbhāvyaṃ vadhaṃ tasya vṛtrasya vibudhādhipaḥ 7.076.015c cintayāno jagāmāśu lokasyāntaṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2968: 7.076.016a tam indraṃ brahmahatyāśu gacchantam anugacchati 7.076.016c apatac cāsya gātreṣu tam indraṃ duḥkham āviśat
GE09ram_07_u:2970: 7.076.017c viṣṇuṃ tribhuvaṇaśreṣṭhaṃ muhur muhur apūjayan 7.076.018a tvaṃ gatiḥ paramā deva pūrvajo jagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2972: 7.076.019a hataś cāyaṃ tvayā vṛtro brahmahatyā ca vāsavam
GE09ram_07_u:2973: 7.076.019c bādhate suraśārdūla mokṣaṃ tasya vinirdiśa 7.076.020a teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā devānāṃ viṣṇur abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:2974: 7.076.020c mām eva yajatāṃ śakraḥ pāvayiṣyāmi vajriṇam
GE09ram_07_u:2975: 7.076.021a puṇyena hayamedhena mām iṣṭvā pākaśāsanaḥ 7.076.021c punar eṣyati devānām indratvam akutobhayaḥ 7.076.022a evaṃ saṃdiśya devānāṃ tāṃ vāṇīm amṛtopamā
GE09ram_07_u:2976: 7.076.022c jagāma viṣṇur deveśaḥ stūyamānas triviṣṭapam 7.077.001a tathā vṛtravadhaṃ sarvam akhilena sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2978: 7.077.002a tato hate mahāvīrye vṛtre devabhayaṃkare 7.077.002c brahmahatyāvṛtaḥ śakraḥ saṃjñāṃ lebhe na vṛtrahā
GE09ram_07_u:2980: 7.077.003c kālaṃ tatrāvasat kaṃ cid veṣṭamāno yathoragaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2981: 7.077.004a atha naṣṭe sahasrākṣe udvignam abhavaj jagat
GE09ram_07_u:2982: 7.077.004c bhūmiś ca dhvastasaṃkāśā niḥsnehā śuṣkakānanā 7.077.005a niḥsrotasaś cāmbuvāhā hradāś ca saritas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:2984: 7.077.006a kṣīyamāṇe tu loke 'smin saṃbhrāntamanasaḥ surāḥ 7.077.006c yad uktaṃ viṣṇunā pūrvaṃ taṃ yajñaṃ samupānayan
GE09ram_07_u:2985: 7.077.007a tataḥ sarve suragaṇāḥ sopādhyāyāḥ saharṣibhiḥ 7.077.007c taṃ deśaṃ sahitā jagmur yatrendro bhayamohitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2986: 7.077.008a te tu dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaṃ mohitaṃ brahmahatyayā
GE09ram_07_u:2987: 7.077.008c taṃ puraskṛtya deveśam aśvamedhaṃ pracakrire 7.077.009a tato 'śvamedhaḥ sumahān mahendrasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2989: 7.077.010a tato yajñasamāptau tu brahmahatyā mahātmanaḥ 7.077.010c abhigamyābravīd vākyaṃ kva me sthānaṃ vidhāsyatha
GE09ram_07_u:2990: 7.077.011a te tām ūcus tato devās tuṣṭāḥ prītisamanvitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2992: 7.077.012a devānāṃ bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā brahmahatyā mahātmanām 7.077.012c saṃnidhau sthānam anyatra varayām āsa durvasā
GE09ram_07_u:2993: 7.077.013a ekenāṃśena vatsyāmi pūrṇodāsu nadīṣu vai 7.077.013c dvitīyena tu vṛkṣeṣu satyam etad bravīmi vaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:2994: 7.077.014a yo 'yam aṃśas tṛtīyo me strīṣu yauvanaśāliṣu 7.077.014c trirātraṃ darpaparṇāsu vasiṣye darpaghātinī
GE09ram_07_u:2995: 7.077.015a hantāro brāhmaṇān ye tu prekṣāpūrvam adūṣakān
GE09ram_07_u:2996: 7.077.015c tāṃś caturthena bhāgena saṃśrayiṣye surarṣabhāḥ 7.077.016a pratyūcus tāṃ tato devā yathā vadasi durvase
GE09ram_07_u:2997: 7.077.016c tathā bhavatu tat sarvaṃ sādhayasva yathepsitam
GE09ram_07_u:2998: 7.077.017a tataḥ prītyānvitā devāḥ sahasrākṣaṃ vavandire 7.077.017c vijvaraḥ pūtapāpmā ca vāsavaḥ samapadyata 7.077.018a praśāntaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ sahasrākṣe pratiṣṭhate
GE09ram_07_u:3000: 7.077.019a īdṛśo hy aśvamedhasya prabhāvo raghunandana 7.077.019c yajasva sumahābhāga hayamedhena
GE09ram_07_u:3001: 7.078.001a tac chrutvā lakṣmaṇenoktaṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ 7.078.001c pratyuvāca mahātejāḥ prahasan rāghavo vacaḥ 7.078.002a evam etan naraśreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:3002: 7.078.002c vṛtraghātam aśeṣeṇa vājimedhaphalaṃ ca yat 7.078.003a śrūyate hi purā saumya kardamasya prajāpateḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3003: 7.078.003c putro bāhlīśvaraḥ śrīmān ilo nāma sudhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3004: 7.078.004a sa rājā pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ vaśe kṛtvā mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3005: 7.078.004c rājyaṃ caiva naravyāghra putravat paryapālayat 7.078.005a suraiś ca paramodārair daiteyaiś ca mahāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3007: 7.078.006a pūjyate nityaśaḥ saumya bhayārtai raghunandana 7.078.006c abibhyaṃś ca trayo lokāḥ saroṣasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3008: 7.078.007a sa rājā tādṛśo hy āsīd dharme vīrye ca niṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3009: 7.078.007c buddhyā ca paramodāro bāhlīkānāṃ mahāyaśāḥ 7.078.008a sa pracakre mahābāhur mṛgayāṃ rucire vane
GE09ram_07_u:3011: 7.078.009a prajaghne sa nṛpo 'raṇye mṛgāñ śatasahasraśaḥ 7.078.009c hatvaiva tṛptir nābhūc ca rājñas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3013: 7.078.010c yatra jāto mahāsenas taṃ deśam upacakrame
GE09ram_07_u:3014: 7.078.011a tasmiṃs tu devadeveśaḥ śailarājasutāṃ haraḥ 7.078.011c ramayām āsa durdharṣaiḥ sarvair anucaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:3015: 7.078.012a kṛtvā strībhūtam ātmānam umeśo gopatidhvajaḥ 7.078.012c devyāḥ priyacikīrṣuḥ sa tasmin parvatanirjhare 7.078.013a ye ca tatra vanoddeśe sattvāḥ puruṣavādinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3016: 7.078.013c yac ca kiṃ cana tat sarvaṃ nārīsaṃjñaṃ babhūva ha
GE09ram_07_u:3017: 7.078.014a etasminn antare rājā sa ilaḥ kardamātmajaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3018: 7.078.014c nighnan mṛgasahasrāṇi taṃ deśam upacakrame 7.078.015a sa dṛṣṭvā strīkṛtaṃ sarvaṃ savyālamṛgapakṣiṇam 7.078.015c ātmānaṃ sānugaṃ caiva strībhūtaṃ raghunandana 7.078.016a tasya duḥkhaṃ mahat tv āsīd dṛṣṭvātmānaṃ tathā gatam 7.078.016c umāpateś ca tat karma jñātvā trāsam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:3019: 7.078.017a tato devaṃ mahātmānaṃ śitikaṇṭhaṃ kapardinam 7.078.017c jagāma śaraṇaṃ rājā
GE09ram_07_u:3020: 7.078.018a tataḥ prahasya varadaḥ saha devyā mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3021: 7.078.018c prajāpatisutaṃ vākyam uvāca varadaḥ svayam 7.078.019a uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha rājarṣe kārdameya mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:3022: 7.078.019c puruṣatvam ṛte saumya varaṃ varaya suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:3023: 7.078.020a tataḥ sa rājā śokārtāḥ pratyākhyāto mahātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:3024: 7.078.020c na sa jagrāha strībhūto varam anyaṃ surottamāt
GE09ram_07_u:3025: 7.078.021a tataḥ śokena mahatā śailarājasutāṃ nṛpaḥ 7.078.021c praṇipatya mahādevīṃ sarveṇaivāntarātmanā
GE09ram_07_u:3026: 7.078.022a īśe varāṇāṃ varade lokānām asi bhāmini
GE09ram_07_u:3027: 7.078.022c amoghadarśane devi bhaje saumye namo 'stu te
GE09ram_07_u:3028: 7.078.023a hṛdgataṃ tasya rājarṣer vijñāya harasaṃnidhau 7.078.023c pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ devī rudrasya saṃmatā
GE09ram_07_u:3029: 7.078.024a ardhasya devo varado varārdhasya tathā hy aham
GE09ram_07_u:3030: 7.078.024c tasmād ardhaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ strīpuṃsor yāvad icchasi
GE09ram_07_u:3031: 7.078.025a tad adbhutatamaṃ śrutvā devyā varam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:3032: 7.078.025c saṃprahṛṣṭamanā bhūtvā rājā vākyam athābravīt 7.078.026a yadi devi prasannā me rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi
GE09ram_07_u:3033: 7.078.026c māsaṃ strītvam upāsitvā māsaṃ syāṃ puruṣaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3034: 7.078.027a īpsitaṃ tasya vijñāya devī surucirānanā 7.078.027c pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyam evam etad bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_07_u:3035: 7.078.028a rājan puruṣabhūtas tvaṃ strībhāvaṃ na smariṣyasi
GE09ram_07_u:3036: 7.078.028c strībhūtaś cāparaṃ māsaṃ na smariṣyasi pauruṣam
GE09ram_07_u:3037: 7.078.029a evaṃ sa rājā puruṣo māmaṃ bhūtvātha kārdamiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3038: 7.078.029c trailokyasundarī nārī māsam ekam ilābhavat 7.079.001a tāṃ kathām ilasaṃbaddhāṃ rāmeṇa samudīritām 7.079.001c lakṣmaṇo bharataś caiva śrutvā paramavismitau 7.079.002a tau rāmaṃ prāñjalībhūtvā tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3039: 7.079.002c vistaraṃ tasya bhāvasya tadā papracchatuḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3040: 7.079.003a kathaṃ sa rājā strībhūto vartayām āsa durgatim
GE09ram_07_u:3041: 7.079.003c puruṣo vā yadā bhūtaḥ kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayaty asau 7.079.004a tayos tad bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā kautūhalasamanvitam 7.079.004c kathayām āsa kākutṣṭhas tasya rājño yathā gatam
GE09ram_07_u:3042: 7.079.005a tam eva prathamaṃ māsaṃ strībhūtvā lokasundarī
GE09ram_07_u:3043: 7.079.005c tābhiḥ parivṛtā strībhir ye 'sya pūrvaṃ padānugāḥ 7.079.006a tat kānanaṃ vigāhyāśu vijahre lokasundarī 7.079.006c drumagulmalatākīrṇaṃ padbhyāṃ padmadalekṣaṇā
GE09ram_07_u:3044: 7.079.007a vāhanāni ca sarvāṇi saṃtyaktvā vai samantataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3045: 7.079.007c parvatābhogavivare tasmin reme ilā tadā 7.079.008a atha tasmin vanoddeśe parvatasyāvidūrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3047: 7.079.009a dadarśa sā ilā tasmin budhaṃ somasutaṃ tadā
GE09ram_07_u:3048: 7.079.009c jvalantaṃ svena vapuṣā pūrṇaṃ somam ivoditam
GE09ram_07_u:3049: 7.079.010a tapantaṃ ca tapas tīvram ambhomadhye durāsadam
GE09ram_07_u:3050: 7.079.010c yaśak saraṃ kāmagamaṃ tāruṇye paryavasthitam 7.079.011a sā taṃ jalāśayaṃ sarvaṃ kṣobhayām āsa vismitā
GE09ram_07_u:3051: 7.079.011c saha taiḥ pūra puruṣaiḥ strībhūtai raghunandana
GE09ram_07_u:3052: 7.079.012a budhas tu tāṃ nirīkṣyaiva kāmabāṇābhipīḍitaḥ 7.079.012c nopalebhe tadātmānaṃ cacāla ca tadāmbhasi 7.079.013a ilāṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ sa trailokyābhyadhikāṃ śubhām 7.079.013c cintāṃ samabhyatikrāmat kā nv iyaṃ devatādhikā
GE09ram_07_u:3053: 7.079.014a na devīṣu na nāgīṣu nāsurīṣv apsaraḥsu ca
GE09ram_07_u:3054: 7.079.014c dṛṣṭapūrvā mayā kā cid rūpeṇaitena śobhitā
GE09ram_07_u:3055: 7.079.015a sadṛśīyaṃ mama bhaved yadi nānyaparigrahā 7.079.015c iti buddhiṃ samāsthāya jalāt sthalam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:3056: 7.079.016a sa āśramaṃ samupāgamya catasraḥ pramadās tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3057: 7.079.016c śabdāpayata dharmātmā tāś cainaṃ ca vavandire
GE09ram_07_u:3058: 7.079.017a sa tāḥ papraccha dharmātma kasyaiṣā lokasundarī
GE09ram_07_u:3059: 7.079.017c kimartham āgatā ceha satyam ākhyāta māciram
GE09ram_07_u:3060: 7.079.018a śubhaṃ tu tasya tadvākyaṃ madhuraṃ madhurākṣaram
GE09ram_07_u:3061: 7.079.018c śrutvā tu tāḥ striyaḥ sarvā ūcur madhurayā girā 7.079.019a asmākam eṣā suśroṇī prabhutve vartate sadā
GE09ram_07_u:3062: 7.079.019c apatiḥ kānanānteṣu sahāsmābhir aṭaty asau 7.079.020a tad vākyam avyaktapadaṃ tāsāṃ strīṇāṃ niśamya tu
GE09ram_07_u:3063: 7.079.020c vidyām āvartanīṃ puṇyām āvartayata sa dvijaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3064: 7.079.021a so 'rthaṃ viditvā nikhilaṃ tasya rājño yathāgatam 7.079.021c sarvā eva striyas tāś ca babhāṣe munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3065: 7.079.022a atra kiṃ puruṣā bhadrā avasañ śailarodhasi
GE09ram_07_u:3066: 7.079.022c vatsyathāsmin girau yūyam avakāśo vidhīyatām 7.079.023a mūlaputraphalaiḥ sarvā vartayiṣyatha nityadā
GE09ram_07_u:3067: 7.079.023c striyaḥ kimpuruṣān nāma bhartṝn samupalapsyatha 7.079.024a tāḥ śrutvā somaputrasya vācaṃ kiṃpuruṣīkṛtāḥ 7.079.024c upāsāṃ cakrire śailaṃ bahvyas tā bahudhā tadā
GE09ram_07_u:3068: 7.080.001a śrutvā kimpuruṣotpattiṃ lakṣmaṇo bharatas tadā 7.080.001c āścaryam iti cābrūtām ubhau rāmaṃ janeśvaram
GE09ram_07_u:3069: 7.080.002a atha rāmaḥ kathām etāṃ bhūya eva mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3070: 7.080.002c kathayām āsa dharmātmā prajāpatisutasya vai 7.080.003a sarvās tā vidrutā dṛṣṭvā kiṃnarīr ṛṣisattamaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3071: 7.080.003c uvāca rūpasaṃpannāṃ tāṃ striyaṃ prahasann iva
GE09ram_07_u:3073: 7.080.004c bhajasva māṃ varārohe bhaktyā snigdhena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_07_u:3074: 7.080.005a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā śūnye svajanavarjitā 7.080.005c ilā suruciraprakhyaṃ pratyuvāca mahāgraham
GE09ram_07_u:3075: 7.080.006a ahaṃ kāmakarī saumya tavāsmi vaśavartinī 7.080.006c praśādhi māṃ somasuta yathecchasi tathā kuru
GE09ram_07_u:3076: 7.080.007a tasyās tad adbhutaprakhyaṃ śrutvā harṣasamanvitaḥ 7.080.007c sa vai kāmī saha tayā reme candramasaḥ sutaḥ 7.080.008a budhasya mādhavo māsas tām ilāṃ rucirānanām
GE09ram_07_u:3078: 7.080.009a atha māse tu saṃpūrṇe pūrṇendusadṛśānanaḥ 7.080.009c prajāpatisutaḥ śrīmāñ śayane
GE09ram_07_u:3080: 7.080.010c ūrdhvabāhuṃ nirālambaṃ taṃ rājā pratyabhāṣata 7.080.011a bhagavan parvataṃ durgaṃ praviṣṭo 'smi sahānugaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3081: 7.080.011c na ca paśyāmi tat sainyaṃ kva nu te māmakā gatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3082: 7.080.012a tac chrutvā tasya rājarṣer naṣṭasaṃjñasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:3083: 7.080.012c pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ sāntvayan parayā girā
GE09ram_07_u:3084: 7.080.013a aśmavarṣeṇa mahatā bhṛtyās te vinipātitāḥ 7.080.013c tvaṃ cāśramapade supto
GE09ram_07_u:3085: 7.080.014a samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te nirbhayo vigatajvaraḥ 7.080.014c phalamūlāśano vīra vasa ceha yathāsukham 7.080.015a sa rājā tena vākyena pratyāśvasto mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3086: 7.080.015c pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ dīno bhṛtyajanakṣayāt 7.080.016a tyakṣyāmy ahaṃ svakaṃ rājyaṃ nāhaṃ bhṛtyair vinā kṛtaḥ 7.080.016c vartayeyaṃ kṣaṇaṃ brahman samanujñātum arhasi 7.080.017a suto dharmaparo brahmañ jyeṣṭho mama mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3087: 7.080.017c śaśabindur iti khyātaḥ sa me rājyaṃ prapatsyate
GE09ram_07_u:3088: 7.080.018a na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ gatvā bhṛtyadārān sukhānvitān
GE09ram_07_u:3089: 7.080.018c prativaktuṃ mahātejaḥ kiṃ cid apy aśubhaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3090: 7.080.019a tathā bruvati rājendre budhaḥ paramam adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:3091: 7.080.019c sāntvapūrvam athovāca vāsas ta iha rocatām
GE09ram_07_u:3092: 7.080.020a na saṃtāpas tvayā kāryaḥ kārdameya mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:3095: 7.080.021c vāsāya vidadhe buddhiṃ yad uktaṃ brahmavādinā
GE09ram_07_u:3096: 7.080.022a māsaṃ sa strī tadā bhūtvā ramayaty aniśaṃ śubhā 7.080.022c māsaṃ puruṣabhāvena dharmabuddhiṃ cakāra saḥ 7.080.023a tataḥ sa navame māsi ilā somasutātmajam
GE09ram_07_u:3097: 7.080.023c janayām āsa suśroṇī purūravasam ātmajam 7.080.024a jātamātraṃ tu suśroṇī pitur haste nyaveśayat
GE09ram_07_u:3100: 7.080.025c kathābhī ramayām āsa dharmayuktābhir ātmavān 7.081.001a tathoktavati rāme tu tasya janma tad adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:3101: 7.081.001c uvāca lakṣmaṇo bhūyo bharataś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3102: 7.081.002a sā priyā somaputrasya saṃvatsaram athoṣitā 7.081.002c akarot kiṃ naraśreṣṭha tat tvaṃ śaṃsitum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:3103: 7.081.003a tayos tad vākyamādhuryaṃ niśamya paripṛcchatoḥ 7.081.003c rāmaḥ punar uvācemāṃ prajāpatisute kathām 7.081.004a puruṣatvaṃ gate śūre budhaḥ paramabuddhimān 7.081.004c saṃvartaṃ paramodāram ājuhāva mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3104: 7.081.005a cyavanaṃ bhṛguputraṃ ca muniṃ cāriṣṭaneminam 7.081.005c pramodanaṃ modakaraṃ tato durvāsasaṃ munim 7.081.006a etān sarvān samānīya vākyajñas tattvadarśinaḥ 7.081.006c uvāca sarvān suhṛdo dhairyeṇa susamāhitaḥ 7.081.007a ayaṃ rājā mahābāhuḥ kardamasya ilaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3105: 7.081.007c jānītainaṃ yathā bhūtaṃ śreyo hy asya vidhīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:3106: 7.081.008a teṣāṃ saṃvadatām eva tam āśramam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:3107: 7.081.008c kardamaḥ sumahātejā dvijaiḥ saha mahātmabhiḥ 7.081.009a pulastyaś ca kratuś caiva vaṣaṭkāras tathaiva ca
GE09ram_07_u:3108: 7.081.009c oṃkāraś ca mahātejās tam āśramam upāgaman
GE09ram_07_u:3110: 7.081.010c hitaiṣiṇo bāhli pateḥ pṛthag vākyam athābruvan
GE09ram_07_u:3111: 7.081.011a kardamas tv abravīd vākyaṃ sutārthaṃ paramaṃ hitam
GE09ram_07_u:3112: 7.081.011c dvijāḥ śṛṇuta madvākyaṃ yac chreyaḥ pārthivasya hi
GE09ram_07_u:3113: 7.081.012a nānyaṃ paśyāmi bhaiṣajyam antareṇa vṛṣadhvajam 7.081.012c nāśvamedhāt paro yajñaḥ priyaś caiva mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3114: 7.081.013a tasmād yajāmahe sarve pārthivārthe durāsadam 7.081.013c kardamenaivam uktās tu sarva eva dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3115: 7.081.013e rocayanti sma taṃ yajñaṃ rudrasyārādhanaṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:3116: 7.081.014a saṃvartasya tu rājarṣiḥ śiṣyaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ 7.081.014c marutta iti vikhyatas taṃ yajñaṃ samupāharat
GE09ram_07_u:3117: 7.081.015a tato yajño mahān āsīd budhāśramasamīpataḥ 7.081.015c rudraś ca paramaṃ toṣam ājagāma mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3118: 7.081.016a atha yajñasamāptau tu prītaḥ paramayā mudā
GE09ram_07_u:3119: 7.081.016c umāpatir dvijān sarvān uvācedam ilāṃ prati
GE09ram_07_u:3121: 7.081.017c asya bāhlipateś caiva kiṃ karomi priyaṃ śubham
GE09ram_07_u:3122: 7.081.018a tathā vadati deveśe dvijās te susamāhitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3123: 7.081.018c prasādayanti deveśaṃ yathā syāt puruṣas tv ilā
GE09ram_07_u:3124: 7.081.019a tataḥ prītamanā rudraḥ puruṣatvaṃ dadau punaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3126: 7.081.020a nivṛtte hayamedhe tu gate cādarśanaṃ hare
GE09ram_07_u:3127: 7.081.020c yathāgataṃ dvijāḥ sarve agacchan dīrghadarśinaḥ 7.081.021a rājā tu bāhlim utsṛjya madhyadeśe hy anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:3128: 7.081.021c niveśayām āsa puraṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ yaśaskaram 7.081.022a śaśabindus tu rājāsīd bāhlyāṃ parapuraṃjayaḥ 7.081.022c pratiṣṭhāna ilo rājā prajāpatisuto balī 7.081.023a sa kāle prāptavāṃl lokam ilo brāhmam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:3129: 7.081.023c ailaḥ purūravā rājā pratiṣṭhānam avāptavān 7.081.024a īdṛśo hy aśvamedhasya prabhāvaḥ puruṣarṣabhau 7.081.024c strībhūtaḥ pauruṣaṃ lebhe yac cānyad api durlabham
GE09ram_07_u:3130: 7.082.001a etad ākhyāya kākutstho bhrātṛhyām amitaprabhaḥ 7.082.001c lakṣmaṇaṃ punār evāha dharmayuktam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3131: 7.082.002a vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca jābālim atha kaśyapam
GE09ram_07_u:3133: 7.082.003a etān sarvān samāhūya mantrayitvā ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:3135: 7.082.004a tad vākyaṃ rāghaveṇoktaṃ śrutvā tvaritavikramaḥ 7.082.004c dvijān sarvān samāhūya darśayām āsa rāghavam
GE09ram_07_u:3138: 7.082.006a prāñjalis tu tato bhūtvā rāghavo dvijasāttamān
GE09ram_07_u:3140: 7.082.007a sa teṣāṃ dvijamukhyānāṃ vākyam adbhutadarśanam 7.082.007c aśvamedhāśritaṃ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ prīto 'bhavat tadā
GE09ram_07_u:3141: 7.082.008a vijñāya tu mataṃ teṣāṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3143: 7.082.009a śīghraṃ mahadbhir haribhir bahibhiś ca tadāśrayaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3144: 7.082.009c sārdham āgaccha bhadraṃ te anubhoktuṃ makhottamam
GE09ram_07_u:3145: 7.082.010a vibhīṣaṇaś ca rakṣobhiḥ kāmagair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3147: 7.082.011a rājānaś ca naravyāghra ye me priyacikīrṣavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3148: 7.082.011c sānugāḥ kṣipram āyāntu yajñabhūmim anuttamām 7.082.012a deśāntaragatā ye ca dvijā dharmaparāyaṇāḥ 7.082.012c nimantrayasva tān sarvān aśvamedhāya lakṣmaṇa 7.082.013a ṛṣayaś cā mahābāho āhūyantāṃ tapodhanāḥ 7.082.013c deśāntaragatā ye ca sadārāś ca maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3149: 7.082.014a yajñavāṭaś ca sumahān gomatyā naimiṣe vane
GE09ram_07_u:3150: 7.082.014c ājñāpyatāṃ mahābāho tad dhi puṇyam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:3152: 7.082.015c ayutaṃ tilamudgasya prayātv agre mahābala 7.082.016a suvarṇakoṭyo bahulā hiraṇyasya
GE09ram_07_u:3153: 7.082.016c agrato bharataḥ kṛtvā gacchatv agre mahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3154: 7.082.017a antarāpaṇavīthyaś ca sarvāṃś ca naṭanartakān 7.082.017c naigamān bālavṛddhāṃś ca dvijāṃś ca susamāhitān
GE09ram_07_u:3155: 7.082.018a karmāntikāṃś ca kuśalāñ śilpinaś ca supaṇḍitān
GE09ram_07_u:3156: 7.082.018c mātaraś caiva me sarvāḥ kumārāntaḥpurāṇi ca
GE09ram_07_u:3157: 7.082.019a kāñcanīṃ mama patnīṃ ca dīkṣārhāṃ yajñakarmaṇi
GE09ram_07_u:3158: 7.082.019c agrato bharataḥ kṛtvā gacchatv agre mahāmatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3159: 7.083.001a tat sarvam akhilenāśu prasthāpya bharatāgrajaḥ 7.083.001c hayaṃ lakṣmaṇasaṃpannaṃ kṛṣṇasāraṃ mumoca ha 7.083.002a ṛtvigbhir lakṣmaṇaṃ sārdham aśve ca viniyujya saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3161: 7.083.003a yajñavāṭaṃ mahābāhur dṛṣṭvā paramam adbhutam 7.083.003c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe śrīmān iti ca so 'bravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3162: 7.083.004a naimiṣe vasatas tasya sarva eva narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3163: 7.083.004c ājagmuḥ sarvarāṣṭrebhyas tān rāmaḥ pratyapūjayat 7.083.005a upakāryān mahārhāṃś ca pārthivānāṃ mahātmanām 7.083.005c sānugānāṃ naraśreṣṭho vyādideśa mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3165: 7.083.006c bharataḥ saṃdadāv āśu śatrughnasahitas tadā 7.083.007a vānarāś ca mahātmānaḥ sugrīvasahitās tadā 7.083.007c viprāṇāṃ praṇatāḥ sarve cakrire pariveṣaṇam 7.083.008a vibhīṣaṇaś ca rakṣobhiḥ sragvibhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3170: 7.083.010c chandato dehi visrabdho yāvat tuṣyanti yācakāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3172: 7.083.011a na kaś cin malinas tatra dīno vāpy atha vā kṛśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3174: 7.083.012a ye ca tatra mahātmāno munayaś cirajīvinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3176: 7.083.013a rajatānāṃ suvarṇānāṃ ratnānām atha vāsasām 7.083.013c aniśaṃ dīyamānānāṃ nāntaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3177: 7.083.014a na śakrasya na somasya yamasya varuṇasya vā
GE09ram_07_u:3178: 7.083.014c īdṛśo dṛṣṭapūrvo na evam ūcus tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3179: 7.083.015a sarvatra vānarās tasthuḥ sarvatraiva ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3180: 7.083.015c vāso dhanāni kāmibhyaḥ pūrṇahastā dadur bhṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:3182: 7.083.016c saṃvatsaram atho sāgraṃ vartate na ca hīyate
GE09ram_07_u:3185: 7.084.002a sa dṛṣṭvā divyasaṃkāśaṃ yajñam adbhutadarśanam 7.084.002c ekānte ṛṣivāṭānāṃ cakāra uṭajāñ śubhān 7.084.003a sa śiṣyāv abravīd dhṛṣṭo yuvāṃ gatvā samāhitau
GE09ram_07_u:3186: 7.084.003c kṛtsnaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kāvyaṃ gāyatāṃ parayā mudā
GE09ram_07_u:3188: 7.084.004c rathyāsu rājamārgeṣu pārthivānāṃ gṛheṣu ca 7.084.005a rāmasya bhavanadvāri yatra karma ca vartate
GE09ram_07_u:3189: 7.084.005c ṛtvijām agrataś caiva tatra geyaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3190: 7.084.006a imāni ca phalāny atra svādūni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:3192: 7.084.007a na yāsyathaḥ śramaṃ vatsau bhakṣayitvā phalāni vai
GE09ram_07_u:3193: 7.084.007c mūlāni ca sumṛṣṭāni nagarāt parihāsyatha 7.084.008a yadi śabdāpayed rāmaḥ śravaṇāya mahīpatiḥ 7.084.008c ṛṣīṇām upaviṣṭānāṃ tato geyaṃ pravartatām 7.084.009a divase viṃśatiḥ sargā geyā vai parayā mudā
GE09ram_07_u:3194: 7.084.009c pramāṇair bahubhis tatra yathoddiṣṭaṃ mayā purā
GE09ram_07_u:3195: 7.084.010a lobhaś cāpi na kartavyaḥ svalpo 'pi dhanakāṅkṣayā
GE09ram_07_u:3197: 7.084.011a yadi pṛcchet sa kākutstho yuvāṃ kasyeti dārakau
GE09ram_07_u:3198: 7.084.011c vālmīker atha śiṣyau hi brūtām evaṃ narādhipam
GE09ram_07_u:3199: 7.084.012a imās tantrīḥ sumadhurāḥ sthānaṃ vā pūrvadarśitam
GE09ram_07_u:3201: 7.084.013a ādiprabhṛti geyaṃ syān na cāvajñāya pārthivam
GE09ram_07_u:3202: 7.084.013c pitā hi sarvabhūtānāṃ rājā bhavati dharmataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3203: 7.084.014a tad yuvāṃ hṛṣṭamanasau śvaḥ prabhāte samādhinā
GE09ram_07_u:3205: 7.084.015a iti saṃdiśya bahuśo muniḥ prācetasas tadā
GE09ram_07_u:3206: 7.084.015c vālmīkiḥ paramodāras tūṣṇīm āsīn mahāyaśāḥ 7.084.016a tām adbhutāṃ tau hṛdaye kumārau; niveśya vāṇīm ṛṣibhāṣitāṃ
GE09ram_07_u:3208: 7.084.016c samutsukau tau sukham ūṣatur niśāṃ; yathāśvinau bhārgavanītisaṃskṛtau 7.085.001a tau rajanyāṃ prabhātāyāṃ snātau hutahutāśanau 7.085.001c yathoktam ṛṣiṇā pūrvaṃ tatra tatrābhyagāyatām 7.085.002a tāṃ sa śuśrāva kākutsthaḥ pūrvacaryāṃ tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3209: 7.085.002c apūrvāṃ pāṭhya jātiṃ ca geyena samalaṃkṛtām
GE09ram_07_u:3212: 7.085.004a atha karmāntare rājā samānīya mahāmunīn 7.085.004c pārthivāṃś ca naravyāghraḥ paṇḍitān naigamāṃs tathā
GE09ram_07_u:3213: 7.085.005a paurāṇikāñ śabdavito ye ca vṛddhā dvijātayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3214: 7.085.005c etān sarvān samānīya gātārau samaveśayat 7.085.006a hṛṣṭā ṛṣigaṇās tatra pārthivāś ca mahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3215: 7.085.006c pibanta iva cakṣurbhyāṃ rājānaṃ gāyakau ca tau
GE09ram_07_u:3216: 7.085.007a parasparam athocus te sarva eva samaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3217: 7.085.007c ubhau rāmasya sadṛśau bimbād bimbam ivoddhṛtau
GE09ram_07_u:3218: 7.085.008a jaṭilau yadi na syātāṃ na valkaladharau yadi
GE09ram_07_u:3219: 7.085.008c viśeṣaṃ nādhigacchāmo gāyato rāghavasya ca 7.085.009a teṣāṃ saṃvadatām evaṃ śrotṝṇāṃ harṣavardhanam 7.085.009c geyaṃ pracakratus tatra tāv ubhau munidārakau
GE09ram_07_u:3220: 7.085.010a tataḥ pravṛttaṃ madhuraṃ gāndharvam atimānuṣam 7.085.010c na ca tṛptiṃ yayuḥ sarve śrotāro geya saṃpadā 7.085.011a pravṛttam āditaḥ pūrvaṃ sargān nāradadarśanāt 7.085.011c tataḥ prabhṛti sargāṃś ca yāvadviṃśaty agāyatām
GE09ram_07_u:3221: 7.085.012a tato 'parāhṇasamaye rāghavaḥ samabhāṣata 7.085.012c śrutvā viṃśatisargāṃs tān bharataṃ bhrātṛvatsalaḥ 7.085.013a aṣṭādaśa sahasrāṇi suvarṇasya mahātmanoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3222: 7.085.013c dadasva śīghraṃ kākutstha bālayor mā vṛthā śramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3223: 7.085.014a dīyamānaṃ suvarṇaṃ tan nāgṛhṇītāṃ kuśīlavau 7.085.014c ūcatuś ca mahātmānau kim aneneti vismitau
GE09ram_07_u:3224: 7.085.015a vanyena phalamūlena niratu svo vanaukasau 7.085.015c suvarṇena hiraṇyena kiṃ kariṣyāvahe vane 7.085.016a tathā tayoḥ prabruvatoḥ kautūhalasamanvitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3225: 7.085.016c śrotāraś caiva rāmaś ca sarva eva suvismitāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3226: 7.085.017a tasya caivāgamaṃ rāmaḥ kāvyasya śrotum utsukaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3227: 7.085.017c papraccha tau mahātejās tāv ubhau munidārakau
GE09ram_07_u:3228: 7.085.018a kiṃpramāṇam idaṃ kāvyaṃ kā pratiṣṭhā mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3229: 7.085.018c kartā kāvyasya mahataḥ ko vāsau munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3230: 7.085.019a pṛcchantaṃ rāghavaṃ vākyam ūcatur munidārakau 7.085.019c vālmīkir bhagavān kartā saṃprāpto yajñasaṃnidhim 7.085.019e yenedaṃ caritaṃ tubhyam aśeṣaṃ saṃpradarśitam 7.085.020a ādiprabhṛti rājendra pañcasarga śatāni ca 7.085.020c pratiṣṭhā jīvitaṃ yāvat tāvad rājañ śubhāśubham
GE09ram_07_u:3231: 7.085.021a yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā rājañ śravaṇāya mahāratha
GE09ram_07_u:3232: 7.085.021c karmāntare kṣaṇī hūtas tac chṛṇuṣva sahānujaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3233: 7.085.022a bāḍham ity abravīd rāmas tau cānujñāpya rāghavam
GE09ram_07_u:3234: 7.085.022c prahṛṣṭau jagmatur vāsaṃ yatrāsau munipuṃgavaḥ 7.085.023a rāmo 'pi munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ pārthivaiś ca mahātmabhiḥ 7.085.023c śrutvā tad gītamādhuryaṃ karmaśālām upāgamat 7.086.001a rāmo bahūny ahāny eva tad gītaṃ paramādbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:3235: 7.086.001c śuśrāva munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ rājabhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3236: 7.086.002a tasmin gīte tu vijñāya sītāputrau kuśīlavau
GE09ram_07_u:3237: 7.086.002c tasyāḥ pariṣado madhye rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3239: 7.086.004a yadi śuddhasamācārā yadi vā vītakalmaṣā 7.086.004c karotv ihātmanaḥ śuddhim anumānya mahāmunim 7.086.005a chandaṃ munes tu vijñāya sītāyāś ca manogatam
GE09ram_07_u:3240: 7.086.005c pratyayaṃ dātukāmāyās tataḥ śaṃsata me laghu
GE09ram_07_u:3241: 7.086.006a śvaḥ prabhāte tu śapathaṃ maithilī janakātmajā
GE09ram_07_u:3242: 7.086.006c karotu pariṣanmadhye śodhanārthaṃ mameha ca 7.086.007a śrutvā tu rāghavasyaitad vacaḥ paramam adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:3243: 7.086.007c dūtāḥ saṃprayayur vāṭaṃ yatrāste munipuṃgavaḥ 7.086.008a te praṇamya mahātmānaṃ jvalantam amitaprabham 7.086.008c ūcus te rāma vākyāni mṛdūni madhurāṇi ca
GE09ram_07_u:3244: 7.086.009a teṣāṃ tad bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā rāmasya ca manogatam
GE09ram_07_u:3245: 7.086.009c vijñāya sumahātejā munir vākyam athābravīt 7.086.010a evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vo yathā tuṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3246: 7.086.010c tathā kariṣyate sītā daivataṃ hi patiḥ striyāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3247: 7.086.011a tathoktā muninā sarve rāmadūtā mahaujasaḥ 7.086.011c pratyetya rāghavaṃ sarve munivākyaṃ babhāṣire 7.086.012a tataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ kākutsthaḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3248: 7.086.012c ṛṣīṃs tatra sametāṃś ca rājñaś caivābhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:3249: 7.086.013a bhagavantaḥ saśiṣyā vai sānugaś ca narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3251: 7.086.014a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ 7.086.014c sarveṣam ṛṣimukhyānāṃ sādhuvādo mahān abhūt 7.086.015a rājānaś ca mahātmānaḥ praśaṃsanti sma rāghavam
GE09ram_07_u:3252: 7.086.015c upapannaṃ naraśreṣṭha tvayy eva bhuvi nānyataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3253: 7.086.016a evaṃ viniścayaṃ kṛtvā śvobhūta iti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3254: 7.086.016c visarjayām āsa tadā sarvāṃs tāñ śatrusūdanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3255: 7.087.001a tasyāṃ rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ yajñavāṭagato nṛpaḥ 7.087.001c ṛṣīn sarvān mahātejāḥ śabdāpayati rāghavaḥ 7.087.002a vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3256: 7.087.002c viśvāmitro dīrghatapā durvāsāś ca mahātapāḥ 7.087.003a agastyo 'tha tathāśaktir bhārgavaś caiva vāmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3257: 7.087.003c mārkaṇḍeyaś ca dīrghāyur maudgalyaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3258: 7.087.004a bhārgavaś cyavanaś caiva śatānandaś ca dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:3259: 7.087.004c bharadvājaś ca tejasvī agniputraś ca suprabhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3260: 7.087.005a ete cānye ca munayo bahavaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3261: 7.087.005c rājānaś ca naravyāghrāḥ sarva eva samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3262: 7.087.006a rākṣasāś ca mahāvīryā vānarāś ca mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3263: 7.087.006c samājagmur mahātmānaḥ sarva eva kutūhalāt 7.087.007a kṣatriyāś caiva vaiśyāś ca śūdrāś caiva sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3265: 7.087.008a tathā samāgataṃ sarvam aśvabhūtam ivācalam 7.087.008c śrutvā munivaras tūrṇaṃ sasītaḥ samupāgamat 7.087.009a tam ṛṣiṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ sītā sānvagacchad avāṅmukhī
GE09ram_07_u:3266: 7.087.009c kṛtāñjalir bāṣpagalā kṛtvā rāmaṃ manogatam 7.087.010a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā śrīm ivāyāntīṃ brahmāṇam anugāminīm
GE09ram_07_u:3267: 7.087.010c vālmīkeḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sītāṃ sādhukāro mahān abhūt
GE09ram_07_u:3268: 7.087.011a tato halahalā śabdaḥ sarveṣām evam ābabhau
GE09ram_07_u:3270: 7.087.012a sādhu sīteti ke cit tu sādhu rāmeti cāpare 7.087.012c ubhāv eva tu tatrānye sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan 7.087.013a tato madhyaṃ janaughānāṃ praviśya munipuṃgavaḥ 7.087.013c sītāsahāyo vālmīkir iti hovāca rāghavam 7.087.014a iyaṃ dāśarathe sītā suvratā dharmacāriṇī 7.087.014c apāpā te parityaktā mamāśramasamīpataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3272: 7.087.015c pratyayaṃ dāsyate sītā tām anujñātum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:3273: 7.087.016a imau ca jānakī putrāv ubhau ca yamajātakau
GE09ram_07_u:3274: 7.087.016c sutau tavaiva durdharṣo satyam etad bravīmi te
GE09ram_07_u:3276: 7.087.017c na smarāmy anṛtaṃ vākyaṃ tathemau tava putrakau
GE09ram_07_u:3278: 7.087.018c tasyāḥ phalam upāśnīyām apāpā maithilī yathā
GE09ram_07_u:3279: 7.087.019a ahaṃ pañcasu bhūteṣu manaḥṣaṣṭheṣu rāghava 7.087.019c vicintya sītāṃ śuddheti nyagṛhṇāṃ vananirjhare 7.087.020a iyaṃ śuddhasamācārā apāpā patidevatā
GE09ram_07_u:3281: 7.088.001a vālmīkinaivam uktas tu rāghavaḥ pratyabhāṣata 7.088.001c prāñjalir jagato madhye dṛṣṭvā tāṃ devavarṇinīm
GE09ram_07_u:3282: 7.088.002a evam etan mahābhāga yathā vadasi dharmavit
GE09ram_07_u:3283: 7.088.002c pratyayo hi mama brahmaṃs tava vākyair akalmaṣaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3284: 7.088.003a pratyayo hi purā datto vaidehyā surasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_07_u:3285: 7.088.003c seyaṃ lokabhayād brahmann apāpety abhijānatā 7.088.003e parityaktā mayā sītā tad bhavān kṣantum arhati
GE09ram_07_u:3286: 7.088.004a jānāmi cemau putrau me yamajātau kuśīlavau
GE09ram_07_u:3287: 7.088.004c śuddhāyāṃ jagato madhye maithilyāṃ prītir astu me
GE09ram_07_u:3288: 7.088.005a abhiprāyaṃ tu vijñāya rāmasya surasattamāḥ 7.088.005c pitāmahaṃ puraskṛtya sarva eva samāgatāḥ 7.088.006a ādityā vasavo rudrā viśve deśā marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3289: 7.088.006c aśvināv ṛṣigandharvā apsarāṇāṃ gaṇās tathā 7.088.006e sādhyāś ca devāḥ sarve te sarve ca paramarṣayaḥ 7.088.007a tato vāyuḥ śubhaḥ puṇyo divyagandho manoramaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3290: 7.088.007c taṃ janaughaṃ suraśreṣṭho hlādayām āsa sarvataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3291: 7.088.008a tad adbhutam ivācintyaṃ nirīkṣante samāhitāḥ 7.088.008c mānavāḥ sarvarāṣṭrebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge yathā 7.088.009a sarvān samāgatān dṛṣṭvā sītā kāṣāyavāsinī 7.088.009c abravīt prāñjalir vākyam adhodṛṣṭir avānmukhī 7.088.010a yathāhaṃ rāghavād anyaṃ manasāpi na cintaye
GE09ram_07_u:3292: 7.088.010c tathā me mādhavī devī vivaraṃ dātum arhati
GE09ram_07_u:3293: 7.088.011a tathā śapantyāṃ vaidehyāṃ prādurāsīt tad adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:3294: 7.088.011c bhūtalād utthitaṃ divyaṃ siṃhāsanam anuttamam 7.088.012a dhriyamāṇaṃ śirobhis tan nāgair amitavikramaiḥ 7.088.012c divyaṃ divyena vapuṣā sarvaratnavibhūṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:3295: 7.088.013a tasmiṃs tu dharaṇī devī bāhubhyāṃ gṛhya maithilīm
GE09ram_07_u:3297: 7.088.014a tām āsanagatāṃ dṛṣṭvā praviśantīṃ rasātalam 7.088.014c puṇyavṛṣṭir avicchinnā divyā sītām avākirat 7.088.015a sādhukāraś ca sumahān devānāṃ sahasotthitaḥ 7.088.015c sādhu sādhv iti vai sīte yasyās te śīlam īdṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:3298: 7.088.016a evaṃ bahuvidhā vāco hy antarikṣagatāḥ surāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3300: 7.088.017a yajñavāṭagatāś cāpi munayaḥ sarva eva te
GE09ram_07_u:3301: 7.088.017c rājānaś ca naravyāghrā vismayān noparemire 7.088.018a antarikṣe ca bhūmau ca sarve sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3302: 7.088.018c dānavāś ca mahākāyāḥ pātāle pannagādhipāḥ 7.088.019a ke cid vineduḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ ke cid dhyānaparāyaṇāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3303: 7.088.019c ke cid rāmaṃ nirīkṣante ke cit sītām acetanāḥ 7.088.020a sītāpraveśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣām āsīt samāgamaḥ 7.088.020c taṃ muhūrtam ivātyarthaṃ sarvaṃ saṃmohitaṃ jagat
GE09ram_07_u:3305: 7.089.001c apaśyamāno vaidehīṃ mene śūnyam idaṃ jagat
GE09ram_07_u:3306: 7.089.001e śokena paramāyatto na śāntiṃ manasāgamat 7.089.002a visṛjya pārthivān sarvān
GE09ram_07_u:3308: 7.089.003a tato visṛjya tān sarvān rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3309: 7.089.003c hṛdi kṛtvā tadā sītām ayodhyāṃ praviveśa saḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3310: 7.089.004a na sītāyāḥ parāṃ bhāryāṃ vavre sa raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3311: 7.089.004c yajñe yajñe ca patnyarthaṃ jānakī kāñcanī bhavat
GE09ram_07_u:3315: 7.089.006c īje kratubhir anyaiś ca sa śrīmān āptadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3316: 7.089.007a evaṃ sa kālaḥ sumahān rājyasthasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3317: 7.089.007c dharme prayatamānasya vyatīyād rāghavasya tu 7.089.008a ṛkṣavānararakṣāṃsi sthitā rāmasya śāsane
GE09ram_07_u:3318: 7.089.008c anurajyanti rājāno ahany ahani rāghavam 7.089.009a kāle varṣati parjanyaḥ subhikṣaṃ vimalā diśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3320: 7.089.010a nākāle mriyate kaś cin na vyādhiḥ prāṇināṃ tadā 7.089.010c nādharmaś cābhavat kaś cid rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE09ram_07_u:3321: 7.089.011a atha dīrghasya kālasya rāmamātā yaśasvinī 7.089.011c putrapautraiḥ parivṛtā kāladharmam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:3322: 7.089.012a anviyāya sumitrāpi kaikeyī ca yaśasvinī 7.089.012c dharmaṃ kṛtvā bahuvidhaṃ tridive paryavasthitā 7.089.013a sarvāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ svarge rājñā daśarathena ca
GE09ram_07_u:3323: 7.089.013c samāgatā mahābhāgāḥ saha dharmaṃ ca lebhire
GE09ram_07_u:3324: 7.089.014a tāsāṃ rāmo mahādānaṃ kāle kāle prayacchati
GE09ram_07_u:3327: 7.089.015c cakāra rāmo dharmātmā pitṝn devān vivardhayan
GE09ram_07_u:3328: 7.090.001a kasya cit tv atha kālasya yudhājit kekayo nṛpaḥ 7.090.001c svaguruṃ preṣayām āsa rāghavāya mahātmane 7.090.002a gārgyam aṅgirasaḥ putraṃ brahmarṣim amitaprabham 7.090.002c daśa cāśvasahasrāṇi prītidānam anuttamam
GE09ram_07_u:3329: 7.090.003a kambalāni ca ratnāni citravastram athottamam 7.090.003c rāmāya pradadau rājā bahūny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:3330: 7.090.004a śrutvā tu rāghavo gārgyaṃ maharṣiṃ samupāgatam
GE09ram_07_u:3332: 7.090.005a pratyudgamya ca kākutsthaḥ krośamātraṃ sahānugaḥ 7.090.005c gārgyaṃ saṃpūjayām āsa dhanaṃ tat pratigṛhya ca
GE09ram_07_u:3333: 7.090.006a pṛṣṭvā ca prītidaṃ sarvaṃ kuśalaṃ mātulasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:3334: 7.090.006c upaviṣṭaṃ mahābhāgaṃ rāmaḥ praṣṭuṃ pracakrame 7.090.007a kim āha matulo vākyaṃ yadarthaṃ bhagavān iha
GE09ram_07_u:3335: 7.090.007c prāpto vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭha sākṣād iva bṛhaspatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3336: 7.090.008a rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā brahmarṣiḥ kāryavistaram 7.090.008c vaktum adbhutasaṃkāśaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:3337: 7.090.009a mātulas te mahābāho vākyam āha nararṣabha
GE09ram_07_u:3338: 7.090.009c yudhājit prītisaṃyuktaṃ śrūyatāṃ yadi rocate 7.090.010a ayaṃ gandharvaviṣayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3339: 7.090.010c sindhor ubhayataḥ pārśve deśaḥ paramaśobhanaḥ 7.090.011a taṃ ca rakṣanti gandharvāḥ sāyudhā yuddhakovidāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3340: 7.090.011c śailūṣasya sutā vīrās tisraḥ koṭyo mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3341: 7.090.012a tān vinirjitya kākutstha gandharvaviṣayaṃ śubham 7.090.012c niveśaya mahābāho dve pure susamāhitaḥ 7.090.013a anyasya na gatis tatra deśaś cāyaṃ suśobhanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3342: 7.090.013c rocatāṃ te mahābāho nāhaṃ tvām anṛtaṃ vade
GE09ram_07_u:3343: 7.090.014a tac chrutvā rāghavaḥ prīto mararṣir mātulasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:3344: 7.090.014c uvāca bāḍham ity evaṃ bharataṃ cānvavaikṣata
GE09ram_07_u:3346: 7.090.015c imau kumārau taṃ deśaṃ brahmarṣe vijayiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3347: 7.090.016a bharatasyātmajau vīrau takṣaḥ puṣkala eva ca
GE09ram_07_u:3348: 7.090.016c mātulena suguptau tau dharmeṇa ca samāhitau
GE09ram_07_u:3349: 7.090.017a bharataṃ cāgrataḥ kṛtvā kumārau sabalānugau 7.090.017c nihatya gandharvasutān dve pure vibhajiṣyataḥ 7.090.018a niveśya te puravare ātmājau saṃniveśya ca
GE09ram_07_u:3350: 7.090.018c āgamiṣyati me bhūyaḥ sakāśam atidhārmikaḥ 7.090.019a brahmarṣim evam uktvā tu bharataṃ sabalānugam
GE09ram_07_u:3351: 7.090.019c ājñāpayām āsa tadā kumārau cābhyaṣecayat 7.090.020a nakṣatreṇa ca saumyena puraskṛtyāṅgiraḥ sutam 7.090.020c bharataḥ saha sainyena kumārābhyāṃ ca niryayau
GE09ram_07_u:3352: 7.090.021a sā senā śakrayukteva naragān niryayāv atha
GE09ram_07_u:3354: 7.090.022a māṃsāśīni ca sattvāni rakṣāṃsi sumahānti ca
GE09ram_07_u:3355: 7.090.022c anujagmuś ca bharataṃ rudhirasya pipāsayā 7.090.023a bhūtagrāmāś ca bahavo māṃsabhakṣāḥ sudāruṇāḥ 7.090.023c gandharvaputramāṃsāni bhoktukāmāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3357: 7.090.024c bahūni vai sahasrāṇi senāyā yayur agrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3358: 7.090.025a adhyardhamāsam uṣitā pathi senā nirāmayā 7.090.025c hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇā kekayaṃ
GE09ram_07_u:3359: 7.091.001a śrutvā senāpatiṃ prāptaṃ bharataṃ kekayādhipaḥ 7.091.001c yudhājid gārgyasahitaṃ parāṃ prītim upāgamat 7.091.002a sa niryayau janaughena mahatā kekayādhipaḥ 7.091.002c tvaramāṇo 'bhicakrāma gandharvān devarūpiṇaḥ 7.091.003a bharataś ca yudhājic ca sametau laghuvikramau
GE09ram_07_u:3361: 7.091.004a śrutvā tu bharataṃ prāptaṃ gandharvās te samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3363: 7.091.005a tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam 7.091.005c saptarātraṃ mahābhīmaṃ na cānyatarayor jayaḥ 7.091.006a tato rāmānujaḥ kruddhaḥ kālasyāstraṃ sudāruṇam 7.091.006c saṃvartaṃ nāma bharato gandharveṣv abhyayojayat 7.091.007a te baddhāḥ kālapāśena saṃvartena vidāritāḥ 7.091.007c kṣaṇenābhihatās tisras tatra koṭyo mahātmanā 7.091.008a taṃ ghātaṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ na smaranti divaukasaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3365: 7.091.009a hateṣu teṣu vīreṣu bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ 7.091.009c niveśayām āsa tadā samṛddhe dve purottame
GE09ram_07_u:3366: 7.091.009e takṣaṃ takṣaśilāyāṃ tu puṣkaraṃ puṣkarāvatau 7.091.010a gandharvadeśo ruciro gāndhāraviṣayaś ca saḥ 7.091.010c varṣaiḥ pañcabhir ākīrṇo viṣayair nāgarais tathā
GE09ram_07_u:3370: 7.091.012c udyānayānaughavṛte suvibhaktāntarāpaṇe 7.091.013a ubhe puravare ramye vistarair upaśobhite 7.091.013c gṛhamukhyaiḥ surucirair vimānaiḥ samavarṇibhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3372: 7.091.014c niveśya pañcabhir varṣair bharato rāghavānujaḥ 7.091.014e punar āyān mahābāhur ayodhyāṃ kaikayīsutaḥ 7.091.015a so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ sākṣād dharmam ivāparam
GE09ram_07_u:3373: 7.091.015c rāghavaṃ bharataḥ śrīmān brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3374: 7.091.016a śaśaṃsa ca yathāvṛttaṃ gandharvavadham uttamam 7.091.016c niveśanaṃ ca deśasya śrutvā prīto 'sya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3375: 7.092.001a tac chrutvā harṣam āpede rāghavo bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:3376: 7.092.001c vākyaṃ cādbhutasaṃkāśaṃ bhrātṝn provāca rāghavaḥ 7.092.002a imau kumārau saumitre tava dharmaviśāradau 7.092.002c aṅgadaś candraketuś ca rājyārhau dṛḍhadhanvinau 7.092.003a imau rājye 'bhiṣekṣyāmi deśaḥ sādhu vidhīyatām
GE09ram_07_u:3377: 7.092.003c ramaṇīyo hy asaṃbādho rametāṃ yatra dhanvinau
GE09ram_07_u:3378: 7.092.004a na rājñāṃ yatra pīdā syān nāśramāṇāṃ vināśanam
GE09ram_07_u:3379: 7.092.004c sa deśo dṛśyatāṃ saumya nāparādhyāmahe yathā
GE09ram_07_u:3380: 7.092.005a tathoktavati rāme tu bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3381: 7.092.005c ayaṃ kārāpatho deśaḥ suramaṇyo nirāmayaḥ 7.092.006a niveśyatāṃ tatra puram aṅgadasya mahātmanaḥ 7.092.006c candraketoś ca ruciraṃ candrakāntaṃ nirāmayam 7.092.007a tad vākyaṃ bharatenoktaṃ pratijagrāha rāghavaḥ 7.092.007c taṃ ca kṛtā vaśe deśam aṅgadasya nyaveśayat
GE09ram_07_u:3382: 7.092.008a aṅgadīyā purī ramyā aṅgadasya niveśitā 7.092.008c ramaṇīyā suguptā ca rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā
GE09ram_07_u:3383: 7.092.009a candraketus tu mallasya mallabhūmyāṃ niveśitā 7.092.009c candrakānteti vikhyātā divyā svargapurī yathā 7.092.010a tato rāmaḥ parāṃ prītiṃ bharato lakṣmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_07_u:3384: 7.092.010c yayur yudhi durādharṣā abhiṣekaṃ ca cakrire
GE09ram_07_u:3385: 7.092.011a abhiṣicya kumārau dvau prasthāpya sabalānugau 7.092.011c aṅgadaṃ paścimā bhūmiṃ candraketum udaṅmukham 7.092.012a aṅgadaṃ cāpi saumitrir lakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha
GE09ram_07_u:3386: 7.092.012c candraketos tu bharataḥ pārṣṇigrāho babhūva ha
GE09ram_07_u:3387: 7.092.013a lakṣmaṇas tv aṅgadīyāyāṃ saṃvatsaram athoṣitaḥ 7.092.013c putre sthite durādharṣe ayodhyāṃ punar āgamat
GE09ram_07_u:3389: 7.092.014c ayodhyāṃ punar agamya rāmapādāv upāgamat 7.092.015a ubhau saumitribharatau rāmapādāv
GE09ram_07_u:3390: 7.092.015c kālaṃ gatam api snehān na jajñāte 'tidhārmikau
GE09ram_07_u:3391: 7.092.016a evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi daśateṣāṃ yayus tadā 7.092.016c dharme prayatamānānāṃ paurakāryeṣu
GE09ram_07_u:3392: 7.092.017a vihṛtya lākaṃ paripūrṇamānasāḥ; śriyā vṛtā dharmapathe pare sthitāḥ 7.092.017c trayaḥ samiddhā iva dīptatejasā; hutāgnayaḥ sādhu mahādhvare
GE09ram_07_u:3394: 7.093.001a kasya cit tv atha kālasya rāme dharmapathe sthite 7.093.001c kālas tāpasarūpeṇa rājadvāram upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:3396: 7.093.002c māṃ nivedaya rāmāya saṃprāptaṃ kāryagauravāt 7.093.003a dūto hy atibalasyāhaṃ maharṣer amitaujasaḥ 7.093.003c rāmaṃ didṛkṣur āyātaḥ kāryeṇa hi mahābala
GE09ram_07_u:3397: 7.093.004a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saumitris tvarayānvitaḥ 7.093.004c nyavedayata rāmāya tāpasasya vivakṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:3398: 7.093.005a jayasva rājan dharmeṇa ubhau lokau mahādyute
GE09ram_07_u:3399: 7.093.005c dūtas tvāṃ draṣṭum āyātas tapasvī bhāskaraprabhaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3400: 7.093.006a tad vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇenoktaṃ śrutvā rāma uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3401: 7.093.006c praveśyatāṃ munis tāta mahaujās tasya vākyadhṛk
GE09ram_07_u:3402: 7.093.007a saumitris tu tathety uktvā prāveśayata taṃ munim
GE09ram_07_u:3403: 7.093.007c jvalantam iva tejobhiḥ pradahantam ivāṃśubhiḥ 7.093.008a so 'bhigamya raghuśreṣṭhaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā
GE09ram_07_u:3404: 7.093.008c ṛṣir madhurayā vācā vardhasvety āha rāghavam
GE09ram_07_u:3405: 7.093.009a tasmai rāmo mahātejāḥ pūjām arghya purogamām
GE09ram_07_u:3406: 7.093.009c dadau kuśalam avyagraṃ praṣṭuṃ caivopacakrame 7.093.010a pṛṣṭhaś ca kuśalaṃ tena rāmeṇa vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3407: 7.093.010c āsane kāñcane divye niṣasāda mahāyaśāḥ 7.093.011a tam uvāca tato rāmaḥ svāgataṃ te mahāmune
GE09ram_07_u:3408: 7.093.011c prāpayasva ca vākyāni yato dūtas tvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3409: 7.093.012a codito rājasiṃhena munir vākyam udīrayat 7.093.012c dvandvam etat pravaktavyaṃ na ca cakṣur hataṃ vacaḥ 7.093.013a yaḥ śṛṇoti nirīkṣed vā sa vadhyas tava rāghava 7.093.013c bhaved vai munimukhyasya vacanaṃ yady avekṣase
GE09ram_07_u:3410: 7.093.014a tatheti ca pratijñāya rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3411: 7.093.014c dvāri tiṣṭha mahābāho pratihāraṃ visarjaya 7.093.015a sa me vadhyaḥ khalu bhavet kathāṃ dvandvasamīritām
GE09ram_07_u:3412: 7.093.015c ṛṣer mama ca saumitre paśyed vā śṛṇuyā ca yaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3413: 7.093.016a tato nikṣipya kākutstho lakṣmaṇaṃ dvārasaṃgrahe 7.093.016c tam uvāca muniṃ vākyaṃ kathayasveti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3414: 7.093.017a yat te manīṣitaṃ vākyaṃ yena vāsi samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3415: 7.093.017c kathayasva viśaṅkas tvaṃ mamāpi hṛdi vartate
GE09ram_07_u:3416: 7.094.001a śṛṇu rāma mahābāho yadartham aham āhataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3418: 7.094.002a tavāhaṃ pūrvake bhāve putraḥ parapuraṃjaya 7.094.002c māyāsaṃbhāvito vīra kālaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3419: 7.094.003a pitāmahaś ca bhagavān āha lokapatiḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3420: 7.094.003c samayas te mahābāho svarlokān parirakṣitum 7.094.004a saṃkṣipya ca purā lokān māyayā svayam eva hi 7.094.004c mahārṇave śayāno 'psu māṃ tvaṃ pūrvam ajījanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3421: 7.094.005a bhogavantaṃ tato nāgam anantam udake śayam
GE09ram_07_u:3422: 7.094.005c māyayā janayitvā tvaṃ dvau ca sattvau mahābalau
GE09ram_07_u:3423: 7.094.006a madhuṃ ca kaiṭabhaṃ caiva yayor asthicayair vṛtā
GE09ram_07_u:3424: 7.094.006c iyaṃ parvatasaṃbādhā medinī cābhavan mahī 7.094.007a padme divyārkasaṃkāśe nābhyām utpādya mām api
GE09ram_07_u:3425: 7.094.007c prājāpatyaṃ tvayā karma sarvaṃ mayi niveśitam
GE09ram_07_u:3426: 7.094.008a so 'haṃ saṃnyastabhāro hi tvām upāse jagatpatim 7.094.008c rakṣāṃ vidhatsva bhūteṣu mama tejaḥ karo bhavān
GE09ram_07_u:3427: 7.094.009a tatas tvam api durdharṣas tasmād bhāvāt sanātanāt
GE09ram_07_u:3429: 7.094.010a adityāṃ vīryavān putro bhrātṝṇāṃ harṣavardhanaḥ 7.094.010c samutpanneṣu kṛtyeṣu lokasāhyāya kalpase
GE09ram_07_u:3430: 7.094.011a sa tvaṃ vitrāsyamānāsu prajāsu jagatāṃ vara
GE09ram_07_u:3433: 7.094.012c kṛtvā vāsasya niyatiṃ svayam evātmanaḥ purā
GE09ram_07_u:3434: 7.094.013a sa tvaṃ manomayaḥ putraḥ pūrṇāyur mānuṣeṣv iha
GE09ram_07_u:3436: 7.094.014a yadi bhūyo mahārāja prajā icchasy upāsitum
GE09ram_07_u:3437: 7.094.014c vasa vā vīra bhadraṃ te evam āha pitāmahaḥ 7.094.015a atha vā vijigīṣā te suralokāya
GE09ram_07_u:3438: 7.094.015c sanāthā viṣṇunā devā bhavantu vigatajvarāḥ 7.094.016a śrutvā pitāmahenoktaṃ vākyaṃ kālasamīritam
GE09ram_07_u:3439: 7.094.016c rāghavaḥ prahasan vākyaṃ sarvasaṃhāram abravīt 7.094.017a śrutaṃ me devadevasya vākyaṃ paramam adbhutam
GE09ram_07_u:3440: 7.094.017c prītir hi mahatī jātā tavāgamanasaṃbhavā 7.094.018a bhadraṃ te 'stu gamiṣyāmi yata evāham āgataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3441: 7.094.018c hṛd gato hy asi saṃprāpto na me 'sty atra vicāraṇā 7.094.019a mayā hi sarvakṛtyeṣu devānāṃ vaśavartinām 7.094.019c sthātavyaṃ sarvasaṃhāre yathā hy āha pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3442: 7.095.001a tathā tayoḥ kathayator durvāsā bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3445: 7.095.002c rāmaṃ darśaya me śīghraṃ purā me 'rtho 'tivartate
GE09ram_07_u:3446: 7.095.003a munes tu bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_07_u:3447: 7.095.003c abhivādya mahātmānaṃ vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3448: 7.095.004a kiṃ kāryaṃ brūhi bhagavan ko vārthaḥ kiṃ karomy aham
GE09ram_07_u:3449: 7.095.004c vyagro hi rāghavo brahman muhūrtaṃ vā pratīkṣatām
GE09ram_07_u:3450: 7.095.005a tac chrutvā ṛṣiśārdūlaḥ krodhena kaluṣīkṛtaḥ 7.095.005c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_07_u:3451: 7.095.006a asmin kṣaṇe māṃ saumitre rāmāya prativedaya
GE09ram_07_u:3452: 7.095.006c viṣayaṃ tvāṃ puraṃ caiva śapiṣye rāghavaṃ tathā
GE09ram_07_u:3453: 7.095.007a bharataṃ caiva saumitre yuṣmākaṃ yā ca saṃtatiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3454: 7.095.007c na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ bhūyo manyuṃ dhārayituṃ hṛdi 7.095.008a tac chrutvā ghorasaṃkāśaṃ vākyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3455: 7.095.008c cintayām āsa manasā tasya vākyasya niścayam
GE09ram_07_u:3456: 7.095.009a ekasya maraṇaṃ me 'stu mā bhūt sarvavināśanam
GE09ram_07_u:3457: 7.095.009c iti buddhyā viniścitya rāghavāya nyavedayat 7.095.010a lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ kālaṃ visṛjya ca
GE09ram_07_u:3458: 7.095.010c niṣpatya tvaritaṃ rājā atreḥ putraṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:3460: 7.095.011c kiṃ kāryam iti kākutsthaḥ kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata
GE09ram_07_u:3461: 7.095.012a tad vākyaṃ rāghaveṇṇoktaṃ śrutvā munivaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3462: 7.095.012c pratyāha rāmaṃ durvāsāḥ śrūyatāṃ dharmavatsala 7.095.013a adya varṣasahasrasya samāptir mama rāghava 7.095.013c so 'haṃ bhojanam icchāmi yathāsiddhaṃ tavānagha
GE09ram_07_u:3463: 7.095.014a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ rāmo harṣeṇa mahatānvitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3465: 7.095.015a sa tu bhuktvā muniśreṣṭhas tad annam amṛtopamam
GE09ram_07_u:3466: 7.095.015c sādhu rāmeti saṃbhāṣya svam āśramam upāgamat
GE09ram_07_u:3467: 7.095.016a tasmin gate mahātejā rāghavaḥ prītamānasaḥ 7.095.016c saṃsmṛtya kālavākyāni tato duḥkham upeyivān 7.095.017a duḥkhena ca susaṃtaptaḥ smṛtvā tad ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_07_u:3468: 7.095.017c avānmukho dīnamanā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_07_u:3469: 7.095.018a tato buddhyā viniścitya kālavākyāni rāghavaḥ 7.095.018c naitad astīti coktvā sa tūṣṇīm āsīn mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3470: 7.096.001a avāṅmukham atho dīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā somam ivāplutam
GE09ram_07_u:3471: 7.096.001c rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ hṛṣṭo madhuram abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3472: 7.096.002a na saṃtāpaṃ mahābāho madarthaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:3473: 7.096.002c pūrvanirmāṇabaddhā hi kālasya gatir īdṛśī 7.096.003a jahi māṃ saumya visrabdaḥ pratijñāṃ paripālaya
GE09ram_07_u:3474: 7.096.003c hīnapratijñāḥ kākutstha prayānti narakaṃ narāḥ 7.096.004a yadi prītir mahārāja yady anugrāhyatā mayi
GE09ram_07_u:3475: 7.096.004c jahi māṃ nirviśaṅkas tvaṃ dharmaṃ vardhaya rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:3476: 7.096.005a lakṣmaṇena tathoktas tu rāmaḥ pracalitendriyaḥ 7.096.005c mantriṇaḥ samupānīya tathaiva ca purodhasaṃ 7.096.006a abravīc ca yathāvṛttaṃ teṣāṃ madhye narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3478: 7.096.007a tac chrutvā mantriṇaḥ sarve sopādhyāyāḥ samāsata
GE09ram_07_u:3479: 7.096.007c vasiṣṭhas tu mahātejā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3480: 7.096.008a dṛṣṭam etan mahābāho kṣayaṃ te lomaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_07_u:3481: 7.096.008c lakṣmaṇena viyogaś ca tava rāma mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3482: 7.096.009a tyajainaṃ balavān kālo mā pratijñāṃ vṛthā kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3483: 7.096.009c vinaṣṭāyāṃ pratijñāyāṃ dharmo hi vilayaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_07_u:3484: 7.096.010a tato dharme vinaṣṭe tu trailokye sacarācaram
GE09ram_07_u:3485: 7.096.010c sadevarṣigaṇaṃ sarvaṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ 7.096.011a sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla
GE09ram_07_u:3486: 7.096.011c lakṣmaṇasya vadhenādya jagat svasthaṃ kuruṣva ha
GE09ram_07_u:3487: 7.096.012a teṣāṃ tat samavetānāṃ vākyaṃ dharmārthasaṃhitam 7.096.012c śrutvā pariṣado madhye rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3488: 7.096.013a visarjaye tvāṃ saumitre mā bhūd dharmaviparyayaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3489: 7.096.013c tyāgo vadho vā vihitaḥ sādhūnām ubhayaṃ samam
GE09ram_07_u:3491: 7.096.014c lakṣmaṇas tvaritaḥ prāyāt svagṛhaṃ na viveśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:3492: 7.096.015a sa gatvā sarayūtīram upaspṛśya kṛtāñjaliḥ 7.096.015c nigṛhya sarvasrotāṃsi niḥśvāsaṃ na mumoca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3493: 7.096.016a anucchvasantaṃ yuktaṃ taṃ saśakrāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ 7.096.016c devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve puṣpair avakiraṃs tadā
GE09ram_07_u:3494: 7.096.017a adṛśyaṃ sarvam anujaiḥ saśarīraṃ mahābalam 7.096.017c pragṛhya lakṣmaṇaṃ śakro divaṃ saṃpraviveśa ha
GE09ram_07_u:3495: 7.096.018a tato viṣṇoś caturbhāgam āgataṃ surasattamāḥ 7.096.018c hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāḥ sarve 'pūjayan ṛṣibhiḥ saha 7.097.001a visṛjya lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo duḥkhaśokasamanvitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3496: 7.097.001c purodhasaṃ mantriṇaś ca naigamāṃś cedam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3497: 7.097.002a adya rājye 'bhiṣekṣyāmi bharataṃ dharmavatsalam 7.097.002c ayodhyāyāṃ patiṃ vīraṃ tato yāsyāmy ahaṃ vanam
GE09ram_07_u:3498: 7.097.003a praveśayata saṃbhārān mā bhūt kālātyayo yathā
GE09ram_07_u:3499: 7.097.003c adyaivāhaṃ gamiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇena gatāṃ gatim 7.097.004a tac chrutvā rāghaveṇoktaṃ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo bhṛśam
GE09ram_07_u:3500: 7.097.004c mūrdhabhiḥ praṇatā bhūmau gatasattvā ivābhavan 7.097.005a bharataś ca visaṃjño 'bhūc chrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_07_u:3501: 7.097.005c rājyaṃ vigarhayām āsa rāghavaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3502: 7.097.006a satyena hi śape rājan svargaloke na caiva hi 7.097.006c na kāmaye yathā rājyaṃ tvāṃ vinā raghunandana
GE09ram_07_u:3503: 7.097.007a imau kuśīlavau rājann abhiṣiñca narādhipa 7.097.007c kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam
GE09ram_07_u:3504: 7.097.008a śatrughnasya tu gacchantu dūtās tvaritavikramāḥ 7.097.008c idaṃ gamanam asmākaṃ svargāyākhyāntu māciram 7.097.009a tac chrutvā bharatenoktaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāpi hy adho mukhān 7.097.009c paurān duḥkhena saṃtaptān vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3505: 7.097.010a vatsa rāma imāḥ paśya dharaṇīṃ prakṛtīr gatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3506: 7.097.010c jñātvaiṣām īpsitaṃ kāryaṃ mā caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3507: 7.097.011a vasiṣṭhasya tu vākyena utthāpya prakṛtījanam 7.097.011c kiṃ karomīti kākutsthaḥ sarvān vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3508: 7.097.012a tataḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo rāmaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE09ram_07_u:3509: 7.097.012c gacchantam anugacchāmo yato rāma gamiṣyasi 7.097.013a eṣā naḥ paramā prītir eṣa dharmaḥ paro mataḥ 7.097.013c hṛdgatā naḥ sadā tuṣṭis tavānugamane dṛḍhā
GE09ram_07_u:3510: 7.097.014a paureṣu yadi te prītir yadi sneho hy anuttamaḥ 7.097.014c saputradārāḥ kākutstha samaṃ gacchāma satpatham 7.097.015a tapovanaṃ vā durgaṃ vā nadīm ambhonidhiṃ tathā
GE09ram_07_u:3511: 7.097.015c vayaṃ te yadi na tyājyāḥ sarvān no naya īśvara
GE09ram_07_u:3512: 7.097.016a sa teṣāṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā kṛtāntaṃ ca nirīkṣyaca
GE09ram_07_u:3513: 7.097.016c paurāṇāṃ dṛḍhabhaktiṃ ca bāḍham ity eva so 'bravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3514: 7.097.017a evaṃ viniścayaṃ kṛtvā tasminn ahani rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3515: 7.097.017c kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīram uttareṣu tathā lavam
GE09ram_07_u:3516: 7.097.018a abhiṣiñcan mahātmānāv ubhāv eva kuśīlavau 7.097.018c rathānāṃ tu sahasrāṇi trīṇi nāgāyutāni ca
GE09ram_07_u:3517: 7.097.019a daśa cāśvasahasrāṇi ekaikasya dhanaṃ dadau 7.097.019c bahuratnau bahudhanau
GE09ram_07_u:3518: 7.097.020a abhiṣicya tu tau vīrau prasthāpya svapure tathā
GE09ram_07_u:3519: 7.097.020c dūtān saṃpreṣayām āsa śatrughnāya mahātmane 7.098.001a te dūtā rāmavākyena coditā laghuvikramāḥ 7.098.001c prajagmur madhurāṃ śīghraṃ cakrur vāsaṃ na cādhvani
GE09ram_07_u:3520: 7.098.002a tatas tribhir aho rātraiḥ saṃprāpya madhurām atha
GE09ram_07_u:3521: 7.098.002c śatrughnāya yathāvṛttam ācakhyuḥ sarvam eva tat
GE09ram_07_u:3522: 7.098.003a lakṣmaṇasya parityāgaṃ pratijñāṃ rāghavasya ca 7.098.003c putrayor abhiṣekaṃ ca paurānugamanaṃ tathā 7.098.004a kuśasya nagarī ramyā vindhyaparvatarodhasi
GE09ram_07_u:3523: 7.098.004c kuśāvatīti nāmnā sā kṛtā rāmeṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_07_u:3524: 7.098.005a śrāvitā ca purī ramyā śrāvatīti lavasya ca
GE09ram_07_u:3525: 7.098.005c ayodhyāṃ vijanāṃ caiva bharataṃ rāghavānugam 7.098.006a evaṃ sarvaṃ nivedyāśu śatrughnāya mahātmane 7.098.006c viremus te tato dūtās tvara rājann iti bruvan 7.098.007a śrutvā taṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ kulakṣayam upasthitam 7.098.007c prakṛtīs tu samānīya kāñcanaṃ ca purohitam
GE09ram_07_u:3526: 7.098.008a teṣāṃ sarvaṃ yathāvṛttam ākhyāya raghunandanaḥ 7.098.008c ātmanaś ca viparyāsaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE09ram_07_u:3528: 7.098.009c subāhur madhurāṃ lebhe śatrughātī ca vaidiśam
GE09ram_07_u:3529: 7.098.010a dvidhākṛtvā tu tāṃ senāṃ mādhurīṃ putrayor dvayoḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3531: 7.098.011a tato visṛjya rājānaṃ vaidiśe śatrughātinam 7.098.011c jagāma tvarito 'yodhyāṃ rathenaikena rāghavaḥ 7.098.012a sa dadarśa mahātmānaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE09ram_07_u:3534: 7.098.013c uvāca vākyaṃ dharmajño dharmam evānucintayan 7.098.014a kṛtvābhiṣekaṃ sutayor yuktaṃ rāghavayor dhanaiḥ 7.098.014c tavānugamane rājan viddhi māṃ kṛtaniścayam 7.098.015a na cānyad atra vaktavyaṃ dustaraṃ tava śāsanam
GE09ram_07_u:3535: 7.098.015c tyaktuṃ nārhasi māṃ vīra bhaktimantaṃ viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3536: 7.098.016a tasya tāṃ buddhim aklībāṃ vijñāya raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3537: 7.098.016c bāḍham ity eva śatrughnaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3538: 7.098.017a tasya vākyasya vākyānte vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ 7.098.017c ṛkṣarākṣasasaṃghāś ca samāpetur anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3539: 7.098.018a devaputrā ṛṣisutā gandharvāṇāṃ sutās tathā 7.098.018c rāma kṣayaṃ viditvā te sarva eva samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3540: 7.098.019a te rāmam abhivādyāhuḥ sarva eva samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3541: 7.098.019c tavānugamane rājan saṃprāptāḥ sma mahāyaśaḥ 7.098.020a yadi rāma vināsmābhir gacches tvaṃ puruṣarṣabha
