GE09ram_07_u:3542: 7.098.020c yamadaṇḍam ivodyamya tvayā sma vinipātitāḥ 7.098.021a evaṃ teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣkavānararakṣasām 7.098.021c vibhīṣaṇam athovāca madhuraṃ ślakṣṇayā girā 7.098.022a yāvat prajā dhariṣyanti tāvat tvaṃ vai vibhīṣaṇa
GE09ram_07_u:3543: 7.098.022c rākṣasendra mahāvīrya laṅkāsthaḥ svaṃ dhariṣyasi 7.098.023a prajāḥ saṃrakṣa dharmeṇa nottaraṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_07_u:3544: 7.098.024a tam evam uktvā kākutstho hanūmantam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3545: 7.098.024c jīvite kṛtabuddhis tvaṃ mā pratijñāṃ vilopaya
GE09ram_07_u:3546: 7.098.025a matkathāḥ pracariṣyanti yāval loke harīśvara 7.098.025c tāvat tvaṃ dhārayan prāṇān pratijñām anupālaya
GE09ram_07_u:3547: 7.098.026a tathaivam uktvā kākutsthaḥ sarvāṃs tān ṛkṣavānarān
GE09ram_07_u:3548: 7.098.026c mayā sārdhaṃ prayāteti tadā tān rāghavo 'bravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3549: 7.099.001a prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ pṛthuvakṣā mahāyaśāḥ 7.099.001c rāmaḥ kamalapatrākṣaḥ purodhasam athābravīt
GE09ram_07_u:3550: 7.099.002a agnihotraṃ vrajatv agre sarpir jvalitapāvakam 7.099.002c vājapeyātapatraṃ ca śobhayānaṃ mahāpatham
GE09ram_07_u:3551: 7.099.003a tato vasiṣṭhas tejasvī sarvaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ 7.099.003c cakāra vidhivad dharmyaṃ mahāprāsthānikaṃ vidhim 7.099.004a tataḥ kṣaumāmbaradharo brahma cāvartayan param 7.099.004c kuśān gṛhītvā pāṇibhyāṃ prasajya prayayāv atha
GE09ram_07_u:3552: 7.099.005a avyāharan kva cit kiṃ cin niśceṣṭo niḥsukhaḥ pathi 7.099.005c nirjagāma gṛhāt tasmād dīpyamāno yathāṃśumān 7.099.006a rāmasya pārśve savye tu padmā śrīḥ susamāhitā
GE09ram_07_u:3553: 7.099.006c dakṣiṇe hrīr viśālākṣī vyavasāyas tathāgrataḥ 7.099.007a śarā nānāvidhāś cāpi dhanur āyatavigraham 7.099.007c anuvrajanti kākutsthaṃ sarve puruṣavigrahāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3556: 7.099.009a ṛṣayaś ca mahātmānaḥ sarva eva mahīsurāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3558: 7.099.010a taṃ yāntam anuyānti sma antaḥpuracarāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3559: 7.099.010c savṛddhabāladāsīkāḥ savarṣavarakiṃkarāḥ 7.099.011a sāntaḥpuraś ca bharataḥ śatrughnasahito yayau 7.099.011c rāmavratam upāgamya rāghavaṃ samanuvratāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3560: 7.099.012a tato viprā mahātmānaḥ sāgnihotrāḥ samāhitāḥ 7.099.012c saputradārāḥ kākutstham anvagacchan mahāmatim
GE09ram_07_u:3561: 7.099.013a mantriṇo bhṛtyavargāś ca saputrāḥ sahabāndhavāḥ 7.099.013c sānugā rāghavaṃ sarve anvagacchan prahṛṣṭavat 7.099.014a tataḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3563: 7.099.015a snātaṃ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ hṛṣṭapuṣpam anuttamam 7.099.015c dṛptaṃ kilikilāśabdaiḥ sarvaṃ rāmam anuvratam 7.099.016a na tatra kaś cid dīno 'bhūd vrīḍito vāpi duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3564: 7.099.016c hṛṣṭaṃ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ babhūva paramādbhutam 7.099.017a draṣṭukāmo 'tha niryāṇaṃ rājño jānapado janaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3565: 7.099.017c saṃprāptaḥ so 'pi dṛṣṭvaiva saha sarvair anuvrataḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3567: 7.099.018c agachan parayā bhaktyā pṛṣṭhataḥ susamāhitāḥ 7.100.001a adhyardhayojanaṃ gatvā nadīṃ paścān mukhāśritām 7.100.001c sarayūṃ puṇyasalilāṃ dadarśa raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3568: 7.100.002a atha tasmin muhūrte tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3569: 7.100.002c sarvaiḥ parivṛto devair ṛṣibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3570: 7.100.003a āyayau yatra kākutsthaḥ svargāya samupasthitaḥ 7.100.003c vimānaśatakoṭībhir divyābhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3571: 7.100.004a papāta puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca vāyumuktā mahaughavat 7.100.005a tasmiṃs tūryaśatākīrṇe
GE09ram_07_u:3573: 7.100.006a tataḥ pitāmaho vāṇīm antarikṣād abhāṣata 7.100.006c āgaccha viṣṇo bhadraṃ te diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_07_u:3574: 7.100.007a bhrātṛbhiḥ saha devābhaiḥ praviśasva svakāṃ tanum
GE09ram_07_u:3575: 7.100.007c vaiṣṇavīṃ tāṃ mahātejas tad ākāśaṃ sanātanam
GE09ram_07_u:3576: 7.100.008a tvaṃ hi lokagatir deva na tvāṃ ke cit prajānate
GE09ram_07_u:3577: 7.100.008c ṛte māyāṃ viśālākṣa tava pūrvaparigrahām 7.100.009a tvam acintyaṃ mahad bhūtam akṣayaṃ sarvasaṃgraham
GE09ram_07_u:3578: 7.100.009c yām icchasi mahātejas tāṃ tanuṃ praviśa svayam
GE09ram_07_u:3580: 7.100.010c viveśa vaiṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ saśarīraḥ sahānujaḥ 7.100.011a tato viṣṇugataṃ devaṃ pūjayanti sma devatāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3581: 7.100.011c sādhyā marudgaṇāś caiva sendrāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ 7.100.012a ye ca divyā ṛṣigaṇā gandharvāpsarasaś ca yāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3583: 7.100.013a sarvaṃ hṛṣṭaṃ pramuditaṃ sarvaṃ pūrṇamanoratham 7.100.013c sādhu sādhv iti tat sarvaṃ tridivaṃ gatakalmaṣam
GE09ram_07_u:3584: 7.100.014a atha viṣṇur mahātejāḥ pitāmaham uvāca ha
GE09ram_07_u:3585: 7.100.014c eṣāṃ lokāñ janaughānāṃ dātum arhasi suvrata
GE09ram_07_u:3586: 7.100.015a ime hi sarve snehān mām anuyātā manasvinaḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3587: 7.100.015c bhaktā bhājayitavyāś ca tyaktātmānaś ca matkṛte
GE09ram_07_u:3588: 7.100.016a tac chrutvā viṣṇuvacanaṃ brahmā lokaguruḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3589: 7.100.016c lokān sāntānikān nāma yāsyantīme samāgatāḥ 7.100.017a yac ca tiryaggataṃ kiṃ cid rāmam evānucintayat
GE09ram_07_u:3590: 7.100.017c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyati bhaktyā vai saṃtāne tu nivatsyati
GE09ram_07_u:3591: 7.100.017e sarvair eva guṇair yukte brahmalokād anantare
GE09ram_07_u:3592: 7.100.018a vānarāś ca svakāṃ yonim ṛkṣāś caiva tathā yayuḥ 7.100.018c yebhyo viniḥsṛtā ye ye surādibhyaḥ susaṃbhavāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3593: 7.100.019a ṛṣibhyo nāgayakṣebhyas tāṃs tān eva prapedire
GE09ram_07_u:3596: 7.100.020c avagāhya jalaṃ yo yaḥ prāṇī hy āsīt prahṛṣṭavat 7.100.021a mānuṣaṃ deham utsṛjya vimānaṃ so 'dhyarohata
GE09ram_07_u:3598: 7.100.022a divyā divyena vapuṣā devā dīptā ivābhavan
GE09ram_07_u:3599: 7.100.022c gatvā tu sarayūtoyaṃ sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE09ram_07_u:3600: 7.100.023a prāpya tat toyavikledaṃ devalokam upāgaman 7.100.023c devānāṃ yasya yā yonir vānarā ṛṣka rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_07_u:3601: 7.100.024a tām eva viviśuḥ sarve devān nikṣipya cāmbhasi
GE09ram_07_u:3602: 7.100.024c tathā svargagataṃ sarvaṃ kṛtvā lokagurur divam
GE09ram_07_u:3603: 7.100.025a jagāma tridaśaiḥ sārdhaṃ hṛṣṭair hṛṣṭo mahāmatiḥ
